NullFrameWork Exception 0.1
I am making my own framework

bool vertexBufferAutoSizeReduction [getset]
 Determines if the data structures allocated to contain the geometry of the text object will be reduced in size if the number of characters required to display the text is reduced by more than 256 characters. This reduction has the benefit of reducing the amount of vertex data being submitted to the graphic device but results in GC when it occurs. More...

readonly decimal[] k_Power = { 5e-1m, 5e-2m, 5e-3m, 5e-4m, 5e-5m, 5e-6m, 5e-7m, 5e-8m, 5e-9m, 5e-10m }

Member Function Documentation

◆ AddFloatToCharArray()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.AddFloatToCharArray ( float  value,
int  padding,
int  precision,
ref int  writeIndex 
)
privateinherited
4728 {
4729 if (value < 0)
4730 {
4731 m_input_CharArray[writeIndex] = '-';
4732 writeIndex += 1;
4733 value = -value;
4734 }
4735
4736 // Using decimal type due to floating point precision impacting formatting
4737 decimal valueD = (decimal)value;
4738
4739 // Round up value to the specified prevision otherwise set precision to max.
4740 if (padding == 0 && precision == 0)
4741 precision = 9;
4742 else
4743 valueD += k_Power[Mathf.Min(9, precision)];
4744
4745 long integer = (long)valueD;
4746
4747 AddIntegerToCharArray(integer, padding, ref writeIndex);
4748
4749 if (precision > 0)
4750 {
4751 valueD -= integer;
4752
4753 // Add decimal point and values only if remainder is not zero.
4754 if (valueD != 0)
4755 {
4756 // Add decimal point
4757 m_input_CharArray[writeIndex++] = '.';
4758
4759 for (int p = 0; p < precision; p++)
4760 {
4761 valueD *= 10;
4762 long d = (long)valueD;
4763
4764 m_input_CharArray[writeIndex++] = (char)(d + 48);
4765 valueD -= d;
4766
4767 if (valueD == 0)
4768 p = precision;
4769 }
4770 }
4771 }
4772 }
TMPro.TMP_Text.AddIntegerToCharArray
void AddIntegerToCharArray(double number, int padding, ref int writeIndex)
Definition: TMP_Text.cs:4781

◆ AddIntegerToCharArray()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.AddIntegerToCharArray ( double  number,
int  padding,
ref int  writeIndex 
)
privateinherited

Parameters
number
padding
writeIndex
4782 {
4783 int integralCount = 0;
4784 int i = writeIndex;
4785
4786 do
4787 {
4788 m_input_CharArray[i++] = (char)(number % 10 + 48);
4789 number /= 10;
4790 integralCount += 1;
4791 } while (number > 0.999d || integralCount < padding);
4792
4793 int lastIndex = i;
4794
4796 while (writeIndex + 1 < i)
4797 {
4798 i -= 1;
4799 char t = m_input_CharArray[writeIndex];
4800 m_input_CharArray[writeIndex] = m_input_CharArray[i];
4801 m_input_CharArray[i] = t;
4802 writeIndex += 1;
4803 }
4804 writeIndex = lastIndex;
4805 }

◆ AdjustLineOffset()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.AdjustLineOffset ( int  startIndex,
int  endIndex,
float  offset 
)
protectedinherited

Method to adjust line spacing as a result of using different fonts or font point size.

Parameters
startIndex
endIndex
offset
6073 {
6074 Vector3 vertexOffset = new Vector3(0, offset, 0);
6075
6076 for (int i = startIndex; i <= endIndex; i++)
6077 {
6078 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft -= vertexOffset;
6079 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topLeft -= vertexOffset;
6080 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight -= vertexOffset;
6081 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomRight -= vertexOffset;
6082
6083 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender -= vertexOffset.y;
6084 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine -= vertexOffset.y;
6085 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender -= vertexOffset.y;
6086
6087 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].isVisible)
6088 {
6089 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_BL.position -= vertexOffset;
6090 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_TL.position -= vertexOffset;
6091 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_TR.position -= vertexOffset;
6092 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertex_BR.position -= vertexOffset;
6093 }
6094 }
6095 }

◆ Awake()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.Awake ( )
protected
53 {
54 //Debug.Log("***** Awake() called on object ID " + GetInstanceID() + ". *****");
55
56 #if UNITY_EDITOR
57 // Special handling for TMP Settings and importing Essential Resources
58 if (TMP_Settings.instance == null)
59 {
60 if (m_isWaitingOnResourceLoad == false)
61 TMPro_EventManager.RESOURCE_LOAD_EVENT.Add(ON_RESOURCES_LOADED);
62
63 m_isWaitingOnResourceLoad = true;
64 return;
65 }
66 #endif
67
68 // Cache Reference to the Mesh Renderer.
69 m_renderer = GetComponent<Renderer>();
70 if (m_renderer == null)
71 m_renderer = gameObject.AddComponent<Renderer>();
72
73 // Remove CanvasRenderer from text object if one exists
74 CanvasRenderer canvasRenderer = GetComponent<CanvasRenderer>();
75 if (canvasRenderer != null)
76 {
77 Debug.Log("Removing unnecessary CanvasRenderer component from text object.", this);
78 DestroyImmediate(canvasRenderer);
79 }
80
81 // Cache Reference to RectTransform
82 m_rectTransform = this.rectTransform;
83
84 // Cache Reference to the transform;
85 m_transform = this.transform;
86
87 // Cache a reference to the Mesh Filter.
88 m_meshFilter = GetComponent<MeshFilter>();
89 if (m_meshFilter == null)
90 m_meshFilter = gameObject.AddComponent<MeshFilter>();
91
92 // Create new Mesh if necessary and cache reference to it.
93 if (m_mesh == null)
94 {
95 m_mesh = new Mesh();
96 m_mesh.hideFlags = HideFlags.HideAndDontSave;
97 #if DEVELOPMENT_BUILD || UNITY_EDITOR
98 m_mesh.name = "TextMeshPro Mesh";
99 #endif
100 m_meshFilter.sharedMesh = m_mesh;
101
102 // Create new TextInfo for the text object.
103 m_textInfo = new TMP_TextInfo(this);
104 }
105 m_meshFilter.hideFlags = HideFlags.HideInInspector | HideFlags.HideAndDontSave;
106
107 // Load TMP Settings for new text object instances.
108 LoadDefaultSettings();
109
110 // Load the font asset and assign material to renderer.
111 LoadFontAsset();
112
113 // Allocate our initial buffers.
114 if (m_InternalParsingBuffer == null)
115 m_InternalParsingBuffer = new UnicodeChar[m_max_characters];
116
117 m_cached_TextElement = new TMP_Character();
118 m_isFirstAllocation = true;
119
120 // Check to make sure Sub Text Objects are tracked correctly in the event a Prefab is used.
121 TMP_SubMesh[] subTextObjects = GetComponentsInChildren<TMP_SubMesh>();
122 if (subTextObjects.Length > 0)
123 {
124 for (int i = 0; i < subTextObjects.Length; i++)
125 m_subTextObjects[i + 1] = subTextObjects[i];
126 }
127
128 // Set flags to ensure our text is parsed and redrawn.
129 m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
130 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
131
132 m_isAwake = true;
133 }

◆ CalculatePreferredValues()

virtual Vector2 TMPro.TMP_Text.CalculatePreferredValues ( ref float  fontSize,
Vector2  marginSize,
bool  isTextAutoSizingEnabled,
bool  isWordWrappingEnabled 
)
protectedvirtualinherited

Method to calculate the preferred width and height of the text object.

Returns
5123 {
5124 //Debug.Log("*** CalculatePreferredValues() ***"); // ***** Frame: " + Time.frameCount);
5125
5127
5128 // Early exit if no font asset was assigned. This should not be needed since LiberationSans SDF will be assigned by default.
5129 if (m_fontAsset == null || m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
5130 {
5131 Debug.LogWarning("Can't Generate Mesh! No Font Asset has been assigned to Object ID: " + this.GetInstanceID());
5132
5133 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = true;
5134 return Vector2.zero;
5135 }
5136
5137 // Early exit if we don't have any Text to generate.
5138 if (m_InternalParsingBuffer == null || m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length == 0 || m_InternalParsingBuffer[0].unicode == (char)0)
5139 {
5140 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = true;
5141 return Vector2.zero;
5142 }
5143
5144 m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;
5145 m_currentMaterial = m_sharedMaterial;
5146 m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
5147 m_materialReferenceStack.SetDefault(new MaterialReference(0, m_currentFontAsset, null, m_currentMaterial, m_padding));
5148
5149 // Total character count is computed when the text is parsed.
5150 int totalCharacterCount = m_totalCharacterCount; // m_VisibleCharacters.Count;
5151
5152 if (m_internalCharacterInfo == null || totalCharacterCount > m_internalCharacterInfo.Length)
5153 m_internalCharacterInfo = new TMP_CharacterInfo[totalCharacterCount > 1024 ? totalCharacterCount + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(totalCharacterCount)];
5154
5155 // Calculate the scale of the font based on selected font size and sampling point size.
5156 // baseScale is calculated using the font asset assigned to the text object.
5157 float baseScale = m_fontScale = (fontSize / m_fontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_fontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
5158 float currentElementScale = baseScale;
5159 float currentEmScale = fontSize * 0.01f * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
5160 m_fontScaleMultiplier = 1;
5161
5162 m_currentFontSize = fontSize;
5163 m_sizeStack.SetDefault(m_currentFontSize);
5164 float fontSizeDelta = 0;
5165
5166 m_FontStyleInternal = m_fontStyle; // Set the default style.
5167
5168 m_lineJustification = m_HorizontalAlignment; // m_textAlignment; // Sets the line justification mode to match editor alignment.
5169 m_lineJustificationStack.SetDefault(m_lineJustification);
5170
5171 m_baselineOffset = 0; // Used by subscript characters.
5172 m_baselineOffsetStack.Clear();
5173
5174 m_lineOffset = 0; // Amount of space between lines (font line spacing + m_linespacing).
5175 m_lineHeight = TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET;
5176 float lineGap = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.lineHeight - (m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine - m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.descentLine);
5177
5178 m_cSpacing = 0; // Amount of space added between characters as a result of the use of the <cspace> tag.
5179 m_monoSpacing = 0;
5180 //float lineOffsetDelta = 0;
5181 m_xAdvance = 0; // Used to track the position of each character.
5182 float maxXAdvance = 0; // Used to determine Preferred Width.
5183
5184 tag_LineIndent = 0; // Used for indentation of text.
5185 tag_Indent = 0;
5186 m_indentStack.SetDefault(0);
5187 tag_NoParsing = false;
5188 //m_isIgnoringAlignment = false;
5189
5190 m_characterCount = 0; // Total characters in the char[]
5191
5192
5193 // Tracking of line information
5194 m_firstCharacterOfLine = 0;
5195 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
5196 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
5197 m_lineNumber = 0;
5198 m_startOfLineAscender = 0;
5199 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = false;
5200
5201 float marginWidth = marginSize.x;
5202 float marginHeight = marginSize.y;
5203 m_marginLeft = 0;
5204 m_marginRight = 0;
5205
5206 float lineMarginLeft = 0;
5207 float lineMarginRight = 0;
5208
5209 m_width = -1;
5210 float widthOfTextArea = marginWidth + 0.0001f - m_marginLeft - m_marginRight;
5211
5212 // Used by Unity's Auto Layout system.
5213 float renderedWidth = 0;
5214 float renderedHeight = 0;
5215 float textWidth = 0;
5216 m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
5217
5218 // Tracking of the highest Ascender
5219 m_maxCapHeight = 0;
5220 m_maxTextAscender = 0;
5221 m_ElementDescender = 0;
5222 float maxVisibleDescender = 0;
5223 bool isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = false;
5224
5225 // Initialize struct to track states of word wrapping
5226 bool isFirstWordOfLine = true;
5227 m_isNonBreakingSpace = false;
5228 //bool isLastBreakingChar = false;
5229 bool isLastCharacterCJK = false;
5230 //int lastSoftLineBreak = 0;
5231
5232 CharacterSubstitution characterToSubstitute = new CharacterSubstitution(-1, 0);
5233 bool isSoftHyphenIgnored = false;
5234
5235 WordWrapState internalWordWrapState = new WordWrapState();
5236 WordWrapState internalLineState = new WordWrapState();
5237 WordWrapState internalSoftLineBreak = new WordWrapState();
5238
5239 // Counter to prevent recursive lockup when computing preferred values.
5240 m_AutoSizeIterationCount += 1;
5241
5242 // Parse through Character buffer to read HTML tags and begin creating mesh.
5243 for (int i = 0; i < m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length && m_InternalParsingBuffer[i].unicode != 0; i++)
5244 {
5245 int charCode = m_InternalParsingBuffer[i].unicode;
5246
5247 // Parse Rich Text Tag
5248 #region Parse Rich Text Tag
5249 if (m_isRichText && charCode == 60) // '<'
5250 {
5251 m_isParsingText = true;
5252 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
5253 int endTagIndex;
5254
5255 // Check if Tag is valid. If valid, skip to the end of the validated tag.
5256 if (ValidateHtmlTag(m_InternalParsingBuffer, i + 1, out endTagIndex))
5257 {
5258 i = endTagIndex;
5259
5260 // Continue to next character or handle the sprite element
5261 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
5262 continue;
5263 }
5264 }
5265 else
5266 {
5267 m_textElementType = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType;
5268 m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
5269 m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
5270 }
5271 #endregion End Parse Rich Text Tag
5272
5273 int prev_MaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
5274 bool isUsingAltTypeface = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isUsingAlternateTypeface;
5275
5276 m_isParsingText = false;
5277
5278 // Handle potential character substitutions
5279 #region Character Substitutions
5280 bool isInjectingCharacter = false;
5281
5282 if (characterToSubstitute.index == m_characterCount)
5283 {
5284 charCode = (int)characterToSubstitute.unicode;
5285 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
5286 isInjectingCharacter = true;
5287
5288 switch (charCode)
5289 {
5290 case 0x03:
5291 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement = m_currentFontAsset.characterLookupTable[0x03];
5292 m_isTextTruncated = true;
5293 break;
5294 case 0x2D:
5295 //
5296 break;
5297 case 0x2026:
5298 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement = m_Ellipsis.character; ;
5299 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
5300 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset = m_Ellipsis.fontAsset;
5301 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].material = m_Ellipsis.material;
5302 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_Ellipsis.materialIndex;
5303
5304 // Indicates the source parsing data has been modified.
5305 m_isTextTruncated = true;
5306
5307 // End Of Text
5308 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount + 1;
5309 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
5310 break;
5311 }
5312 }
5313 #endregion
5314
5315
5316 // When using Linked text, mark character as ignored and skip to next character.
5317 #region Linked Text
5318 if (m_characterCount < m_firstVisibleCharacter && charCode != 0x03)
5319 {
5320 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
5321 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)0x200B;
5322 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].lineNumber = 0;
5323 m_characterCount += 1;
5324 continue;
5325 }
5326 #endregion
5327
5328
5329 // Handle Font Styles like LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps.
5330 #region Handling of LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps Font Styles
5331
5332 float smallCapsMultiplier = 1.0f;
5333
5334 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
5335 {
5336 if (/*(m_fontStyle & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase ||*/ (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase)
5337 {
5338 // If this character is lowercase, switch to uppercase.
5339 if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
5340 charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
5341
5342 }
5343 else if (/*(m_fontStyle & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase ||*/ (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase)
5344 {
5345 // If this character is uppercase, switch to lowercase.
5346 if (char.IsUpper((char)charCode))
5347 charCode = char.ToLower((char)charCode);
5348 }
5349 else if (/*(m_fontStyle & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps ||*/ (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps)
5350 {
5351 if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
5352 {
5353 smallCapsMultiplier = 0.8f;
5354 charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
5355 }
5356 }
5357 }
5358 #endregion
5359
5360
5361 // Look up Character Data from Dictionary and cache it.
5362 #region Look up Character Data
5363 //float baselineOffset = 0;
5364 float elementAscentLine = 0;
5365 float elementDescentLine = 0;
5366 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
5367 {
5368 // If a sprite is used as a fallback then get a reference to it and set the color to white.
5369 m_currentSpriteAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset;
5370 m_spriteIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteIndex;
5371
5372 TMP_SpriteCharacter sprite = m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
5373 if (sprite == null) continue;
5374
5375 // Sprites are assigned in the E000 Private Area + sprite Index
5376 if (charCode == 60)
5377 charCode = 57344 + m_spriteIndex;
5378
5379 // The sprite scale calculations are based on the font asset assigned to the text object.
5380 if (m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.pointSize > 0)
5381 {
5382 float spriteScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
5383 currentElementScale = sprite.scale * sprite.glyph.scale * spriteScale;
5384 elementAscentLine = m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine;
5385 //baselineOffset = m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.baseline * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.scale;
5386 elementDescentLine = m_currentSpriteAsset.faceInfo.descentLine;
5387 }
5388 else
5389 {
5390 float spriteScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
5391 currentElementScale = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine / sprite.glyph.metrics.height * sprite.scale * sprite.glyph.scale * spriteScale;
5392 float scaleDelta = spriteScale / currentElementScale;
5393 elementAscentLine = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.ascentLine * scaleDelta;
5394 //baselineOffset = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.baseline * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale;
5395 elementDescentLine = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.descentLine * scaleDelta;
5396 }
5397
5398 m_cached_TextElement = sprite;
5399
5400 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
5401 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].scale = currentElementScale;
5402
5403 m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_MaterialIndex;
5404 }
5405 else if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
5406 {
5407 m_cached_TextElement = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement;
5408 if (m_cached_TextElement == null) continue;
5409
5410 m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
5411
5412 float adjustedScale;
5413 if (isInjectingCharacter && m_InternalParsingBuffer[i].unicode == 0x0A && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine)
5414 adjustedScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].pointSize * smallCapsMultiplier / m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
5415 else
5416 adjustedScale = m_currentFontSize * smallCapsMultiplier / m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
5417
5418 elementAscentLine = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.ascentLine;
5419 elementDescentLine = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.descentLine;
5420
5421 currentElementScale = adjustedScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_cached_TextElement.scale;
5422 //baselineOffset = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.baseline * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale;
5423
5424 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
5425 }
5426 #endregion
5427
5428
5429 // Handle Soft Hyphen
5430 #region Handle Soft Hyphen
5431 float currentElementUnmodifiedScale = currentElementScale;
5432 if (charCode == 0xAD || charCode == 0x03)
5433 currentElementScale = 0;
5434 #endregion
5435
5436
5437 // Store some of the text object's information
5438 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)charCode;
5439
5440 // Cache glyph metrics
5441 GlyphMetrics currentGlyphMetrics = m_cached_TextElement.m_Glyph.metrics;
5442
5443 // Optimization to avoid calling this more than once per character.
5444 bool isWhiteSpace = char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode);
5445
5446
5447 // Handle Kerning if Enabled.
5448 #region Handle Kerning
5449 TMP_GlyphValueRecord glyphAdjustments = new TMP_GlyphValueRecord();
5450 float characterSpacingAdjustment = m_characterSpacing;
5451 m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment = 0;
5452 if (m_enableKerning)
5453 {
5454 TMP_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecord adjustmentPair;
5455 uint baseGlyphIndex = m_cached_TextElement.m_GlyphIndex;
5456
5457 if (m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1)
5458 {
5459 uint nextGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].textElement.m_GlyphIndex;
5460 uint key = nextGlyphIndex << 16 | baseGlyphIndex;
5461
5462 if (m_currentFontAsset.m_FontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out adjustmentPair))
5463 {
5464 glyphAdjustments = adjustmentPair.m_FirstAdjustmentRecord.m_GlyphValueRecord;
5465 characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.m_FeatureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
5466 }
5467 }
5468
5469 if (m_characterCount >= 1)
5470 {
5471 uint previousGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].textElement.m_GlyphIndex;
5472 uint key = baseGlyphIndex << 16 | previousGlyphIndex;
5473
5474 if (m_currentFontAsset.m_FontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out adjustmentPair))
5475 {
5476 glyphAdjustments += adjustmentPair.m_SecondAdjustmentRecord.m_GlyphValueRecord;
5477 characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.m_FeatureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
5478 }
5479 }
5480
5481 m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment = glyphAdjustments.m_XAdvance;
5482 }
5483 #endregion
5484
5485
5486 // Initial Implementation for RTL support.
5487 #region Handle Right-to-Left
5488 //if (m_isRightToLeft)
5489 //{
5490 // m_xAdvance -= ((m_cached_TextElement.xAdvance * bold_xAdvance_multiplier + m_characterSpacing + m_wordSpacing + m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset) * currentElementScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
5491
5492 // if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode) || charCode == 0x200B)
5493 // m_xAdvance -= m_wordSpacing * currentElementScale;
5494 //}
5495 #endregion
5496
5497
5498 // Handle Mono Spacing
5499 #region Handle Mono Spacing
5500 float monoAdvance = 0;
5501 if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
5502 {
5503 monoAdvance = (m_monoSpacing / 2 - (m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.width / 2 + m_cached_TextElement.glyph.metrics.horizontalBearingX) * currentElementScale) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
5504 m_xAdvance += monoAdvance;
5505 }
5506 #endregion
5507
5508
5509 // Set Padding based on selected font style
5510 #region Handle Style Padding
5511 float boldSpacingAdjustment = 0;
5512 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character && !isUsingAltTypeface && ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold)) // Checks for any combination of Bold Style.
5513 boldSpacingAdjustment = m_currentFontAsset.boldSpacing;
5514 #endregion Handle Style Padding
5515
5516 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine = 0 - m_lineOffset + m_baselineOffset;
5517
5518 // Compute text metrics
5519 #region Compute Ascender & Descender values
5520 // Element Ascender in line space
5521 float elementAscender = m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character
5522 ? elementAscentLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier + m_baselineOffset
5523 : elementAscentLine * currentElementScale + m_baselineOffset;
5524
5525 // Element Descender in line space
5526 float elementDescender = m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character
5527 ? elementDescentLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier + m_baselineOffset
5528 : elementDescentLine * currentElementScale + m_baselineOffset;
5529
5530 float adjustedAscender = elementAscender;
5531 float adjustedDescender = elementDescender;
5532
5533 bool isFirstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount == m_firstCharacterOfLine;
5534 // Max line ascender and descender in line space
5535 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
5536 {
5537 // Special handling for Superscript and Subscript where we use the unadjusted line ascender and descender
5538 if (m_baselineOffset != 0)
5539 {
5540 adjustedAscender = Mathf.Max((elementAscender - m_baselineOffset) / m_fontScaleMultiplier, adjustedAscender);
5541 adjustedDescender = Mathf.Min((elementDescender - m_baselineOffset) / m_fontScaleMultiplier, adjustedDescender);
5542 }
5543
5544 m_maxLineAscender = Mathf.Max(adjustedAscender, m_maxLineAscender);
5545 m_maxLineDescender = Mathf.Min(adjustedDescender, m_maxLineDescender);
5546 }
5547
5548 // Element Ascender and Descender in object space
5549 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
5550 {
5551 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender = adjustedAscender;
5552 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedDescender = adjustedDescender;
5553
5554 m_ElementAscender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender = elementAscender - m_lineOffset;
5555 m_ElementDescender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].descender = elementDescender - m_lineOffset;
5556 }
5557 else
5558 {
5559 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
5560 m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedDescender = m_maxLineDescender;
5561
5562 m_ElementAscender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
5563 m_ElementDescender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].descender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
5564 }
5565
5566 // Max text object ascender and cap height
5567 if (m_lineNumber == 0 || m_isNewPage)
5568 {
5569 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
5570 {
5571 m_maxTextAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
5572 m_maxCapHeight = Mathf.Max(m_maxCapHeight, m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.capLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier);
5573 }
5574 }
5575
5576 // Page ascender
5577 if (m_lineOffset == 0)
5578 {
5579 if (!isWhiteSpace || m_characterCount == m_firstCharacterOfLine)
5580 m_PageAscender = m_PageAscender > elementAscender ? m_PageAscender : elementAscender;
5581 }
5582 #endregion
5583
5584 bool isJustifiedOrFlush = (m_lineJustification & HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush) == HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush || (m_lineJustification & HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified) == HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified;
5585
5586 // Setup Mesh for visible text elements. ie. not a SPACE / LINEFEED / CARRIAGE RETURN.
5587 #region Handle Visible Characters
5588 if (charCode == 9 || (isWhiteSpace == false && charCode != 0x200B && charCode != 0xAD && charCode != 0x03) || (charCode == 0xAD && isSoftHyphenIgnored == false) || m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
5589 {
5590 //float marginLeft = m_marginLeft;
5591 //float marginRight = m_marginRight;
5592
5593 // Injected characters do not override margins
5594 //if (isInjectingCharacter)
5595 //{
5596 // marginLeft = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginLeft;
5597 // marginRight = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginRight;
5598 //}
5599
5600 widthOfTextArea = m_width != -1 ? Mathf.Min(marginWidth + 0.0001f - m_marginLeft - m_marginRight, m_width) : marginWidth + 0.0001f - m_marginLeft - m_marginRight;
5601
5602 // Calculate the line breaking width of the text.
5603 textWidth = Mathf.Abs(m_xAdvance) + currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalAdvance * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta) * (charCode == 0xAD ? currentElementUnmodifiedScale : currentElementScale);
5604
5605 int testedCharacterCount = m_characterCount;
5606
5607 // Handling of Horizontal Bounds
5608 #region Current Line Horizontal Bounds Check
5609 if (textWidth > widthOfTextArea * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f))
5610 {
5611 // Handle Line Breaking (if still possible)
5612 if (isWordWrappingEnabled && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine) // && isFirstWord == false)
5613 {
5614 // Restore state to previous safe line breaking
5615 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState);
5616
5617 // Replace Soft Hyphen by Hyphen Minus 0x2D
5618 #region Handle Soft Hyphenation
5619 if (m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].character == 0xAD && isSoftHyphenIgnored == false && m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Overflow)
5620 {
5621 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount - 1;
5622 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x2D;
5623
5624 i -= 1;
5625 m_characterCount -= 1;
5626 continue;
5627 }
5628
5629 isSoftHyphenIgnored = false;
5630
5631 // Ignore Soft Hyphen to prevent it from wrapping
5632 if (m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].character == 0xAD)
5633 {
5634 isSoftHyphenIgnored = true;
5635 continue;
5636 }
5637 #endregion
5638
5639 // Adjust character spacing before breaking up word if auto size is enabled
5640 #region Handle Text Auto Size (if word wrapping is no longer possible)
5641 if (isTextAutoSizingEnabled && isFirstWordOfLine)
5642 {
5643 // Handle Character Width Adjustments
5644 #region Character Width Adjustments
5645 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100 && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
5646 {
5647 float adjustedTextWidth = textWidth;
5648
5649 // Determine full width of the text
5650 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta > 0)
5651 adjustedTextWidth /= 1f - m_charWidthAdjDelta;
5652
5653 float adjustmentDelta = textWidth - (widthOfTextArea - 0.0001f) * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f);
5654 m_charWidthAdjDelta += adjustmentDelta / adjustedTextWidth;
5655 m_charWidthAdjDelta = Mathf.Min(m_charWidthAdjDelta, m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100);
5656
5657 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Character Width by " + (m_charWidthAdjDelta * 100) + "%");
5658 return Vector2.zero;
5659 }
5660 #endregion
5661
5662 // Handle Text Auto-sizing resulting from text exceeding vertical bounds.
5663 #region Text Auto-Sizing (Text greater than vertical bounds)
5664 if (fontSize > m_fontSizeMin && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
5665 {
5666 m_maxFontSize = fontSize;
5667
5668 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
5669 fontSize -= sizeDelta;
5670 fontSize = Mathf.Max((int)(fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMin);
5671
5672 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Point Size from [" + m_maxFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
5673 return Vector2.zero;
5674 }
5675 #endregion Text Auto-Sizing
5676 }
5677 #endregion
5678
5679 // Adjust line spacing if necessary
5680 float baselineAdjustmentDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
5681 if (m_lineOffset > 0 && Math.Abs(baselineAdjustmentDelta) > 0.01f && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false && !m_isNewPage)
5682 {
5683 //AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, baselineAdjustmentDelta);
5684 m_ElementDescender -= baselineAdjustmentDelta;
5685 m_lineOffset += baselineAdjustmentDelta;
5686 }
5687
5688 // Calculate line ascender and make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
5689 float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
5690 float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
5691
5692 // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
5693 m_ElementDescender = m_ElementDescender < lineDescender ? m_ElementDescender : lineDescender;
5694 if (!isMaxVisibleDescenderSet)
5695 maxVisibleDescender = m_ElementDescender;
5696
5697 if (m_useMaxVisibleDescender && (m_characterCount >= m_maxVisibleCharacters || m_lineNumber >= m_maxVisibleLines))
5698 isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = true;
5699
5700 // Store first character of the next line.
5701 m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
5702 m_lineVisibleCharacterCount = 0;
5703
5704 // Compute Preferred Width & Height
5705 renderedWidth += m_xAdvance;
5706
5707 if (isWordWrappingEnabled)
5708 renderedHeight = m_maxTextAscender - m_ElementDescender;
5709 else
5710 renderedHeight = Mathf.Max(renderedHeight, lineAscender - lineDescender);
5711
5712 // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
5713 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalLineState, i, m_characterCount - 1);
5714
5715 m_lineNumber += 1;
5716
5717 float ascender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender;
5718
5719 // Compute potential new line offset in the event a line break is needed.
5720 if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
5721 {
5722 m_lineOffset += 0 - m_maxLineDescender + ascender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale + m_lineSpacing * currentEmScale;
5723 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = false;
5724 }
5725 else
5726 {
5727 m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + m_lineSpacing * currentEmScale;
5728 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = true;
5729 }
5730
5731 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
5732 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
5733 m_startOfLineAscender = ascender;
5734
5735 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
5736 //isStartOfNewLine = true;
5737 isFirstWordOfLine = true;
5738 continue;
5739 }
5740 }
5741 #endregion
5742
5743 lineMarginLeft = m_marginLeft;
5744 lineMarginRight = m_marginRight;
5745
5746 }
5747 #endregion Handle Visible Characters
5748
5749
5750 // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
5751 #region Adjust Line Spacing
5752 /*if (m_lineOffset > 0 && !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_maxLineAscender, m_startOfLineAscender) && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false && !m_isNewPage)
5753 {
5754 float offsetDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
5755 //AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, offsetDelta);
5756 m_ElementDescender -= offsetDelta;
5757 m_lineOffset += offsetDelta;
5758
5759 m_startOfLineAscender += offsetDelta;
5760 internalWordWrapState.lineOffset = m_lineOffset;
5761 internalWordWrapState.startOfLineAscender = m_startOfLineAscender;
5762 }*/
5763 #endregion
5764
5765
5766 // Handle xAdvance & Tabulation Stops. Tab stops at every 25% of Font Size.
5767 #region XAdvance, Tabulation & Stops
5768 if (charCode == 9)
5769 {
5770 float tabSize = m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.tabWidth * m_currentFontAsset.tabSize * currentElementScale;
5771 float tabs = Mathf.Ceil(m_xAdvance / tabSize) * tabSize;
5772 m_xAdvance = tabs > m_xAdvance ? tabs : m_xAdvance + tabSize;
5773 }
5774 else if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
5775 {
5776 m_xAdvance += (m_monoSpacing - monoAdvance + ((m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale) + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
5777
5778 if (isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B)
5779 m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentEmScale;
5780 }
5781 else
5782 {
5783 m_xAdvance += ((currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalAdvance + glyphAdjustments.xAdvance + boldSpacingAdjustment) * currentElementScale + (m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
5784
5785 if (isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B)
5786 m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentEmScale;
5787 }
5788 #endregion Tabulation & Stops
5789
5790
5791 // Handle Carriage Return
5792 #region Carriage Return
5793 if (charCode == 13)
5794 {
5795 maxXAdvance = Mathf.Max(maxXAdvance, renderedWidth + m_xAdvance);
5796 renderedWidth = 0;
5797 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
5798 }
5799 #endregion Carriage Return
5800
5801
5802 // Handle Line Spacing Adjustments + Word Wrapping & special case for last line.
5803 #region Check for Line Feed and Last Character
5804 if (charCode == 10 || charCode == 11 || charCode == 0x03 || charCode == 0x2028 || charCode == 0x2029 || m_characterCount == totalCharacterCount - 1)
5805 {
5806 // Check if Line Spacing of previous line needs to be adjusted.
5807 float baselineAdjustmentDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
5808 if (m_lineOffset > 0 && Math.Abs(baselineAdjustmentDelta) > 0.01f && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false && !m_isNewPage)
5809 {
5810 m_ElementDescender -= baselineAdjustmentDelta;
5811 m_lineOffset += baselineAdjustmentDelta;
5812 }
5813 m_isNewPage = false;
5814
5815 // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
5816 //float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
5817 float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
5818
5819 // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
5820 m_ElementDescender = m_ElementDescender < lineDescender ? m_ElementDescender : lineDescender;
5821
5822 // Store PreferredWidth paying attention to linefeed and last character of text.
5823 if (m_characterCount == totalCharacterCount - 1)
5824 renderedWidth = Mathf.Max(maxXAdvance, renderedWidth + textWidth + lineMarginLeft + lineMarginRight);
5825 else
5826 {
5827 maxXAdvance = Mathf.Max(maxXAdvance, renderedWidth + textWidth + lineMarginLeft + lineMarginRight);
5828 renderedWidth = 0;
5829 }
5830
5831 renderedHeight = m_maxTextAscender - m_ElementDescender;
5832
5833 // Add new line if not last lines or character.
5834 if (charCode == 10 || charCode == 11 || charCode == 0x2D || charCode == 0x2028 || charCode == 0x2029)
5835 {
5836 // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
5837 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalLineState, i, m_characterCount);
5838 // Store the state of the last Character before the new line.
5839 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
5840
5841 m_lineNumber += 1;
5842 m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount + 1;
5843
5844 float ascender = m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender;
5845
5846 // Apply Line Spacing with special handling for VT char(11)
5847 if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
5848 {
5849 float lineOffsetDelta = 0 - m_maxLineDescender + ascender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale + (m_lineSpacing + (charCode == 10 || charCode == 0x2029 ? m_paragraphSpacing : 0)) * currentEmScale;
5850 m_lineOffset += lineOffsetDelta;
5851 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = false;
5852 }
5853 else
5854 {
5855 m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + (m_lineSpacing + (charCode == 10 || charCode == 0x2029 ? m_paragraphSpacing : 0)) * currentEmScale;
5856 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = true;
5857 }
5858
5859 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
5860 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
5861 m_startOfLineAscender = ascender;
5862
5863 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_LineIndent + tag_Indent;
5864
5865 m_characterCount += 1;
5866 continue;
5867 }
5868
5869 // If End of Text
5870 if (charCode == 0x03)
5871 i = m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length;
5872 }
5873 #endregion Check for Linefeed or Last Character
5874
5875
5876 // Save State of Mesh Creation for handling of Word Wrapping
5877 #region Save Word Wrapping State
5878 if (isWordWrappingEnabled || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Truncate || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis)
5879 {
5880 if ((isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B || charCode == 0x2D || charCode == 0xAD) && !m_isNonBreakingSpace && charCode != 0xA0 && charCode != 0x2007 && charCode != 0x2011 && charCode != 0x202F && charCode != 0x2060)
5881 {
5882 // We store the state of numerous variables for the most recent Space, LineFeed or Carriage Return to enable them to be restored
5883 // for Word Wrapping.
5884 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
5885 isFirstWordOfLine = false;
5886 isLastCharacterCJK = false;
5887
5888 // Reset soft line breaking point since we now have a valid hard break point.
5889 internalSoftLineBreak.previous_WordBreak = -1;
5890 }
5891 // Handling for East Asian languages
5892 else if (m_isNonBreakingSpace == false &&
5893 ((charCode > 0x1100 && charCode < 0x11ff || /* Hangul Jamo */
5894 charCode > 0xA960 && charCode < 0xA97F || /* Hangul Jamo Extended-A */
5895 charCode > 0xAC00 && charCode < 0xD7FF)&& /* Hangul Syllables */
5896 TMP_Settings.useModernHangulLineBreakingRules == false ||
5897
5898 (charCode > 0x2E80 && charCode < 0x9FFF || /* CJK */
5899 charCode > 0xF900 && charCode < 0xFAFF || /* CJK Compatibility Ideographs */
5900 charCode > 0xFE30 && charCode < 0xFE4F || /* CJK Compatibility Forms */
5901 charCode > 0xFF00 && charCode < 0xFFEF))) /* CJK Halfwidth */
5902 {
5903 bool isLeadingCharacter = TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.leadingCharacters.ContainsKey(charCode);
5904 bool isFollowingCharacter = m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1 && TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.followingCharacters.ContainsKey(m_internalCharacterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].character);
5905
5906 if (isFirstWordOfLine || isLeadingCharacter == false)
5907 {
5908 if (isFollowingCharacter == false)
5909 {
5910 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
5911 isFirstWordOfLine = false;
5912 }
5913
5914 if (isFirstWordOfLine)
5915 {
5916 // Special handling for non-breaking space and soft line breaks
5917 if (isWhiteSpace)
5918 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalSoftLineBreak, i, m_characterCount);
5919
5920 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
5921 }
5922 }
5923
5924 isLastCharacterCJK = true;
5925 }
5926 else if (isLastCharacterCJK)
5927 {
5928 bool isLeadingCharacter = TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.leadingCharacters.ContainsKey(charCode);
5929
5930 if (isLeadingCharacter == false)
5931 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
5932
5933 isLastCharacterCJK = false;
5934 }
5935 else if (isFirstWordOfLine)
5936 {
5937 // Special handling for non-breaking space and soft line breaks
5938 if (isWhiteSpace || (charCode == 0xAD && isSoftHyphenIgnored == false))
5939 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalSoftLineBreak, i, m_characterCount);
5940
5941 SaveWordWrappingState(ref internalWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
5942 isLastCharacterCJK = false;
5943 }
5944 }
5945 #endregion Save Word Wrapping State
5946
5947 m_characterCount += 1;
5948 }
5949
5950 // Check Auto Sizing and increase font size to fill text container.
5951 #region Check Auto-Sizing (Upper Font Size Bounds)
5952 fontSizeDelta = m_maxFontSize - m_minFontSize;
5953 if (isTextAutoSizingEnabled && fontSizeDelta > 0.051f && fontSize < m_fontSizeMax && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
5954 {
5955 // Reset character width adjustment delta
5956 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
5957 m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
5958
5959 m_minFontSize = fontSize;
5960
5961 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((m_maxFontSize - fontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
5962 fontSize += sizeDelta;
5963 fontSize = Mathf.Min((int)(fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMax);
5964
5965 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Increasing Point Size from [" + m_minFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
5966 return Vector2.zero;
5967 }
5968 #endregion End Auto-sizing Check
5969
5970 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = true;
5971
5972 m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = false;
5973
5974 // Adjust Preferred Width and Height to account for Margins.
5975 renderedWidth += m_margin.x > 0 ? m_margin.x : 0;
5976 renderedWidth += m_margin.z > 0 ? m_margin.z : 0;
5977
5978 renderedHeight += m_margin.y > 0 ? m_margin.y : 0;
5979 renderedHeight += m_margin.w > 0 ? m_margin.w : 0;
5980
5981 // Round Preferred Values to nearest 5/100.
5982 renderedWidth = (int)(renderedWidth * 100 + 1f) / 100f;
5983 renderedHeight = (int)(renderedHeight * 100 + 1f) / 100f;
5984
5985 //Debug.Log("Preferred Values: (" + renderedWidth + ", " + renderedHeight + ") with Recursive count of " + m_recursiveCount);
5986
5988 return new Vector2(renderedWidth, renderedHeight);
5989 }

◆ CharArrayToInternalParsingBuffer()

int TMPro.TMP_Text.CharArrayToInternalParsingBuffer ( char[]  sourceText,
ref UnicodeChar[]  internalParsingArray 
)
protectedinherited

Copies Content of formatted SetText() to charBuffer.

Parameters
sourceText
internalParsingArray
2690 {
2691 int characterCount = sourceText == null ? 0 : sourceText.Length;
2692
2693 #if UNITY_EDITOR
2694 // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2695 // This results in allocations in the Unity Editor only
2696 if (characterCount == 0)
2697 m_text = string.Empty;
2698 else
2699 m_text = new string(sourceText);
2700 #endif
2701
2702 // Early exit if string is null or empty
2703 if (characterCount == 0)
2704 {
2705 if (internalParsingArray != null)
2706 internalParsingArray[0].unicode = 0;
2707
2708 return 0;
2709 }
2710
2711 // Make sure parsing buffer is large enough to handle the required text.
2712 if (internalParsingArray == null)
2713 internalParsingArray = new UnicodeChar[characterCount];
2714 else if (internalParsingArray.Length < characterCount)
2715 ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray, characterCount);
2716
2717 // Clear Style stacks.
2718 for (int j = 0; j < m_TextStyleStacks.Length; j++)
2719 m_TextStyleStacks[j].SetDefault(0);
2720
2721 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2722 int writeIndex = 0;
2723
2724 // Insert Opening Style
2725 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2726 InsertOpeningStyleTag(m_TextStyle, 0, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
2727
2728 for (int i = 0; i < m_charArray_Length; i++)
2729 {
2730 // Handle UTF-32 in the input text (string).
2731 if (char.IsHighSurrogate(sourceText[i]) && char.IsLowSurrogate(sourceText[i + 1]))
2732 {
2733 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2734
2735 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = char.ConvertToUtf32(sourceText[i], sourceText[i + 1]);
2736 i += 1;
2737 writeIndex += 1;
2738 continue;
2739 }
2740
2741 // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2742 if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2743 {
2744 if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2745 {
2746 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2747
2748 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2749 writeIndex += 1;
2750 i += 3;
2751
2752 continue;
2753 }
2754 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<NBSP>", i))
2755 {
2756 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2757
2758 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
2759 writeIndex += 1;
2760 i += 5;
2761
2762 continue;
2763 }
2764 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<ZWSP>", i))
2765 {
2766 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2767
2768 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
2769 writeIndex += 1;
2770 i += 5;
2771
2772 continue;
2773 }
2774 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2775 {
2776 int srcOffset;
2777 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out srcOffset, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex))
2778 {
2779 i = srcOffset;
2780 continue;
2781 }
2782 }
2783 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2784 {
2785 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
2786
2787 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2788 i += 7;
2789 continue;
2790 }
2791 }
2792
2793 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2794
2795 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2796 writeIndex += 1;
2797 }
2798
2799 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2800
2801 // Insert Closing Style
2802 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2803 InsertClosingStyleTag(ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
2804
2805 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2806
2807 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2808
2809 return writeIndex;
2810 }

The hash code corresponding to the name of this style.

◆ ComputeMarginSize()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.ComputeMarginSize ( )
virtual

Update the margin width and height

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

1394 {
1395 if (this.rectTransform != null)
1396 {
1397 //Debug.Log("*** ComputeMarginSize() *** Current RectTransform's Width is " + m_rectTransform.rect.width + " and Height is " + m_rectTransform.rect.height); // + " and size delta is " + m_rectTransform.sizeDelta);
1398 Rect rect = m_rectTransform.rect;
1399
1400 m_marginWidth = rect.width - m_margin.x - m_margin.z;
1401 m_marginHeight = rect.height - m_margin.y - m_margin.w;
1402

TMPro.TMP_Text.ConvertToFloat

Extracts a float value from char[] assuming we know the position of the start, end and decimal point.

◆ ConvertToFloat() [2/2]

float TMPro.TMP_Text.ConvertToFloat ( char[]  chars,
int  startIndex,
int  length,
out int  lastIndex 
)
protectedinherited

Extracts a float value from char[] given a start index and length.

Parameters
chars

The Char[] containing the numerical sequence.

Parameters
startIndex

The index of the start of the numerical sequence.

Parameters
length

The length of the numerical sequence.

Parameters
lastIndex

Index of the last character in the validated sequence.

Returns
7884 {
7885 if (startIndex == 0)
7886 {
7887 lastIndex = 0;
7888 return Int16.MinValue;
7889 }
7890
7891 int endIndex = startIndex + length;
7892
7893 bool isIntegerValue = true;
7894 float decimalPointMultiplier = 0;
7895
7896 // Set value multiplier checking the first character to determine if we are using '+' or '-'
7897 int valueSignMultiplier = 1;
7898 if (chars[startIndex] == '+')
7899 {
7900 valueSignMultiplier = 1;
7901 startIndex += 1;
7902 }
7903 else if (chars[startIndex] == '-')
7904 {
7905 valueSignMultiplier = -1;
7906 startIndex += 1;
7907 }
7908
7909 float value = 0;
7910
7911 for (int i = startIndex; i < endIndex; i++)
7912 {
7913 uint c = chars[i];
7914
7915 if (c >= '0' && c <= '9' || c == '.')
7916 {
7917 if (c == '.')
7918 {
7919 isIntegerValue = false;
7920 decimalPointMultiplier = 0.1f;
7921 continue;
7922 }
7923
7924 //Calculate integer and floating point value
7925 if (isIntegerValue)
7926 value = value * 10 + (c - 48) * valueSignMultiplier;
7927 else
7928 {
7929 value = value + (c - 48) * decimalPointMultiplier * valueSignMultiplier;
7930 decimalPointMultiplier *= 0.1f;
7931 }
7932
7933 continue;
7934 }
7935 else if (c == ',')
7936 {
7937 if (i + 1 < endIndex && chars[i + 1] == ' ')
7938 lastIndex = i + 1;
7939 else
7940 lastIndex = i;
7941
7942 // Make sure value is within reasonable range.
7943 if (value > 32767)
7944 return Int16.MinValue;
7945
7946 return value;
7947 }
7948 }
7949
7950 lastIndex = endIndex;
7951
7952 // Make sure value is within reasonable range.
7953 if (value > 32767)
7954 return Int16.MinValue;
7955
7956 return value;
7957 }

869 }

TMPro.TMP_Text.InternalCrossFadeColor
virtual void InternalCrossFadeColor(Color targetColor, float duration, bool ignoreTimeScale, bool useAlpha)

4371 {

4373 DestroyImmediate(m_subTextObjects[i]);

◆ DisableMasking()

void TMPro.TextMeshPro.DisableMasking ( )
private
599 {
600 if (m_sharedMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_ClipRect))
601 {
602 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_SOFT);
603 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_HARD);
604 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_TEX);
605
606 m_isMaskingEnabled = false;
607 UpdateMask();
608 }
609 }

◆ DrawTextHighlight()

virtual void TMPro.TMP_Text.DrawTextHighlight ( Vector3  start,
Vector3  end,
ref int  index,
Color32  highlightColor 
)
protectedvirtualinherited
7043 {
7044 if (m_Underline.character == null)
7045 {
7046 GetUnderlineSpecialCharacter(m_fontAsset);
7047
7048 if (m_Underline.character == null)
7049 {
7050 if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
7051 Debug.LogWarning("Unable to add highlight since the primary Font Asset doesn't contain the underline character.", this);
7052
7053 return;
7054 }
7055 }
7056
7057 int underlineMaterialIndex = m_Underline.materialIndex;
7058
7059 int verticesCount = index + 4;
7060
7061 // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
7062 if (verticesCount > m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].vertices.Length)
7063 {
7064 // Resize Mesh Buffers
7065 m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].ResizeMeshInfo(verticesCount / 4);
7066 }
7067
7068 // UNDERLINE VERTICES FOR (3) LINE SEGMENTS
7069 #region HIGHLIGHT VERTICES
7070 Vector3[] vertices = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].vertices;
7071
7072 // Front Part of the Underline
7073 vertices[index + 0] = start; // BL
7074 vertices[index + 1] = new Vector3(start.x, end.y, 0); // TL
7075 vertices[index + 2] = end; // TR
7076 vertices[index + 3] = new Vector3(end.x, start.y, 0); // BR
7077 #endregion
7078
7079 // UNDERLINE UV0
7080 #region HANDLE UV0
7081 Vector2[] uvs0 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].uvs0;
7082
7083 int atlasWidth = m_Underline.fontAsset.atlasWidth;
7084 int atlasHeight = m_Underline.fontAsset.atlasHeight;
7085 GlyphRect glyphRect = m_Underline.character.glyph.glyphRect;
7086
7087 // Calculate UV
7088 Vector2 uv0 = new Vector2(((float)glyphRect.x + glyphRect.width / 2) / atlasWidth, (glyphRect.y + (float)glyphRect.height / 2) / atlasHeight); // bottom left
7089
7090 // UVs for the Quad
7091 uvs0[0 + index] = uv0; // BL
7092 uvs0[1 + index] = uv0; // TL
7093 uvs0[2 + index] = uv0; // TR
7094 uvs0[3 + index] = uv0; // BR
7095 #endregion
7096
7097 // HIGHLIGHT UV2
7098 #region HANDLE UV2 - SDF SCALE
7099 Vector2[] uvs2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].uvs2;
7100 Vector2 customUV = new Vector2(0, 1);
7101 uvs2[0 + index] = customUV;
7102 uvs2[1 + index] = customUV;
7103 uvs2[2 + index] = customUV;
7104 uvs2[3 + index] = customUV;
7105 #endregion
7106
7107 // HIGHLIGHT VERTEX COLORS
7108 #region
7109 // Alpha is the lower of the vertex color or tag color alpha used.
7110 highlightColor.a = m_fontColor32.a < highlightColor.a ? m_fontColor32.a : highlightColor.a;
7111
7112 Color32[] colors32 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].colors32;
7113 colors32[0 + index] = highlightColor;
7114 colors32[1 + index] = highlightColor;
7115 colors32[2 + index] = highlightColor;
7116 colors32[3 + index] = highlightColor;
7117 #endregion
7118
7119 index += 4;
7120 }
TMPro.TMP_FontAsset.atlasWidth
int atlasWidth
The width of the atlas texture(s) used by this font asset.
Definition: TMP_FontAsset.cs:274
TMPro.TMP_FontAsset.atlasHeight
int atlasHeight
The height of the atlas texture(s) used by this font asset.

void ResizeMeshInfo(int size)
Function to resized the content of MeshData and re-assign normals, tangents and triangles.

◆ DrawUnderlineMesh()

virtual void TMPro.TMP_Text.DrawUnderlineMesh ( Vector3  start,
Vector3  end,
ref int  index,
float  startScale,
float  endScale,
float  maxScale,
float  sdfScale,
Color32  underlineColor 
)
protectedvirtualinherited

Method to add the underline geometry.

Parameters
start
end
startScale
endScale
maxScale
underlineColor
6883 {
6884 // Get Underline special character from the primary font asset.
6885 GetUnderlineSpecialCharacter(m_fontAsset);
6886
6887 if (m_Underline.character == null)
6888 {
6889 if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
6890 Debug.LogWarning("Unable to add underline since the primary Font Asset doesn't contain the underline character.", this);
6891
6892 return;
6893 }
6894
6895 int underlineMaterialIndex = m_Underline.materialIndex;
6896
6897 int verticesCount = index + 12;
6898
6899 // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
6900 if (verticesCount > m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].vertices.Length)
6901 {
6902 // Resize Mesh Buffers
6903 m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].ResizeMeshInfo(verticesCount / 4);
6904 }
6905
6906 // Adjust the position of the underline based on the lowest character. This matters for subscript character.
6907 start.y = Mathf.Min(start.y, end.y);
6908 end.y = Mathf.Min(start.y, end.y);
6909
6910 GlyphMetrics underlineGlyphMetrics = m_Underline.character.glyph.metrics;
6911 GlyphRect underlineGlyphRect = m_Underline.character.glyph.glyphRect;
6912
6913 float segmentWidth = underlineGlyphMetrics.width / 2 * maxScale;
6914
6915 if (end.x - start.x < underlineGlyphMetrics.width * maxScale)
6916 {
6917 segmentWidth = (end.x - start.x) / 2f;
6918 }
6919
6920 float startPadding = m_padding * startScale / maxScale;
6921 float endPadding = m_padding * endScale / maxScale;
6922
6923 float underlineThickness = m_Underline.fontAsset.faceInfo.underlineThickness;
6924
6925 // UNDERLINE VERTICES FOR (3) LINE SEGMENTS
6926 #region UNDERLINE VERTICES
6927 Vector3[] vertices = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].vertices;
6928
6929 // Front Part of the Underline
6930 vertices[index + 0] = start + new Vector3(0, 0 - (underlineThickness + m_padding) * maxScale, 0); // BL
6931 vertices[index + 1] = start + new Vector3(0, m_padding * maxScale, 0); // TL
6932 vertices[index + 2] = vertices[index + 1] + new Vector3(segmentWidth, 0, 0); // TR
6933 vertices[index + 3] = vertices[index + 0] + new Vector3(segmentWidth, 0, 0); // BR
6934
6935 // Middle Part of the Underline
6936 vertices[index + 4] = vertices[index + 3]; // BL
6937 vertices[index + 5] = vertices[index + 2]; // TL
6938 vertices[index + 6] = end + new Vector3(-segmentWidth, m_padding * maxScale, 0); // TR
6939 vertices[index + 7] = end + new Vector3(-segmentWidth, -(underlineThickness + m_padding) * maxScale, 0); // BR
6940
6941 // End Part of the Underline
6942 vertices[index + 8] = vertices[index + 7]; // BL
6943 vertices[index + 9] = vertices[index + 6]; // TL
6944 vertices[index + 10] = end + new Vector3(0, m_padding * maxScale, 0); // TR
6945 vertices[index + 11] = end + new Vector3(0, -(underlineThickness + m_padding) * maxScale, 0); // BR
6946 #endregion
6947
6948 // UNDERLINE UV0
6949 #region HANDLE UV0
6950 Vector2[] uvs0 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].uvs0;
6951
6952 int atlasWidth = m_Underline.fontAsset.atlasWidth;
6953 int atlasHeight = m_Underline.fontAsset.atlasHeight;
6954
6955 // Calculate UV required to setup the 3 Quads for the Underline.
6956 Vector2 uv0 = new Vector2((underlineGlyphRect.x - startPadding) / atlasWidth, (underlineGlyphRect.y - m_padding) / atlasHeight); // bottom left
6957 Vector2 uv1 = new Vector2(uv0.x, (underlineGlyphRect.y + underlineGlyphRect.height + m_padding) / atlasHeight); // top left
6958 Vector2 uv2 = new Vector2((underlineGlyphRect.x - startPadding + (float)underlineGlyphRect.width / 2) / atlasWidth, uv1.y); // Mid Top Left
6959 Vector2 uv3 = new Vector2(uv2.x, uv0.y); // Mid Bottom Left
6960 Vector2 uv4 = new Vector2((underlineGlyphRect.x + endPadding + (float)underlineGlyphRect.width / 2) / atlasWidth, uv1.y); // Mid Top Right
6961 Vector2 uv5 = new Vector2(uv4.x, uv0.y); // Mid Bottom right
6962 Vector2 uv6 = new Vector2((underlineGlyphRect.x + endPadding + underlineGlyphRect.width) / atlasWidth, uv1.y); // End Part - Bottom Right
6963 Vector2 uv7 = new Vector2(uv6.x, uv0.y); // End Part - Top Right
6964
6965 // Left Part of the Underline
6966 uvs0[0 + index] = uv0; // BL
6967 uvs0[1 + index] = uv1; // TL
6968 uvs0[2 + index] = uv2; // TR
6969 uvs0[3 + index] = uv3; // BR
6970
6971 // Middle Part of the Underline
6972 uvs0[4 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x - uv2.x * 0.001f, uv0.y);
6973 uvs0[5 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x - uv2.x * 0.001f, uv1.y);
6974 uvs0[6 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x + uv2.x * 0.001f, uv1.y);
6975 uvs0[7 + index] = new Vector2(uv2.x + uv2.x * 0.001f, uv0.y);
6976
6977 // Right Part of the Underline
6978 uvs0[8 + index] = uv5;
6979 uvs0[9 + index] = uv4;
6980 uvs0[10 + index] = uv6;
6981 uvs0[11 + index] = uv7;
6982 #endregion
6983
6984 // UNDERLINE UV2
6985 #region HANDLE UV2 - SDF SCALE
6986 // UV1 contains Face / Border UV layout.
6987 float min_UvX = 0;
6988 float max_UvX = (vertices[index + 2].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
6989
6990 //Calculate the xScale or how much the UV's are getting stretched on the X axis for the middle section of the underline.
6991 float xScale = Mathf.Abs(sdfScale);
6992
6993 Vector2[] uvs2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].uvs2;
6994
6995 uvs2[0 + index] = PackUV(0, 0, xScale);
6996 uvs2[1 + index] = PackUV(0, 1, xScale);
6997 uvs2[2 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 1, xScale);
6998 uvs2[3 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 0, xScale);
6999
7000 min_UvX = (vertices[index + 4].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
7001 max_UvX = (vertices[index + 6].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
7002
7003 uvs2[4 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 0, xScale);
7004 uvs2[5 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 1, xScale);
7005 uvs2[6 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 1, xScale);
7006 uvs2[7 + index] = PackUV(max_UvX, 0, xScale);
7007
7008 min_UvX = (vertices[index + 8].x - start.x) / (end.x - start.x);
7009
7010 uvs2[8 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 0, xScale);
7011 uvs2[9 + index] = PackUV(min_UvX, 1, xScale);
7012 uvs2[10 + index] = PackUV(1, 1, xScale);
7013 uvs2[11 + index] = PackUV(1, 0, xScale);
7014 #endregion
7015
7016 // UNDERLINE VERTEX COLORS
7017 #region UNDERLINE VERTEX COLORS
7018 // Alpha is the lower of the vertex color or tag color alpha used.
7019 underlineColor.a = m_fontColor32.a < underlineColor.a ? m_fontColor32.a : underlineColor.a;
7020
7021 Color32[] colors32 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[underlineMaterialIndex].colors32;
7022 colors32[0 + index] = underlineColor;
7023 colors32[1 + index] = underlineColor;
7024 colors32[2 + index] = underlineColor;
7025 colors32[3 + index] = underlineColor;
7026
7027 colors32[4 + index] = underlineColor;
7028 colors32[5 + index] = underlineColor;
7029 colors32[6 + index] = underlineColor;
7030 colors32[7 + index] = underlineColor;
7031
7032 colors32[8 + index] = underlineColor;
7033 colors32[9 + index] = underlineColor;
7034 colors32[10 + index] = underlineColor;
7035 colors32[11 + index] = underlineColor;
7036 #endregion
7037
7038 index += 12;
7039 }
TMPro.TMP_Text.PackUV
Vector2 PackUV(float x, float y, float scale)
Function to pack scale information in the UV2 Channel.
Definition: TMP_Text.cs:7523

◆ EnableMasking()

void TMPro.TextMeshPro.EnableMasking ( )
private
584 {
585 if (m_sharedMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_ClipRect))
586 {
587 m_sharedMaterial.EnableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_SOFT);
588 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_HARD);
589 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_TEX);
590
591 m_isMaskingEnabled = true;
592 UpdateMask();
593 }
594 }

)

Store vertex attributes into the appropriate TMP_MeshInfo.

index_X4
6685 {
6686 int materialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].materialReferenceIndex;
6687 index_X4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount;
6688
6689 // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
6690 if (index_X4 >= m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices.Length)
6691 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].ResizeMeshInfo(Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo((index_X4 + 4) / 4));
6692
6693
6694 TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfoArray = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
6695 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertexIndex = index_X4;
6696
6697 // Setup Vertices for Characters
6698 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position;
6699 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position;
6700 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position;

6707 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
6708 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
6709
6710
6711 // Setup UVS2

6715 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
6716

◆ FillCharacterVertexBuffers() [2/2]

virtual void TMPro.TMP_Text.FillCharacterVertexBuffers ( int  i,
int  index_X4,
bool  isVolumetric 
)
protectedvirtualinherited
6736 {
6737 int materialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].materialReferenceIndex;
6738 index_X4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount;
6739
6740 // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
6741 if (index_X4 >= m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices.Length)
6742 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].ResizeMeshInfo(Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo((index_X4 + (isVolumetric ? 8 : 4)) / 4));
6743
6744 TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfoArray = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
6745 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertexIndex = index_X4;
6746
6747 // Setup Vertices for Characters
6748 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position;
6749 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position;
6750 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position;
6751 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position;
6752
6753 if (isVolumetric)
6754 {
6755 Vector3 depth = new Vector3(0, 0, m_fontSize * m_fontScale);
6756 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[4 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position + depth;
6757 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[5 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position + depth;
6758 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[6 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position + depth;
6759 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[7 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position + depth;
6760 }
6761
6762 // Setup UVS0
6763 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
6764 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
6765 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
6766 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
6767
6768 if (isVolumetric)
6769 {
6770 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[4 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
6771 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[5 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
6772 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[6 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
6773 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[7 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
6774 }
6775
6776
6777 // Setup UVS2
6778 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
6779 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
6780 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
6781 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
6782
6783 if (isVolumetric)
6784 {
6785 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[4 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
6786 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[5 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
6787 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[6 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
6788 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[7 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;

6791
6792 // Setup UVS4
6793 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv4;
6794 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv4;

6798
6799 // setup Vertex Colors
6800 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
6801 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
6802 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
6803 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
6804
6805 if (isVolumetric)
6806 {
6807 Color32 backColor = new Color32(255, 255, 128, 255);
6808 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[4 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
6809 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[5 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
6810 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[6 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
6811 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[7 + index_X4] = backColor; //characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
6812 }
6813
6814 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount = index_X4 + (!isVolumetric ? 4 : 8);
6815 }

◆ FillSpriteVertexBuffers()

virtual void TMPro.TMP_Text.FillSpriteVertexBuffers ( int  i,
int  index_X4 
)
protectedvirtualinherited

Fill Vertex Buffers for Sprites

Parameters
i
spriteIndex_X4
6824 {
6825 int materialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].materialReferenceIndex;
6826 index_X4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount;
6827
6828 // Check to make sure our current mesh buffer allocations can hold these new Quads.
6829 if (index_X4 >= m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices.Length)
6830 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].ResizeMeshInfo(Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo((index_X4 + 4) / 4));
6831
6832 TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfoArray = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
6833 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].vertexIndex = index_X4;
6834
6835 // Setup Vertices for Characters
6836 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.position;
6837 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.position;
6838 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.position;
6839 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertices[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.position;
6840
6841
6842 // Setup UVS0
6843 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv;
6844 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv;
6845 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv;
6846 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs0[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv;
6847
6848
6849 // Setup UVS2
6850 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv2;
6851 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv2;
6852 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv2;
6853 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].uvs2[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv2;
6854
6855
6856 // Setup UVS4
6857 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.uv4;
6858 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.uv4;
6859 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.uv4;
6860 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.uv4;
6861
6862
6863 // setup Vertex Colors
6864 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[0 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BL.color;
6865 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[1 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TL.color;
6866 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[2 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_TR.color;
6867 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].colors32[3 + index_X4] = characterInfoArray[i].vertex_BR.color;
6868
6869 m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex].vertexCount = index_X4 + 4;
6870 }

◆ ForceMeshUpdate()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.ForceMeshUpdate ( bool  ignoreActiveState = false,
bool  forceTextReparsing = false 
)
virtual

Function to force regeneration of the text object before its normal process time. This is useful when changes to the text object properties need to be applied immediately.

Parameters
ignoreActiveStateIgnore Active State of text objects. Inactive objects are ignored by default.
forceTextReparsingForce re-parsing of the text.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

328 {
329 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
330 m_ignoreActiveState = ignoreActiveState;
331 m_isInputParsingRequired = m_isInputParsingRequired ? true : forceTextReparsing;
332 OnPreRenderObject();
333 }
TMPro.TextMeshPro.OnPreRenderObject
void OnPreRenderObject()
Function called when the text needs to be updated.
Definition: TMPro_Private.cs:1487

◆ GenerateTextMesh()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.GenerateTextMesh ( )
protectedvirtual

This is the main function that is responsible for creating / displaying the text.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

1570 {
1571 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1572 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP GenerateText()");
1573 //Debug.Log("***** GenerateTextMesh() called on object ID " + GetInstanceID() + ". *****"); // ***** Frame: " + Time.frameCount); // + ". Point Size: " + m_fontSize + ". Margins are (W) " + m_marginWidth + " (H) " + m_marginHeight); // ". Iteration Count: " + loopCountA + ". Min: " + m_minFontSize + " Max: " + m_maxFontSize + " Delta: " + (m_maxFontSize - m_minFontSize) + " Font size is " + m_fontSize); //called for Object with ID " + GetInstanceID()); // Assigned Material is " + m_uiRenderer.GetMaterial().name); // IncludeForMasking " + this.m_IncludeForMasking); // and text is " + m_text);
1574 #endif
1575
1576 // Early exit if no font asset was assigned. This should not be needed since LiberationSans SDF will be assigned by default.
1577 if (m_fontAsset == null || m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
1578 {
1579 Debug.LogWarning("Can't Generate Mesh! No Font Asset has been assigned to Object ID: " + this.GetInstanceID());
1580 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = true;
1581 return;
1582 }
1583
1584 // Clear TextInfo
1585 if (m_textInfo != null)
1586 m_textInfo.Clear();
1587
1588 // Early exit if we don't have any Text to generate.
1589 if (m_InternalParsingBuffer == null || m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length == 0 || m_InternalParsingBuffer[0].unicode == 0)
1590 {
1591 // Clear mesh and upload changes to the mesh.
1592 ClearMesh(true);
1593
1594 m_preferredWidth = 0;
1595 m_preferredHeight = 0;
1596

1598 TMPro_EventManager.ON_TEXT_CHANGED(this);
1599 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = true;
1600 return;
1601 }
1602
1603 m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;
1604 m_currentMaterial = m_sharedMaterial;
1605 m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
1606 m_materialReferenceStack.SetDefault(new MaterialReference(m_currentMaterialIndex, m_currentFontAsset, null, m_currentMaterial, m_padding));
1607
1608 m_currentSpriteAsset = m_spriteAsset;
1609
1610 // Stop all Sprite Animations
1611 if (m_spriteAnimator != null)
1612 m_spriteAnimator.StopAllAnimations();
1613
1614 // Total character count is computed when the text is parsed.
1615 int totalCharacterCount = m_totalCharacterCount;
1616
1617 // Calculate the scale of the font based on selected font size and sampling point size.
1618 // baseScale is calculated using the font asset assigned to the text object.
1619 float baseScale = m_fontScale = (m_fontSize / m_fontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_fontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
1620 float currentElementScale = baseScale;
1621 float currentEmScale = m_fontSize * 0.01f * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
1622 m_fontScaleMultiplier = 1;
1623
1624 m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize;
1625 m_sizeStack.SetDefault(m_currentFontSize);
1626 float fontSizeDelta = 0;
1627
1628 int charCode = 0; // Holds the character code of the currently being processed character.
1629
1630 m_FontStyleInternal = m_fontStyle; // Set the default style.
1631 m_FontWeightInternal = (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold ? FontWeight.Bold : m_fontWeight;
1632 m_FontWeightStack.SetDefault(m_FontWeightInternal);
1633 m_fontStyleStack.Clear();
1634
1635 m_lineJustification = m_HorizontalAlignment; // m_textAlignment; // Sets the line justification mode to match editor alignment.
1636 m_lineJustificationStack.SetDefault(m_lineJustification);
1637
1638 float padding = 0;
1639 float style_padding = 0; // Extra padding required to accommodate Bold style.
1640 float boldSpacingAdjustment = 0;
1641 //float bold_xAdvance_multiplier = 1; // Used to increase spacing between character when style is bold.
1642

1671
1672 m_colorGradientPreset = null;

1674

1677

1680

1682 m_actionStack.Clear();
1683
1684 m_isFXMatrixSet = false;
1685
1686 m_lineOffset = 0; // Amount of space between lines (font line spacing + m_linespacing).
1687 m_lineHeight = TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET;
1688 float lineGap = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.lineHeight - (m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.ascentLine - m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.descentLine);
1689
1690 m_cSpacing = 0; // Amount of space added between characters as a result of the use of the <cspace> tag.
1691 m_monoSpacing = 0;
1692 m_xAdvance = 0; // Used to track the position of each character.
1693
1694 tag_LineIndent = 0; // Used for indentation of text.
1695 tag_Indent = 0;
1696 m_indentStack.SetDefault(0);
1697 tag_NoParsing = false;
1698 //m_isIgnoringAlignment = false;
1699
1700 m_characterCount = 0; // Total characters in the char[]
1701
1702 // Tracking of line information
1703 m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_firstVisibleCharacter;
1704 m_lastCharacterOfLine = 0;
1705 m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = 0;
1706 m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = 0;
1707 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
1708 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
1709 m_lineNumber = 0;
1710 m_startOfLineAscender = 0;
1711 m_startOfLineDescender = 0;
1712 m_lineVisibleCharacterCount = 0;
1713 bool isStartOfNewLine = true;
1714 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = false;
1715 m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex = -1;
1716
1717 m_pageNumber = 0;
1718 int pageToDisplay = Mathf.Clamp(m_pageToDisplay - 1, 0, m_textInfo.pageInfo.Length - 1);
1719 m_textInfo.ClearPageInfo();
1720
1721 Vector4 margins = m_margin;
1722 float marginWidth = m_marginWidth > 0 ? m_marginWidth : 0;
1723 float marginHeight = m_marginHeight > 0 ? m_marginHeight : 0;
1724 m_marginLeft = 0;
1725 m_marginRight = 0;
1726 m_width = -1;
1727 float widthOfTextArea = marginWidth + 0.0001f - m_marginLeft - m_marginRight;
1728
1729 // Need to initialize these Extents structures
1730 m_meshExtents.min = k_LargePositiveVector2;
1731 m_meshExtents.max = k_LargeNegativeVector2;
1732
1733 // Initialize lineInfo
1734 m_textInfo.ClearLineInfo();
1735
1736 // Tracking of the highest Ascender
1737 m_maxCapHeight = 0;
1738 m_maxTextAscender = 0;
1739 m_ElementDescender = 0;
1740 m_PageAscender = 0;
1741 float maxVisibleDescender = 0;
1742 bool isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = false;
1743 m_isNewPage = false;
1744
1745 // Initialize struct to track states of word wrapping
1746 bool isFirstWordOfLine = true;
1747 m_isNonBreakingSpace = false;
1748 bool ignoreNonBreakingSpace = false;
1749 //bool isLastCharacterCJK = false;
1750 int lastSoftLineBreak = 0;
1751
1752 CharacterSubstitution characterToSubstitute = new CharacterSubstitution(-1, 0);
1753 bool isSoftHyphenIgnored = false;
1754 bool isInjectingCharacter = false;
1755
1756 // Save character and line state before we begin layout.
1757 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, -1, -1);
1758 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState, -1, -1);
1759 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedEllipsisState, -1, -1);
1760 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLastValidState, -1, -1);
1761 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedSoftLineBreakState, -1, -1);
1762
1763 m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Clear();
1764
1765 // Safety Tracker
1766 int restoreCount = 0;
1767
1768 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1769 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP GenerateText() - Phase I");
1770 #endif
1771
1772 // Parse through Character buffer to read HTML tags and begin creating mesh.
1773 for (int i = 0; i < m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length && m_InternalParsingBuffer[i].unicode != 0; i++)
1774 {
1775 charCode = m_InternalParsingBuffer[i].unicode;
