1776
1777 if (restoreCount > 5)
1778 {
1779 Debug.LogError("Line breaking recursion max threshold hit... Character [" + charCode + "] index: " + i);
1780 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount;
1781 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
1782 }
1783
1784 // Parse Rich Text Tag
1785 #region Parse Rich Text Tag
1786 if (m_isRichText && charCode == 60) // '<'
1787 {
1788 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1789 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Parse Rich Text Tags");
1790 #endif
1791
1792 m_isParsingText = true;
1793 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1794 int endTagIndex;
1795
1796 // Check if Tag is valid. If valid, skip to the end of the validated tag.
1797 if (ValidateHtmlTag(m_InternalParsingBuffer, i + 1, out endTagIndex))
1798 {
1799 i = endTagIndex;
1800
1801 // Continue to next character or handle the sprite element
1802 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1803 {
1804 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1805 Profiler.EndSample();
1806 #endif
1807
1808 continue;
1809 }
1810 }
1811
1812 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1813 Profiler.EndSample();
1814 #endif
1815 }
1816 else
1817 {
1818 m_textElementType = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType;
1819 m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
1820 m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
1821 }
1822 #endregion End Parse Rich Text Tag
1823
1824 int previousMaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1825 bool isUsingAltTypeface = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isUsingAlternateTypeface;
1826
1827 m_isParsingText = false;
1828
1829 // Handle potential character substitutions
1830 #region Character Substitutions
1831 isInjectingCharacter = false;
1832
1833 if (characterToSubstitute.index == m_characterCount)
1834 {
1835 charCode = (int)characterToSubstitute.unicode;
1836 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1837 isInjectingCharacter = true;
1838
1839 switch (charCode)
1840 {
1841 case 0x03:
1842 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement = m_currentFontAsset.characterLookupTable[0x03];
1843 m_isTextTruncated = true;
1844 break;
1845 case 0x2D:
1846 //
1847 break;
1848 case 0x2026:
1849 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement = m_Ellipsis.character;
1850 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1851 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset = m_Ellipsis.fontAsset;
1852 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].material = m_Ellipsis.material;
1853 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_Ellipsis.materialIndex;
1854
1855 // Indicates the source parsing data has been modified.
1856 m_isTextTruncated = true;
1857
1858 // End Of Text
1859 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount + 1;
1860 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
1861 break;
1862 }
1863 }
1864 #endregion
1865
1866
1867 // When using Linked text, mark character as ignored and skip to next character.
1868 #region Linked Text
1869 if (m_characterCount < m_firstVisibleCharacter && charCode != 0x03)
1870 {
1871 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
1872 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)0x200B;
1873 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].lineNumber = 0;
1874 m_characterCount += 1;
1875 continue;
1876 }
1877 #endregion
1878
1879
1880 // Handle Font Styles like LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps.
1881 #region Handling of LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps Font Styles
1882
1883 float smallCapsMultiplier = 1.0f;
1884
1885 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1886 {
1887 if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase)
1888 {
1889 // If this character is lowercase, switch to uppercase.
1890 if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
1891 charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
1892
1893 }
1894 else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase)
1895 {
1896 // If this character is uppercase, switch to lowercase.
1897 if (char.IsUpper((char)charCode))
1898 charCode = char.ToLower((char)charCode);
1899 }
1900 else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps)
1901 {
1902 if (char.IsLower((char)charCode))
1903 {
1904 smallCapsMultiplier = 0.8f;
1905 charCode = char.ToUpper((char)charCode);
1906 }
1907 }
1908 }
1909 #endregion
1910
1911
1912 // Look up Character Data from Dictionary and cache it.
1913 #region Look up Character Data
1914 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1915 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Lookup Character & Glyph Data");
1916 #endif
1917 float baselineOffset = 0;
1918 float elementAscentLine = 0;
1919 float elementDescentLine = 0;
1920 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
1921 {
1922 // If a sprite is used as a fallback then get a reference to it and set the color to white.
1923 m_currentSpriteAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset;
1924 m_spriteIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteIndex;
1925
1926 TMP_SpriteCharacter sprite = m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
1927 if (sprite == null) continue;
1928
1929 // Sprites are assigned in the E000 Private Area + sprite Index
1930 if (charCode == 60)
1931 charCode = 57344 + m_spriteIndex;
1932 else
1933 m_spriteColor = s_colorWhite;
1934
1935 // The sprite scale calculations are based on the font asset assigned to the text object.
1936 if (m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize > 0)
1937 {
1938 float spriteScale = m_currentFontSize / m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
1939 currentElementScale = sprite.m_Scale * sprite.m_Glyph.scale * spriteScale;
1940 elementAscentLine = m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.ascentLine;
1941 baselineOffset = m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.baseline * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale;
1942 elementDescentLine = m_currentSpriteAsset.m_FaceInfo.descentLine;
1943 }
1944 else
1945 {
1946 float spriteScale = m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
1947 currentElementScale = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.ascentLine / sprite.m_Glyph.metrics.height * sprite.m_Scale * sprite.m_Glyph.scale * spriteScale;
1948 float scaleDelta = spriteScale / currentElementScale;
1949 elementAscentLine = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.ascentLine * scaleDelta;
1950 baselineOffset = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.baseline * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale;
1951 elementDescentLine = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.descentLine * scaleDelta;
1952 }
1953
1954 m_cached_TextElement = sprite;
1955
1956 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
1957 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].scale = currentElementScale;
1958 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].spriteAsset = m_currentSpriteAsset;
1959 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1960 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1961
1962 m_currentMaterialIndex = previousMaterialIndex;
1963
1964 padding = 0;
1965 }
1966 else if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1967 {
1968 m_cached_TextElement = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].textElement;
1969 if (m_cached_TextElement == null) continue;
1970
1971 m_currentFontAsset = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].fontAsset;
1972 m_currentMaterial = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].material;
1973 m_currentMaterialIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].materialReferenceIndex;
1974
1975 // Special handling if replaced character was a line feed where in this case we have to use the scale of the previous character.
1976 float adjustedScale;
1977 if (isInjectingCharacter && m_InternalParsingBuffer[i].unicode == 0x0A && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine)
1978 adjustedScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].pointSize * smallCapsMultiplier / m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
1979 else
1980 adjustedScale = m_currentFontSize * smallCapsMultiplier / m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
1981
1982 elementAscentLine = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.ascentLine;
1983 elementDescentLine = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.descentLine;
1984
1985 currentElementScale = adjustedScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_cached_TextElement.m_Scale * m_cached_TextElement.m_Glyph.scale;
1986 baselineOffset = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.baseline * adjustedScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale;
1987
1988 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1989 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].scale = currentElementScale;
1990
1991 padding = m_currentMaterialIndex == 0 ? m_padding : m_subTextObjects[m_currentMaterialIndex].padding;
1992 }
1993 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1994 Profiler.EndSample();
1995 #endif
1996 #endregion
1997
1998
1999 // Handle Soft Hyphen
2000 #region Handle Soft Hyphen
2001 float currentElementUnmodifiedScale = currentElementScale;
2002 if (charCode == 0xAD || charCode == 0x03)
2003 currentElementScale = 0;
2004 #endregion
2005
2006
2007 // Store some of the text object's information
2008 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].character = (char)charCode;
2009 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].pointSize = m_currentFontSize;
2010 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].color = m_htmlColor;
2011 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].underlineColor = m_underlineColor;
2012 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].strikethroughColor = m_strikethroughColor;
2013 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].highlightState = m_HighlightStateStack.current;
2014 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].style = m_FontStyleInternal;
2015
2016 // Cache glyph metrics
2017 GlyphMetrics currentGlyphMetrics = m_cached_TextElement.m_Glyph.metrics;
2018
2019 // Optimization to avoid calling this more than once per character.
2020 bool isWhiteSpace = char.IsWhiteSpace((char)charCode);
2021 //bool isVisibleCharacter = !isWhiteSpace;
2022
2023 // Handle Kerning if Enabled.
2024 #region Handle Kerning
2025 TMP_GlyphValueRecord glyphAdjustments = new TMP_GlyphValueRecord();
2026 float characterSpacingAdjustment = m_characterSpacing;
2027 m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment = 0;
2028 if (m_enableKerning)
2029 {
2030 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2031 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle Glyph Positional Adjustments");
2032 #endif
2033
2034 TMP_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecord adjustmentPair;
2035 uint baseGlyphIndex = m_cached_TextElement.m_GlyphIndex;
2036
2037 if (m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1)
2038 {
2039 uint nextGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].textElement.m_GlyphIndex;
2040 uint key = nextGlyphIndex << 16 | baseGlyphIndex;
2041
2042 if (m_currentFontAsset.m_FontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out adjustmentPair))
2043 {
2044 glyphAdjustments = adjustmentPair.m_FirstAdjustmentRecord.m_GlyphValueRecord;
2045 characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.m_FeatureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
2046 }
2047 }
2048
2049 if (m_characterCount >= 1)
2050 {
2051 uint previousGlyphIndex = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].textElement.m_GlyphIndex;
2052 uint key = baseGlyphIndex << 16 | previousGlyphIndex;
2053
2054 if (m_currentFontAsset.m_FontFeatureTable.m_GlyphPairAdjustmentRecordLookupDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out adjustmentPair))
2055 {
2056 glyphAdjustments += adjustmentPair.m_SecondAdjustmentRecord.m_GlyphValueRecord;
2057 characterSpacingAdjustment = (adjustmentPair.m_FeatureLookupFlags & FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments) == FontFeatureLookupFlags.IgnoreSpacingAdjustments ? 0 : characterSpacingAdjustment;
2058 }
2059 }
2060
2061 m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment = glyphAdjustments.m_XAdvance;
2062
2063 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2064 Profiler.EndSample();
2065 #endif
2066 }
2067 #endregion
2068
2069
2070 // Initial Implementation for RTL support.
2071 #region Handle Right-to-Left
2072 if (m_isRightToLeft)
2073 {
2074 m_xAdvance -= currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalAdvance * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta) * currentElementScale;
2075
2076 if (isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B)
2077 m_xAdvance -= m_wordSpacing * currentEmScale;
2078 }
2079 #endregion
2080
2081
2082 // Handle Mono Spacing
2083 #region Handle Mono Spacing
2084 float monoAdvance = 0;
2085 if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
2086 {
2087 monoAdvance = (m_monoSpacing / 2 - (currentGlyphMetrics.width / 2 + currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalBearingX) * currentElementScale) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
2088 m_xAdvance += monoAdvance;
2089 }
2090 #endregion
2091
2092
2093 // Set Padding based on selected font style
2094 #region Handle Style Padding
2095 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character && !isUsingAltTypeface && ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold)) // Checks for any combination of Bold Style.
2096 {
2097 if (m_currentMaterial != null && m_currentMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale))
2098 {
2099 float gradientScale = m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale);
2100 style_padding = m_currentFontAsset.boldStyle / 4.0f * gradientScale * m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_ScaleRatio_A);
2101
2102 // Clamp overall padding to Gradient Scale size.
2103 if (style_padding + padding > gradientScale)
2104 padding = gradientScale - style_padding;
2105 }
2106 else
2107 style_padding = 0;
2108
2109 boldSpacingAdjustment = m_currentFontAsset.boldSpacing;
2110 }
2111 else
2112 {
2113 if (m_currentMaterial != null && m_currentMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale))
2114 {
2115 float gradientScale = m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_GradientScale);
2116 style_padding = m_currentFontAsset.normalStyle / 4.0f * gradientScale * m_currentMaterial.GetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ID_ScaleRatio_A);
2117
2118 // Clamp overall padding to Gradient Scale size.
2119 if (style_padding + padding > gradientScale)
2120 padding = gradientScale - style_padding;
2121 }
2122 else
2123 style_padding = 0;
2124
2125 boldSpacingAdjustment = 0;
2126 }
2127 #endregion Handle Style Padding
2128
2129
2130 // Determine the position of the vertices of the Character or Sprite.
2131 #region Calculate Vertices Position
2132 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2133 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Calculate Vertices Position");
2134 #endif
2135 Vector3 top_left;
2136 top_left.x = m_xAdvance + ((currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalBearingX - padding - style_padding + glyphAdjustments.m_XPlacement) * currentElementScale * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta));
2137 top_left.y = baselineOffset + (currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalBearingY + padding + glyphAdjustments.m_YPlacement) * currentElementScale - m_lineOffset + m_baselineOffset;
2138 top_left.z = 0;
2139
2140 Vector3 bottom_left;
2141 bottom_left.x = top_left.x;
2142 bottom_left.y = top_left.y - ((currentGlyphMetrics.height + padding * 2) * currentElementScale);
2143 bottom_left.z = 0;
2144
2145 Vector3 top_right;
2146 top_right.x = bottom_left.x + ((currentGlyphMetrics.width + padding * 2 + style_padding * 2) * currentElementScale * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta));
2147 top_right.y = top_left.y;
2148 top_right.z = 0;
2149
2150 Vector3 bottom_right;
2151 bottom_right.x = top_right.x;
2152 bottom_right.y = bottom_left.y;
2153 bottom_right.z = 0;
2154
2155 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2156 Profiler.EndSample();
2157 #endif
2158 #endregion
2159
2160
2161 // Check if we need to Shear the rectangles for Italic styles
2162 #region Handle Italic & Shearing
2163 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character && !isUsingAltTypeface && ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic))
2164 {
2165 // Shift Top vertices forward by half (Shear Value * height of character) and Bottom vertices back by same amount.
2166 float shear_value = m_ItalicAngle * 0.01f;
2167 Vector3 topShear = new Vector3(shear_value * ((currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalBearingY + padding + style_padding) * currentElementScale), 0, 0);
2168 Vector3 bottomShear = new Vector3(shear_value * (((currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalBearingY - currentGlyphMetrics.height - padding - style_padding)) * currentElementScale), 0, 0);
2169
2170 Vector3 shearAdjustment = new Vector3((topShear.x - bottomShear.x) / 2, 0, 0);
2171
2172 top_left = top_left + topShear - shearAdjustment;
2173 bottom_left = bottom_left + bottomShear - shearAdjustment;
2174 top_right = top_right + topShear - shearAdjustment;
2175 bottom_right = bottom_right + bottomShear - shearAdjustment;
2176 }
2177 #endregion Handle Italics & Shearing
2178
2179
2180 // Handle Character Rotation
2181 #region Handle Character Rotation
2182 if (m_isFXMatrixSet)
2183 {
2184 // Apply scale matrix when simulating Condensed text.
2185 if (m_FXMatrix.lossyScale.x != 1)
2186 {
2187 //top_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_left);
2188 //bottom_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_left);
2189 //top_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_right);
2190 //bottom_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_right);
2191 }
2192
2193 Vector3 positionOffset = (top_right + bottom_left) / 2;
2194
2195 top_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_left - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2196 bottom_left = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_left - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2197 top_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(top_right - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2198 bottom_right = m_FXMatrix.MultiplyPoint3x4(bottom_right - positionOffset) + positionOffset;
2199 }
2200 #endregion
2201
2202
2203 // Store vertex information for the character or sprite.
2204 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft = bottom_left;
2205 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topLeft = top_left;
2206 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight = top_right;
2207 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomRight = bottom_right;
2208
2209 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].origin = m_xAdvance;
2210 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine = baselineOffset - m_lineOffset + m_baselineOffset;
2211 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].aspectRatio = (top_right.x - bottom_left.x) / (top_left.y - bottom_left.y);
2212
2213
2214 // Compute text metrics
2215 #region Compute Ascender & Descender values
2216 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2217 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Compute Text Metrics");
2218 #endif
2219 // Element Ascender in line space
2220 float elementAscender = m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character
2221 ? elementAscentLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier + m_baselineOffset
2222 : elementAscentLine * currentElementScale + m_baselineOffset;
2223
2224 // Element Descender in line space
2225 float elementDescender = m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character
2226 ? elementDescentLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier + m_baselineOffset
2227 : elementDescentLine * currentElementScale + m_baselineOffset;
2228
2229 float adjustedAscender = elementAscender;
2230 float adjustedDescender = elementDescender;
2231
2232 bool isFirstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount == m_firstCharacterOfLine;
2233 // Max line ascender and descender in line space
2234 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
2235 {
2236 // Special handling for Superscript and Subscript where we use the unadjusted line ascender and descender
2237 if (m_baselineOffset != 0)
2238 {
2239 adjustedAscender = Mathf.Max((elementAscender - m_baselineOffset) / m_fontScaleMultiplier, adjustedAscender);
2240 adjustedDescender = Mathf.Min((elementDescender - m_baselineOffset) / m_fontScaleMultiplier, adjustedDescender);
2241 }
2242
2243 m_maxLineAscender = Mathf.Max(adjustedAscender, m_maxLineAscender);
2244 m_maxLineDescender = Mathf.Min(adjustedDescender, m_maxLineDescender);
2245 }
2246
2247 // Element Ascender and Descender in object space
2248 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
2249 {
2250 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender = adjustedAscender;
2251 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedDescender = adjustedDescender;
2252
2253 m_ElementAscender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender = elementAscender - m_lineOffset;
2254 m_ElementDescender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].descender = elementDescender - m_lineOffset;
2255 }
2256 else
2257 {
2258 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
2259 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedDescender = m_maxLineDescender;
2260
2261 m_ElementAscender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].ascender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
2262 m_ElementDescender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].descender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
2263 }
2264
2265 // Max text object ascender and cap height
2266 if (m_lineNumber == 0 || m_isNewPage)
2267 {
2268 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
2269 {
2270 m_maxTextAscender = m_maxLineAscender;
2271 m_maxCapHeight = Mathf.Max(m_maxCapHeight, m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.capLine * currentElementScale / smallCapsMultiplier);
2272 }
2273 }
2274
2275 // Page ascender
2276 if (m_lineOffset == 0)
2277 {
2278 if (isFirstCharacterOfLine || isWhiteSpace == false)
2279 m_PageAscender = m_PageAscender > elementAscender ? m_PageAscender : elementAscender;
2280 }
2281 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2282 Profiler.EndSample();
2283 #endif
2284 #endregion
2285
2286
2287 // Set Characters to not visible by default.
2288 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2289
2290 bool isJustifiedOrFlush = (m_lineJustification & HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush) == HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush || (m_lineJustification & HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified) == HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified;
2291
2292 // Setup Mesh for visible text elements. ie. not a SPACE / LINEFEED / CARRIAGE RETURN.
2293 #region Handle Visible Characters
2294 if (charCode == 9 || (isWhiteSpace == false && charCode != 0x200B && charCode != 0xAD && charCode != 0x03) || (charCode == 0xAD && isSoftHyphenIgnored == false) || m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
2295 {
2296 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2297 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle Visible Character");
2298 #endif
2299
2300 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = true;
2301
2302 #region Experimental Margin Shaper
2303 //Vector2 shapedMargins;
2304 //if (marginShaper)
2305 //{
2306 // shapedMargins = m_marginShaper.GetShapedMargins(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].baseLine);
2307 // if (shapedMargins.x < margins.x)
2308 // {
2309 // shapedMargins.x = m_marginLeft;
2310 // }
2311 // else
2312 // {
2313 // shapedMargins.x += m_marginLeft - margins.x;
2314 // }
2315 // if (shapedMargins.y < margins.z)
2316 // {
2317 // shapedMargins.y = m_marginRight;
2318 // }
2319 // else
2320 // {
2321 // shapedMargins.y += m_marginRight - margins.z;
2322 // }
2323 //}
2324 //else
2325 //{
2326 // shapedMargins.x = m_marginLeft;
2327 // shapedMargins.y = m_marginRight;
2328 //}
2329 //width = marginWidth + 0.0001f - shapedMargins.x - shapedMargins.y;
2330 //if (m_width != -1 && m_width < width)
2331 //{
2332 // width = m_width;
2333 //}
2334 //m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginLeft = shapedMargins.x;
2335 #endregion
2336
2337 float marginLeft = m_marginLeft;
2338 float marginRight = m_marginRight;
2339
2340 // Injected characters do not override margins
2341 if (isInjectingCharacter)
2342 {
2343 marginLeft = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginLeft;
2344 marginRight = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginRight;
2345 }
2346
2347 widthOfTextArea = m_width != -1 ? Mathf.Min(marginWidth + 0.0001f - marginLeft - marginRight, m_width) : marginWidth + 0.0001f - marginLeft - marginRight;
2348
2349 // Calculate the line breaking width of the text.
2350 float textWidth = Mathf.Abs(m_xAdvance) + (!m_isRightToLeft ? currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalAdvance : 0) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta) * (charCode == 0xAD ? currentElementUnmodifiedScale : currentElementScale);
2351 float textHeight = m_maxTextAscender - (m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset) + (m_lineOffset > 0 && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false ? m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender : 0);
2352
2353 int testedCharacterCount = m_characterCount;
2354
2355 // Handling of current line Vertical Bounds
2356 #region Current Line Vertical Bounds Check
2357 if (textHeight > marginHeight + 0.0001f)
2358 {
2359 // Set isTextOverflowing and firstOverflowCharacterIndex
2360 if (m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex == -1)
2361 m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
2362
2363 // Check if Auto-Size is enabled
2364 if (m_enableAutoSizing)
2365 {
2366 // Handle Line spacing adjustments
2367 #region Line Spacing Adjustments
2368 if (m_lineSpacingDelta > m_lineSpacingMax && m_lineOffset > 0 && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2369 {
2370 float adjustmentDelta = (marginHeight - textHeight) / m_lineNumber;
2371
2372 m_lineSpacingDelta = Mathf.Max(m_lineSpacingDelta + adjustmentDelta / baseScale, m_lineSpacingMax);
2373
2374 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Line Spacing. Delta of [" + m_lineSpacingDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
2375 return;
2376 }
2377 #endregion
2378
2379
2380 // Handle Text Auto-sizing resulting from text exceeding vertical bounds.
2381 #region Text Auto-Sizing (Text greater than vertical bounds)
2382 if (m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2383 {
2384 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2385
2386 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
2387 m_fontSize -= sizeDelta;
2388 m_fontSize = Mathf.Max((int)(m_fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMin);
2389
2390 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Point Size from [" + m_maxFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
2391 return;
2392 }
2393 #endregion Text Auto-Sizing
2394 }
2395
2396 // Handle Vertical Overflow on current line
2397 switch (m_overflowMode)
2398 {
2399 case TextOverflowModes.Overflow:
2400 case TextOverflowModes.ScrollRect:
2401 case TextOverflowModes.Masking:
2402 // Nothing happens as vertical bounds are ignored in this mode.
2403 break;
2404
2405 case TextOverflowModes.Truncate:
2406 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLastValidState);
2407
2408 characterToSubstitute.index = testedCharacterCount;
2409 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2410 continue;
2411
2412 case TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis:
2413 if (m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Count == 0)
2414 {
2415 i = -1;
2416 m_characterCount = 0;
2417 characterToSubstitute.index = 0;
2418 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2419 m_firstCharacterOfLine = 0;
2420 continue;
2421 }
2422
2423 var ellipsisState = m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Pop();
2424 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref ellipsisState);
2425
2426 i -= 1;
2427 m_characterCount -= 1;
2428 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount;
2429 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x2026;
2430
2431 restoreCount += 1;
2432 continue;
2433
2434 case TextOverflowModes.Linked:
2435 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLastValidState);
2436
2437 if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
2438 {
2439 m_linkedTextComponent.text = text;
2440 m_linkedTextComponent.firstVisibleCharacter = m_characterCount;
2441 m_linkedTextComponent.ForceMeshUpdate();
2442
2443 m_isTextTruncated = true;
2444 }
2445
2446 // Truncate remaining text
2447 characterToSubstitute.index = testedCharacterCount;
2448 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2449 continue;
2450
2451 case TextOverflowModes.Page:
2452 // End layout of text if first character / page doesn't fit.
2453 if (i < 0 || testedCharacterCount == 0)
2454 {
2455 i = -1;
2456 m_characterCount = 0;
2457 characterToSubstitute.index = 0;
2458 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2459 continue;
2460 }
2461 else if (m_maxLineAscender - m_maxLineDescender > marginHeight + 0.0001f)
2462 {
2463 // Current line exceeds the height of the text container
2464 // as such we stop on the previous line.
2465 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState);
2466
2467 characterToSubstitute.index = testedCharacterCount;
2468 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2469 continue;
2470 }
2471
2472 // Go back to previous line and re-layout
2473 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState);
2474
2475 m_isNewPage = true;
2476 m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2477 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
2478 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
2479 m_startOfLineAscender = 0;
2480
2481 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
2482 m_lineOffset = 0;
2483 m_maxTextAscender = 0;
2484 m_PageAscender = 0;
2485 m_lineNumber += 1;
2486 m_pageNumber += 1;
2487
2488 // Should consider saving page data here
2489 continue;
2490 }
2491 }
2492 #endregion
2493
2494
2495 // Handling of Horizontal Bounds
2496 #region Current Line Horizontal Bounds Check
2497 if (textWidth > widthOfTextArea * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f))
2498 {
2499 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2500 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle Horizontal Line Breaking");
2501 #endif
2502
2503 // Handle Line Breaking (if still possible)
2504 if (m_enableWordWrapping && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine) // && isFirstWord == false)
2505 {
2506 // Restore state to previous safe line breaking
2507 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState);
2508
2509 // Compute potential new line offset in the event a line break is needed.
2510 float lineOffsetDelta = 0;
2511 if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
2512 {
2513 float ascender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender;
2514 lineOffsetDelta = (m_lineOffset > 0 && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false ? m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender : 0) - m_maxLineDescender + ascender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale + m_lineSpacing * currentEmScale;
2515 }
2516 else
2517 {
2518 lineOffsetDelta = m_lineHeight + m_lineSpacing * currentEmScale;
2519 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = true;
2520 }
2521
2522 // Calculate new text height
2523 float newTextHeight = m_maxTextAscender + lineOffsetDelta + m_lineOffset - m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedDescender;
2524
2525 // Replace Soft Hyphen by Hyphen Minus 0x2D
2526 #region Handle Soft Hyphenation
2527 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].character == 0xAD && isSoftHyphenIgnored == false)
2528 {
2529 // Only inject Hyphen Minus if new line is possible
2530 if (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Overflow || newTextHeight < marginHeight + 0.0001f)
2531 {
2532 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount - 1;
2533 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x2D;
2534
2535 i -= 1;
2536 m_characterCount -= 1;
2537 continue;
2538 }
2539 }
2540
2541 isSoftHyphenIgnored = false;
2542
2543 // Ignore Soft Hyphen to prevent it from wrapping
2544 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].character == 0xAD)
2545 {
2546 isSoftHyphenIgnored = true;
2547 continue;
2548 }
2549 #endregion
2550
2551 // Adjust character spacing before breaking up word if auto size is enabled
2552 if (m_enableAutoSizing && isFirstWordOfLine)
2553 {
2554 // Handle Character Width Adjustments
2555 #region Character Width Adjustments
2556 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100 && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2557 {
2558 float adjustedTextWidth = textWidth;
2559
2560 // Determine full width of the text
2561 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta > 0)
2562 adjustedTextWidth /= 1f - m_charWidthAdjDelta;
2563
2564 float adjustmentDelta = textWidth - (widthOfTextArea - 0.0001f) * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f);
2565 m_charWidthAdjDelta += adjustmentDelta / adjustedTextWidth;
2566 m_charWidthAdjDelta = Mathf.Min(m_charWidthAdjDelta, m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100);
2567
2568 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Character Width by " + (m_charWidthAdjDelta * 100) + "%");
2569 return;
2570 }
2571 #endregion
2572
2573 // Handle Text Auto-sizing resulting from text exceeding vertical bounds.
2574 #region Text Auto-Sizing (Text greater than vertical bounds)
2575 if (m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2576 {
2577 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2578
2579 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
2580 m_fontSize -= sizeDelta;
2581 m_fontSize = Mathf.Max((int)(m_fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMin);
2582
2583 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Point Size from [" + m_maxFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
2584 return;
2585 }
2586 #endregion Text Auto-Sizing
2587 }
2588
2589
2590 // Special handling if first word of line and non breaking space
2591 int savedSoftLineBreakingSpace = m_SavedSoftLineBreakState.previous_WordBreak;
2592 if (isFirstWordOfLine && savedSoftLineBreakingSpace != -1)
2593 {
2594 if (savedSoftLineBreakingSpace != lastSoftLineBreak)
2595 {
2596 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedSoftLineBreakState);
2597 lastSoftLineBreak = savedSoftLineBreakingSpace;
2598
2599 // check if soft hyphen
2600 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].character == 0xAD)
2601 {
2602 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount - 1;
2603 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x2D;
2604
2605 i -= 1;
2606 m_characterCount -= 1;
2607 continue;
2608 }
2609 }
2610 }
2611
2612 // Determine if new line of text would exceed the vertical bounds of text container
2613 if (newTextHeight > marginHeight + 0.0001f)
2614 {
2615 // Set isTextOverflowing and firstOverflowCharacterIndex
2616 if (m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex == -1)
2617 m_firstOverflowCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
2618
2619 // Check if Auto-Size is enabled
2620 if (m_enableAutoSizing)
2621 {
2622 // Handle Line spacing adjustments
2623 #region Line Spacing Adjustments
2624 if (m_lineSpacingDelta > m_lineSpacingMax && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2625 {
2626 float adjustmentDelta = (marginHeight - newTextHeight) / (m_lineNumber + 1);
2627
2628 m_lineSpacingDelta = Mathf.Max(m_lineSpacingDelta + adjustmentDelta / baseScale, m_lineSpacingMax);
2629
2630 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Line Spacing. Delta of [" + m_lineSpacingDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
2631 return;
2632 }
2633 #endregion
2634
2635 // Handle Character Width Adjustments
2636 #region Character Width Adjustments
2637 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100 && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2638 {
2639 float adjustedTextWidth = textWidth;
2640
2641 // Determine full width of the text
2642 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta > 0)
2643 adjustedTextWidth /= 1f - m_charWidthAdjDelta;
2644
2645 float adjustmentDelta = textWidth - (widthOfTextArea - 0.0001f) * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f);
2646 m_charWidthAdjDelta += adjustmentDelta / adjustedTextWidth;
2647 m_charWidthAdjDelta = Mathf.Min(m_charWidthAdjDelta, m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100);
2648
2649 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Character Width by " + (m_charWidthAdjDelta * 100) + "%");
2650 return;
2651 }
2652 #endregion
2653
2654 // Handle Text Auto-sizing resulting from text exceeding vertical bounds.
2655 #region Text Auto-Sizing (Text greater than vertical bounds)
2656 if (m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2657 {
2658 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2659
2660 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
2661 m_fontSize -= sizeDelta;
2662 m_fontSize = Mathf.Max((int)(m_fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMin);
2663
2664 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Point Size from [" + m_maxFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
2665 return;
2666 }
2667 #endregion Text Auto-Sizing
2668 }
2669
2670 // Check Text Overflow Modes
2671 switch (m_overflowMode)
2672 {
2673 case TextOverflowModes.Overflow:
2674 case TextOverflowModes.ScrollRect:
2675 case TextOverflowModes.Masking:
2676 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2677 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - InsertNewLine()");
2678 #endif
2679
2680 InsertNewLine(i, baseScale, currentElementScale, currentEmScale, m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment, boldSpacingAdjustment, characterSpacingAdjustment, widthOfTextArea, lineGap, ref isMaxVisibleDescenderSet, ref maxVisibleDescender);
2681 isStartOfNewLine = true;
2682 isFirstWordOfLine = true;
2683
2684 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2685 // End Sampling of InsertNewLine()
2686 Profiler.EndSample();
2687
2688 // End Sampling of Horizontal Line Breaking
2689 Profiler.EndSample();
2690
2691 // End Sampling of Visible Character
2692 Profiler.EndSample();
2693 #endif
2694
2695 continue;
2696
2697 case TextOverflowModes.Truncate:
2698 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLastValidState);
2699
2700 characterToSubstitute.index = testedCharacterCount;
2701 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2702 continue;
2703
2704 case TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis:
2705 if (m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Count == 0)
2706 {
2707 i = -1;
2708 m_characterCount = 0;
2709 characterToSubstitute.index = 0;
2710 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2711 m_firstCharacterOfLine = 0;
2712 continue;
2713 }
2714
2715 var ellipsisState = m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Pop();
2716 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref ellipsisState);
2717
2718 i -= 1;
2719 m_characterCount -= 1;
2720 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount;
2721 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x2026;
2722
2723 restoreCount += 1;
2724 continue;
2725
2726 case TextOverflowModes.Linked:
2727 if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
2728 {
2729 m_linkedTextComponent.text = text;
2730 m_linkedTextComponent.firstVisibleCharacter = m_characterCount;
2731 m_linkedTextComponent.ForceMeshUpdate();
2732
2733 m_isTextTruncated = true;
2734 }
2735
2736 // Truncate remaining text
2737 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount;
2738 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2739 continue;
2740
2741 case TextOverflowModes.Page:
2742 // Add new page
2743 m_isNewPage = true;
2744
2745 InsertNewLine(i, baseScale, currentElementScale, currentEmScale, m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment, boldSpacingAdjustment, characterSpacingAdjustment, widthOfTextArea, lineGap, ref isMaxVisibleDescenderSet, ref maxVisibleDescender);
2746
2747 m_startOfLineAscender = 0;
2748 m_lineOffset = 0;
2749 m_maxTextAscender = 0;
2750 m_PageAscender = 0;
2751 m_pageNumber += 1;
2752
2753 isStartOfNewLine = true;
2754 isFirstWordOfLine = true;
2755 continue;
2756 }
2757 }
2758 else
2759 {
2760 //if (m_enableAutoSizing && isFirstWordOfLine)
2761 //{
2762 // // Handle Character Width Adjustments
2763 // #region Character Width Adjustments
2764 // if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100 && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2765 // {
2766 // //m_AutoSizeIterationCount = 0;
2767 // float adjustedTextWidth = textWidth;
2768
2769 // // Determine full width of the text
2770 // if (m_charWidthAdjDelta > 0)
2771 // adjustedTextWidth /= 1f - m_charWidthAdjDelta;
2772
2773 // float adjustmentDelta = textWidth - (widthOfTextArea - 0.0001f) * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f);
2774 // m_charWidthAdjDelta += adjustmentDelta / adjustedTextWidth;
2775 // m_charWidthAdjDelta = Mathf.Min(m_charWidthAdjDelta, m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100);
2776
2777 // //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Character Width by " + (m_charWidthAdjDelta * 100) + "%");
2778
2779 // GenerateTextMesh();
2780 // return;
2781 // }
2782 // #endregion
2783 //}
2784
2785 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2786 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - InsertNewLine()");
2787 #endif
2788 // New line of text does not exceed vertical bounds of text container
2789 InsertNewLine(i, baseScale, currentElementScale, currentEmScale, m_GlyphHorizontalAdvanceAdjustment, boldSpacingAdjustment, characterSpacingAdjustment, widthOfTextArea, lineGap, ref isMaxVisibleDescenderSet, ref maxVisibleDescender);
2790 isStartOfNewLine = true;
2791 isFirstWordOfLine = true;
2792
2793 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2794 // End Sampling of InsertNewLine()
2795 Profiler.EndSample();
2796
2797 // End Sampling of Horizontal Line Breaking
2798 Profiler.EndSample();
2799
2800 // End Sampling of Visible Character
2801 Profiler.EndSample();
2802 #endif
2803 continue;
2804 }
2805 }
2806 else
2807 {
2808 if (m_enableAutoSizing && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
2809 {
2810 // Handle Character Width Adjustments
2811 #region Character Width Adjustments
2812 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
2813 {
2814 float adjustedTextWidth = textWidth;
2815
2816 // Determine full width of the text
2817 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta > 0)
2818 adjustedTextWidth /= 1f - m_charWidthAdjDelta;
2819
2820 float adjustmentDelta = textWidth - (widthOfTextArea - 0.0001f) * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f);
2821 m_charWidthAdjDelta += adjustmentDelta / adjustedTextWidth;
2822 m_charWidthAdjDelta = Mathf.Min(m_charWidthAdjDelta, m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100);
2823
2824 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Character Width by " + (m_charWidthAdjDelta * 100) + "%");
2825 return;
2826 }
2827 #endregion
2828
2829 // Handle Text Auto-sizing resulting from text exceeding horizontal bounds.
2830 #region Text Exceeds Horizontal Bounds - Reducing Point Size
2831 if (m_fontSize > m_fontSizeMin)
2832 {
2833 // Reset character width adjustment delta
2834 //m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
2835
2836 // Adjust Point Size
2837 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSize;
2838
2839 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((m_fontSize - m_minFontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
2840 m_fontSize -= sizeDelta;
2841 m_fontSize = Mathf.Max((int)(m_fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMin);
2842
2843 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Reducing Point Size from [" + m_maxFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
2844 return;
2845 }
2846 #endregion
2847
2848 }
2849
2850 // Check Text Overflow Modes
2851 switch (m_overflowMode)
2852 {
2853 case TextOverflowModes.Overflow:
2854 case TextOverflowModes.ScrollRect:
2855 case TextOverflowModes.Masking:
2856 // Nothing happens as horizontal bounds are ignored in this mode.
2857 break;
2858
2859 case TextOverflowModes.Truncate:
2860 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState);
2861
2862 characterToSubstitute.index = testedCharacterCount;
2863 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2864 continue;
2865
2866 case TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis:
2867 if (m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Count == 0)
2868 {
2869 i = -1;
2870 m_characterCount = 0;
2871 characterToSubstitute.index = 0;
2872 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2873 m_firstCharacterOfLine = 0;
2874 continue;
2875 }
2876
2877 var ellipsisState = m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Pop();
2878 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref ellipsisState);
2879
2880 i -= 1;
2881 m_characterCount -= 1;
2882 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount;
2883 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x2026;
2884
2885 restoreCount += 1;
2886 continue;
2887
2888 case TextOverflowModes.Linked:
2889 i = RestoreWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState);
2890
2891 if (m_linkedTextComponent != null)
2892 {
2893 m_linkedTextComponent.text = text;
2894 m_linkedTextComponent.firstVisibleCharacter = m_characterCount;
2895 m_linkedTextComponent.ForceMeshUpdate();
2896
2897 m_isTextTruncated = true;
2898 }
2899
2900 // Truncate text the overflows the vertical bounds
2901 characterToSubstitute.index = m_characterCount;
2902 characterToSubstitute.unicode = 0x03;
2903 continue;
2904 }
2905
2906 }
2907
2908 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2909 // End Sampling of Horizontal Line Breaking
2910 Profiler.EndSample();
2911 #endif
2912 }
2913 #endregion
2914
2915
2916 // Special handling of characters that are not ignored at the end of a line.
2917 if (charCode == 9)
2918 {
2919 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2920 m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2921 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].spaceCount += 1;
2922 m_textInfo.spaceCount += 1;
2923 }
2924 else if (charCode == 0xAD)
2925 {
2926 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible = false;
2927 }
2928 else
2929 {
2930 // Determine Vertex Color
2931 if (m_overrideHtmlColors)
2932 vertexColor = m_fontColor32;
2933 else
2934 vertexColor = m_htmlColor;
2935
2936 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2937 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Save Glyph Vertex Data");
2938 #endif
2939 // Store Character & Sprite Vertex Information
2940 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
2941 {
2942 // Save Character Vertex Data
2943 SaveGlyphVertexInfo(padding, style_padding, vertexColor);
2944 }
2945 else if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
2946 {
2947 SaveSpriteVertexInfo(vertexColor);
2948 }
2949 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2950 Profiler.EndSample();
2951 #endif
2952
2953 if (isStartOfNewLine)
2954 {
2955 isStartOfNewLine = false;
2956 m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2957 }
2958
2959 m_lineVisibleCharacterCount += 1;
2960 m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
2961 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginLeft = marginLeft;
2962 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginRight = marginRight;
2963 }
2964
2965 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2966 Profiler.EndSample();
2967 #endif
2968 }
2969 else
2970 {
2971 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2972 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle White Space & Non Visible Character");
2973 #endif
2974 // This is white spacing / non visible characters.
2975
2976 // Track # of spaces per line which is used for line justification.
2977 if ((charCode == 10 || charCode == 11 || charCode == 0xA0 || charCode == 0x2007 || charCode == 0x2028 || charCode == 0x2029 || char.IsSeparator((char)charCode)) && charCode != 0xAD && charCode != 0x200B && charCode != 0x2060)
2978 {
2979 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].spaceCount += 1;
2980 m_textInfo.spaceCount += 1;
2981 }
2982
2983 if (charCode == 0xA0)
2984 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].controlCharacterCount += 1;
2985
2986 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
2987 Profiler.EndSample();
2988 #endif
2989 }
2990 #endregion Handle Visible Characters
2991
2992
2993 // Tracking of potential insertion positions for Ellipsis character
2994 #region Track Potential Insertion Location for Ellipsis
2995 if (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis && (isInjectingCharacter == false || charCode == 0x2D))
2996 {
2997 float fontScale = m_currentFontSize / m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
2998 float scale = fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_Ellipsis.character.m_Scale * m_Ellipsis.character.m_Glyph.scale;
2999 float marginLeft = m_marginLeft;
3000 float marginRight = m_marginRight;
3001
3002 // Use the scale and margins of the previous character if Line Feed (LF) is not the first character of a line.
3003 if (charCode == 0x0A && m_characterCount != m_firstCharacterOfLine)
3004 {
3005 fontScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].pointSize / m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.m_FaceInfo.pointSize * m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.m_FaceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
3006 scale = fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier * m_Ellipsis.character.m_Scale * m_Ellipsis.character.m_Glyph.scale;
3007 marginLeft = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginLeft;
3008 marginRight = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].marginRight;
3009 }
3010
3011 float textHeight = m_maxTextAscender - (m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset) + (m_lineOffset > 0 && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false ? m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender : 0);
3012 float textWidth = Mathf.Abs(m_xAdvance) + (!m_isRightToLeft ? m_Ellipsis.character.m_Glyph.metrics.horizontalAdvance : 0) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta) * scale;
3013 float widthOfTextAreaForEllipsis = m_width != -1 ? Mathf.Min(marginWidth + 0.0001f - marginLeft - marginRight, m_width) : marginWidth + 0.0001f - marginLeft - marginRight;
3014
3015 if (textWidth < widthOfTextAreaForEllipsis * (isJustifiedOrFlush ? 1.05f : 1.0f) && textHeight < marginHeight + 0.0001f)
3016 {
3017 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedEllipsisState, i, m_characterCount);
3018 m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Push(m_SavedEllipsisState);
3019 }
3020 }
3021 #endregion
3022
3023
3024 // Store Rectangle positions for each Character.
3025 #region Store Character Data
3026 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].lineNumber = m_lineNumber;
3027 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].pageNumber = m_pageNumber;
3028
3029 if (charCode != 10 && charCode != 11 && charCode != 13 && isInjectingCharacter == false /* && charCode != 8230 */ || m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].characterCount == 1)
3030 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].alignment = m_lineJustification;
3031 #endregion Store Character Data
3032
3033
3034 // Handle xAdvance & Tabulation Stops. Tab stops at every 25% of Font Size.
3035 #region XAdvance, Tabulation & Stops
3036 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3037 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle Advance & Tabulation");
3038 #endif
3039 if (charCode == 9)
3040 {
3041 float tabSize = m_currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.tabWidth * m_currentFontAsset.tabSize * currentElementScale;
3042 float tabs = Mathf.Ceil(m_xAdvance / tabSize) * tabSize;
3043 m_xAdvance = tabs > m_xAdvance ? tabs : m_xAdvance + tabSize;
3044 }
3045 else if (m_monoSpacing != 0)
3046 {
3047 m_xAdvance += (m_monoSpacing - monoAdvance + ((m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale) + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
3048
3049 if (isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B)
3050 m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentEmScale;
3051 }
3052 else if (m_isRightToLeft)
3053 {
3054 m_xAdvance -= (((glyphAdjustments.m_XAdvance + boldSpacingAdjustment) * currentElementScale + (m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta));
3055
3056 if (isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B)
3057 m_xAdvance -= m_wordSpacing * currentEmScale;
3058 }
3059 else
3060 {
3061 float scaleFXMultiplier = 1;
3062 if (m_isFXMatrixSet) scaleFXMultiplier = m_FXMatrix.lossyScale.x;
3063
3064 m_xAdvance += ((currentGlyphMetrics.horizontalAdvance * scaleFXMultiplier + glyphAdjustments.m_XAdvance + boldSpacingAdjustment) * currentElementScale + (m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale + m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
3065
3066 if (isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B)
3067 m_xAdvance += m_wordSpacing * currentEmScale;
3068 }
3069
3070 // Store xAdvance information
3071 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].xAdvance = m_xAdvance;
3072 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3073 Profiler.EndSample();
3074 #endif
3075 #endregion Tabulation & Stops
3076
3077
3078 // Handle Carriage Return
3079 #region Carriage Return
3080 if (charCode == 13)
3081 {
3082 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3083 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle Carriage Return");
3084 #endif
3085
3086 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
3087
3088 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3089 Profiler.EndSample();
3090 #endif
3091 }
3092 #endregion Carriage Return
3093
3094
3095 // Handle Line Spacing Adjustments + Word Wrapping & special case for last line.
3096 #region Check for Line Feed and Last Character
3097 if (charCode == 10 || charCode == 11 || charCode == 0x03 || charCode == 0x2028 || charCode == 0x2029 || (charCode == 0x2D && isInjectingCharacter) || m_characterCount == totalCharacterCount - 1)
3098 {
3099 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3100 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Handle Line & Text Termination");
3101 #endif
3102
3103 // Adjust current line spacing (if necessary) before inserting new line
3104 float baselineAdjustmentDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
3105 if (m_lineOffset > 0 && Math.Abs(baselineAdjustmentDelta) > 0.01f && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false && !m_isNewPage)
3106 {
3107 //Debug.Log("Line Feed - Adjusting Line Spacing on line #" + m_lineNumber);
3108 AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, baselineAdjustmentDelta);
3109 m_ElementDescender -= baselineAdjustmentDelta;
3110 m_lineOffset += baselineAdjustmentDelta;
3111
3112 // Adjust saved ellipsis state only if we are adjusting the same line number
3113 if (m_SavedEllipsisState.lineNumber == m_lineNumber)
3114 {
3115 m_SavedEllipsisState = m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Pop();
3116 m_SavedEllipsisState.startOfLineAscender += baselineAdjustmentDelta;
3117 m_SavedEllipsisState.lineOffset += baselineAdjustmentDelta;
3118 m_EllipsisInsertionCandidateStack.Push(m_SavedEllipsisState);
3119 }
3120 }
3121 m_isNewPage = false;
3122
3123 // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
3124 float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
3125 float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
3126
3127 // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
3128 m_ElementDescender = m_ElementDescender < lineDescender ? m_ElementDescender : lineDescender;
3129 if (!isMaxVisibleDescenderSet)
3130 maxVisibleDescender = m_ElementDescender;
3131
3132 if (m_useMaxVisibleDescender && (m_characterCount >= m_maxVisibleCharacters || m_lineNumber >= m_maxVisibleLines))
3133 isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = true;
3134
3135 // Save Line Information
3136 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex = m_firstCharacterOfLine;
3137 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstVisibleCharacterIndex = m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_firstCharacterOfLine > m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstCharacterOfLine : m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine;
3138 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex = m_lastCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount;
3139 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastVisibleCharacterIndex = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine < m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine : m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine;
3140
3141 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].characterCount = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex - m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex + 1;
3142 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].visibleCharacterCount = m_lineVisibleCharacterCount;
3143 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.min = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine].bottomLeft.x, lineDescender);
3144 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].topRight.x, lineAscender);
3145 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].length = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max.x - (padding * currentElementScale);
3146 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].width = widthOfTextArea;
3147
3148 if (m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].characterCount == 1)
3149 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].alignment = m_lineJustification;
3150
3151 float maxAdvanceOffset = (boldSpacingAdjustment * currentElementScale + (m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale - m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
3152 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].isVisible)
3153 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].maxAdvance = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].xAdvance + (m_isRightToLeft ? maxAdvanceOffset : - maxAdvanceOffset);
3154 else
3155 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].maxAdvance = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastCharacterOfLine].xAdvance + (m_isRightToLeft ? maxAdvanceOffset : - maxAdvanceOffset);
3156
3157 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].baseline = 0 - m_lineOffset;
3158 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].ascender = lineAscender;
3159 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].descender = lineDescender;
3160 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineHeight = lineAscender - lineDescender + lineGap * baseScale;
3161
3162 // Add new line if not last line or character.
3163 if (charCode == 10 || charCode == 11 || charCode == 0x2D || charCode == 0x2028 || charCode == 0x2029)
3164 {
3165 // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
3166 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState, i, m_characterCount);
3167
3168 m_lineNumber += 1;
3169 isStartOfNewLine = true;
3170 ignoreNonBreakingSpace = false;
3171 isFirstWordOfLine = true;
3172
3173 m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount + 1;
3174 m_lineVisibleCharacterCount = 0;
3175
3176 // Check to make sure Array is large enough to hold a new line.
3177 if (m_lineNumber >= m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
3178 ResizeLineExtents(m_lineNumber);
3179
3180 float lastVisibleAscender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender;
3181
3182 // Apply Line Spacing with special handling for VT char(11)
3183 if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
3184 {
3185 float lineOffsetDelta = 0 - m_maxLineDescender + lastVisibleAscender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale + (m_lineSpacing + (charCode == 10 || charCode == 0x2029 ? m_paragraphSpacing : 0)) * currentEmScale;
3186 m_lineOffset += lineOffsetDelta;
3187 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = false;
3188 }
3189 else
3190 {
3191 m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + (m_lineSpacing + (charCode == 10 || charCode == 0x2029 ? m_paragraphSpacing : 0)) * currentEmScale;
3192 m_IsDrivenLineSpacing = true;
3193 }
3194
3195 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
3196 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3197 m_startOfLineAscender = lastVisibleAscender;
3198
3199 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_LineIndent + tag_Indent;
3200
3201 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
3202 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLastValidState, i, m_characterCount);
3203
3204 m_characterCount += 1;
3205
3206 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3207 Profiler.EndSample();
3208 #endif
3209
3210 continue;
3211 }
3212
3213 // If End of Text
3214 if (charCode == 0x03)
3215 i = m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length;
3216
3217 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3218 Profiler.EndSample();
3219 #endif
3220 }
3221 #endregion Check for Linefeed or Last Character
3222
3223
3224 // Store Rectangle positions for each Character.
3225 #region Save CharacterInfo for the current character.
3226 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3227 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Save Character & Page Info");
3228 #endif
3229 // Determine the bounds of the Mesh.
3230 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].isVisible)
3231 {
3232 m_meshExtents.min.x = Mathf.Min(m_meshExtents.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft.x);
3233 m_meshExtents.min.y = Mathf.Min(m_meshExtents.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft.y);
3234
3235 m_meshExtents.max.x = Mathf.Max(m_meshExtents.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight.x);
3236 m_meshExtents.max.y = Mathf.Max(m_meshExtents.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight.y);
3237
3238 //m_meshExtents.min = new Vector2(Mathf.Min(m_meshExtents.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft.x), Mathf.Min(m_meshExtents.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft.y));
3239 //m_meshExtents.max = new Vector2(Mathf.Max(m_meshExtents.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight.x), Mathf.Max(m_meshExtents.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight.y));
3240 }
3241
3242
3243 // Save pageInfo Data
3244 if (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page && charCode != 10 && charCode != 11 && charCode != 13 && charCode != 0x2028 && charCode != 0x2029) // && m_pageNumber < 16)
3245 {
3246 // Check if we need to increase allocations for the pageInfo array.
3247 if (m_pageNumber + 1 > m_textInfo.pageInfo.Length)
3248 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.pageInfo, m_pageNumber + 1, true);
3249
3250 m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].ascender = m_PageAscender;
3251 m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].descender = m_ElementDescender < m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].descender
3252 ? m_ElementDescender
3253 : m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].descender;
3254
3255 if (m_pageNumber == 0 && m_characterCount == 0)
3256 m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].firstCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
3257 else if (m_characterCount > 0 && m_pageNumber != m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].pageNumber)
3258 {
3259 m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber - 1].lastCharacterIndex = m_characterCount - 1;
3260 m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].firstCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
3261 }
3262 else if (m_characterCount == totalCharacterCount - 1)
3263 m_textInfo.pageInfo[m_pageNumber].lastCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
3264 }
3265 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3266 Profiler.EndSample();
3267 #endif
3268 #endregion Saving CharacterInfo
3269
3270
3271 // Save State of Mesh Creation for handling of Word Wrapping
3272 #region Save Word Wrapping State
3273 if (m_enableWordWrapping || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Truncate || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis || m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Linked)
3274 {
3275 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3276 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - Save Word Wrapping State");
3277 #endif
3278
3279 if ((isWhiteSpace || charCode == 0x200B || charCode == 0x2D || charCode == 0xAD) && (!m_isNonBreakingSpace || ignoreNonBreakingSpace) && charCode != 0xA0 && charCode != 0x2007 && charCode != 0x2011 && charCode != 0x202F && charCode != 0x2060)
3280 {
3281 // We store the state of numerous variables for the most recent Space, LineFeed or Carriage Return to enable them to be restored
3282 // for Word Wrapping.
3283 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
3284 isFirstWordOfLine = false;
3285 //isLastCharacterCJK = false;
3286
3287 // Reset soft line breaking point since we now have a valid hard break point.
3288 m_SavedSoftLineBreakState.previous_WordBreak = -1;
3289 }
3290 // Handling for East Asian characters
3291 else if (m_isNonBreakingSpace == false &&
3292 ((charCode > 0x1100 && charCode < 0x11ff || /* Hangul Jamo */
3293 charCode > 0xA960 && charCode < 0xA97F || /* Hangul Jamo Extended-A */
3294 charCode > 0xAC00 && charCode < 0xD7FF)&& /* Hangul Syllables */
3295 TMP_Settings.useModernHangulLineBreakingRules == false ||
3296
3297 (charCode > 0x2E80 && charCode < 0x9FFF || /* CJK */
3298 charCode > 0xF900 && charCode < 0xFAFF || /* CJK Compatibility Ideographs */
3299 charCode > 0xFE30 && charCode < 0xFE4F || /* CJK Compatibility Forms */
3300 charCode > 0xFF00 && charCode < 0xFFEF))) /* CJK Halfwidth */
3301 {
3302 bool isCurrentLeadingCharacter = TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.leadingCharacters.ContainsKey(charCode);
3303 bool isNextFollowingCharacter = m_characterCount < totalCharacterCount - 1 && TMP_Settings.linebreakingRules.followingCharacters.ContainsKey(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount + 1].character);
3304
3305 if (isCurrentLeadingCharacter == false)
3306 {
3307 if (isNextFollowingCharacter == false)
3308 {
3309 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
3310 isFirstWordOfLine = false;
3311 }
3312
3313 if (isFirstWordOfLine)
3314 {
3315 // Special handling for non-breaking space and soft line breaks
3316 if (isWhiteSpace)
3317 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedSoftLineBreakState, i, m_characterCount);
3318
3319 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
3320 }
3321 }
3322 else
3323 {
3324 if (isFirstWordOfLine && isFirstCharacterOfLine)
3325 {
3326 // Special handling for non-breaking space and soft line breaks
3327 if (isWhiteSpace)
3328 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedSoftLineBreakState, i, m_characterCount);
3329
3330 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
3331 }
3332 }
3333
3334 //isLastCharacterCJK = true;
3335 }
3336 else if (isFirstWordOfLine)
3337 {
3338 // Special handling for non-breaking space and soft line breaks
3339 if (isWhiteSpace || (charCode == 0xAD && isSoftHyphenIgnored == false))
3340 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedSoftLineBreakState, i, m_characterCount);
3341
3342 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedWordWrapState, i, m_characterCount);
3343 //isLastCharacterCJK = false;
3344 }
3345
3346 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3347 Profiler.EndSample();
3348 #endif
3349 }
3350 #endregion Save Word Wrapping State
3351
3352 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLastValidState, i, m_characterCount);
3353
3354 m_characterCount += 1;
3355 }
3356
3357 // Check Auto Sizing and increase font size to fill text container.
3358 #region Check Auto-Sizing (Upper Font Size Bounds)
3359 fontSizeDelta = m_maxFontSize - m_minFontSize;
3360 if (/* !m_isCharacterWrappingEnabled && */ m_enableAutoSizing && fontSizeDelta > 0.051f && m_fontSize < m_fontSizeMax && m_AutoSizeIterationCount < m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
3361 {
3362 // Reset character width adjustment delta
3363 if (m_charWidthAdjDelta < m_charWidthMaxAdj / 100)
3364 m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
3365
3366 m_minFontSize = m_fontSize;
3367
3368 float sizeDelta = Mathf.Max((m_maxFontSize - m_fontSize) / 2, 0.05f);
3369 m_fontSize += sizeDelta;
3370 m_fontSize = Mathf.Min((int)(m_fontSize * 20 + 0.5f) / 20f, m_fontSizeMax);
3371
3372 //Debug.Log("[" + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + "] Increasing Point Size from [" + m_minFontSize.ToString("f3") + "] to [" + m_fontSize.ToString("f3") + "] with delta of [" + sizeDelta.ToString("f3") + "].");
3373 return;
3374 }
3375 #endregion End Auto-sizing Check
3376
3377 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = true;
3378
3379 if (m_AutoSizeIterationCount >= m_AutoSizeMaxIterationCount)
3380 Debug.Log("Auto Size Iteration Count: " + m_AutoSizeIterationCount + ". Final Point Size: " + m_fontSize);
3381
3382 // If there are no visible characters or only character is End of Text (0x03)... no need to continue
3383 if (m_characterCount == 0 || (m_characterCount == 1 && charCode == 0x03))
3384 {
3385 ClearMesh(true);
3386
3387 // Event indicating the text has been regenerated.
3388 TMPro_EventManager.ON_TEXT_CHANGED(this);
3389 return;
3390 }
3391
3392 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
3393 // End Sampling of Phase I
3394 Profiler.EndSample();
3395
3396 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP GenerateText() - Phase II");
3397 #endif
3398
3399 // *** PHASE II of Text Generation ***
3400 int last_vert_index = m_materialReferences[m_Underline.materialIndex].referenceCount * (!m_isVolumetricText ? 4 : 8);
3401
3402 // Partial clear of the vertices array to mark unused vertices as degenerate.
3403 m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].Clear(false);
3404
3405 // Handle Text Alignment
3406 #region Text Vertical Alignment
3407 Vector3 anchorOffset = Vector3.zero;
3408 Vector3[] corners = m_RectTransformCorners; // GetTextContainerLocalCorners();
3409
3410 // Handle Vertical Text Alignment
3411 switch (m_VerticalAlignment)
3412 {
3413 // Top Vertically
3414 case VerticalAlignmentOptions.Top:
3415 if (m_overflowMode != TextOverflowModes.Page)
3416 anchorOffset = corners[1] + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - m_maxTextAscender - margins.y, 0);
3417 else
3418 anchorOffset = corners[1] + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - m_textInfo.pageInfo[pageToDisplay].ascender - margins.y, 0);
3419 break;
3420
3421 // Middle Vertically
3422 case VerticalAlignmentOptions.Middle:
3423 if (m_overflowMode != TextOverflowModes.Page)
3424 anchorOffset = (corners[0] + corners[1]) / 2 + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - (m_maxTextAscender + margins.y + maxVisibleDescender - margins.w) / 2, 0);
3425 else
3426 anchorOffset = (corners[0] + corners[1]) / 2 + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - (m_textInfo.pageInfo[pageToDisplay].ascender + margins.y + m_textInfo.pageInfo[pageToDisplay].descender - margins.w) / 2, 0);
3427 break;
3428
3429 // Bottom Vertically
3430 case VerticalAlignmentOptions.Bottom:
3431 if (m_overflowMode != TextOverflowModes.Page)
3432 anchorOffset = corners[0] + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - maxVisibleDescender + margins.w, 0);
3433 else
3434 anchorOffset = corners[0] + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - m_textInfo.pageInfo[pageToDisplay].descender + margins.w, 0);
3435 break;
3436
3437 // Baseline Vertically
3438 case VerticalAlignmentOptions.Baseline:
3439 anchorOffset = (corners[0] + corners[1]) / 2 + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0, 0);
3440 break;
3441
3442 // Midline Vertically
3443 case VerticalAlignmentOptions.Geometry:
3444 anchorOffset = (corners[0] + corners[1]) / 2 + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - (m_meshExtents.max.y + margins.y + m_meshExtents.min.y - margins.w) / 2, 0);
3445 break;
3446
3447 // Capline Vertically
3448 case VerticalAlignmentOptions.Capline:
3449 anchorOffset = (corners[0] + corners[1]) / 2 + new Vector3(0 + margins.x, 0 - (m_maxCapHeight - margins.y - margins.w) / 2, 0);
3450 break;
3451 }
3452 #endregion
3453
3454
3455 // Initialization for Second Pass
3456 Vector3 justificationOffset = Vector3.zero;
3457 Vector3 offset = Vector3.zero;
3458 int vert_index_X4 = 0;
3459 int sprite_index_X4 = 0;
3460
3461 int wordCount = 0;
3462 int lineCount = 0;
3463 int lastLine = 0;
3464 bool isFirstSeperator = false;
3465
3466 bool isStartOfWord = false;
3467 int wordFirstChar = 0;
3468 int wordLastChar = 0;
3469
3470 // Second Pass : Line Justification, UV Mapping, Character & Line Visibility & more.
3471 float lossyScale = m_previousLossyScaleY = this.transform.lossyScale.y;
3472
3473 Color32 underlineColor = Color.white;
3474 Color32 strikethroughColor = Color.white;
3475 HighlightState highlightState = new HighlightState(new Color32(255, 255, 0, 64), TMP_Offset.zero);
3476 float xScale = 0;
3477 float xScaleMax = 0;
3478 float underlineStartScale = 0;
3479 float underlineEndScale = 0;
3480 float underlineMaxScale = 0;
3481 float underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3482 int lastPage = 0;
3483
3484 float strikethroughPointSize = 0;
3485 float strikethroughScale = 0;
3486 float strikethroughBaseline = 0;
3487
3488 TMP_CharacterInfo[] characterInfos = m_textInfo.characterInfo;
3489 #region Handle Line Justification & UV Mapping & Character Visibility & More
3490 for (int i = 0; i < m_characterCount; i++)
3491 {
3492 TMP_FontAsset currentFontAsset = characterInfos[i].fontAsset;
3493
3494 char unicode = characterInfos[i].character;
3495
3496 int currentLine = characterInfos[i].lineNumber;
3497 TMP_LineInfo lineInfo = m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine];
3498 lineCount = currentLine + 1;
3499
3500 HorizontalAlignmentOptions lineAlignment = lineInfo.alignment;
3501
3502 // Process Line Justification
3503 #region Handle Line Justification
3504 switch (lineAlignment)
3505 {
3506 case HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left:
3507 if (!m_isRightToLeft)
3508 justificationOffset = new Vector3(0 + lineInfo.marginLeft, 0, 0);
3509 else
3510 justificationOffset = new Vector3(0 - lineInfo.maxAdvance, 0, 0);
3511 break;
3512
3513 case HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center:
3514 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft + lineInfo.width / 2 - lineInfo.maxAdvance / 2, 0, 0);
3515 break;
3516
3517 case HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Geometry:
3518 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft + lineInfo.width / 2 - (lineInfo.lineExtents.min.x + lineInfo.lineExtents.max.x) / 2, 0, 0);
3519 break;
3520
3521 case HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right:
3522 if (!m_isRightToLeft)
3523 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft + lineInfo.width - lineInfo.maxAdvance, 0, 0);
3524 else
3525 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft + lineInfo.width, 0, 0);
3526 break;
3527
3528 case HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified:
3529 case HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush:
3530 // Skip Zero Width Characters
3531 if (unicode == 0x0A || unicode == 0xAD || unicode == 0x200B || unicode == 0x2060 || unicode == 0x03) break;
3532
3533 char lastCharOfCurrentLine = characterInfos[lineInfo.lastCharacterIndex].character;
3534 bool isFlush = (lineAlignment & HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush) == HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush;
3535
3536 // In Justified mode, all lines are justified except the last one.
3537 // In Flush mode, all lines are justified.
3538 if (char.IsControl(lastCharOfCurrentLine) == false && currentLine < m_lineNumber || isFlush || lineInfo.maxAdvance > lineInfo.width)
3539 {
3540 // First character of each line.
3541 if (currentLine != lastLine || i == 0 /*|| i == lineInfo.firstVisibleCharacterIndex */ || i == m_firstVisibleCharacter)
3542 {
3543 if (!m_isRightToLeft)
3544 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft, 0, 0);
3545 else
3546 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft + lineInfo.width, 0, 0);
3547
3548 if (char.IsSeparator(unicode))
3549 isFirstSeperator = true;
3550 else
3551 isFirstSeperator = false;
3552 }
3553 else
3554 {
3555 float gap = !m_isRightToLeft ? lineInfo.width - lineInfo.maxAdvance : lineInfo.width + lineInfo.maxAdvance;
3556
3557 int visibleCount = lineInfo.visibleCharacterCount - 1 + lineInfo.controlCharacterCount;
3558
3559 // Get the number of spaces for each line ignoring the last character if it is not visible (ie. a space or linefeed).
3560 int spaces = (characterInfos[lineInfo.lastCharacterIndex].isVisible ? lineInfo.spaceCount : lineInfo.spaceCount - 1) - lineInfo.controlCharacterCount;
3561
3562 if (isFirstSeperator) { spaces -= 1; visibleCount += 1; }
3563
3564 float ratio = spaces > 0 ? m_wordWrappingRatios : 1;
3565
3566 if (spaces < 1) spaces = 1;
3567
3568 if (unicode != 0xA0 && (unicode == 9 || char.IsSeparator((char)unicode)))
3569 {
3570 if (!m_isRightToLeft)
3571 justificationOffset += new Vector3(gap * (1 - ratio) / spaces, 0, 0);
3572 else
3573 justificationOffset -= new Vector3(gap * (1 - ratio) / spaces, 0, 0);
3574 }
3575 else
3576 {
3577 if (!m_isRightToLeft)
3578 justificationOffset += new Vector3(gap * ratio / visibleCount, 0, 0);
3579 else
3580 justificationOffset -= new Vector3(gap * ratio / visibleCount, 0, 0);
3581 }
3582 }
3583 }
3584 else
3585 {
3586 if (!m_isRightToLeft)
3587 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft, 0, 0); // Keep last line left justified.
3588 else
3589 justificationOffset = new Vector3(lineInfo.marginLeft + lineInfo.width, 0, 0); // Keep last line right justified.
3590 }
3591 //Debug.Log("Char [" + (char)charCode + "] Code:" + charCode + " Line # " + currentLine + " Offset:" + justificationOffset + " # Spaces:" + lineInfo.spaceCount + " # Characters:" + lineInfo.characterCount);
3592 break;
3593 }
3594 #endregion End Text Justification
3595
3596 offset = anchorOffset + justificationOffset;
3597
3598 // Handle UV2 mapping options and packing of scale information into UV2.
3599 #region Handling of UV2 mapping & Scale packing
3600 bool isCharacterVisible = characterInfos[i].isVisible;
3601 if (isCharacterVisible)
3602 {
3603 TMP_TextElementType elementType = characterInfos[i].elementType;
3604 switch (elementType)
3605 {
3606 // CHARACTERS
3607 case TMP_TextElementType.Character:
3608 Extents lineExtents = lineInfo.lineExtents;
3609 float uvOffset = (m_uvLineOffset * currentLine) % 1; // + m_uvOffset.x;
3610
3611 // Setup UV2 based on Character Mapping Options Selected
3612 #region Handle UV Mapping Options
3613 switch (m_horizontalMapping)
3614 {
3615 case TextureMappingOptions.Character:
3616 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = 0; //+ m_uvOffset.x;
3617 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = 0; //+ m_uvOffset.x;
3618 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = 1; //+ m_uvOffset.x;
3619 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = 1; //+ m_uvOffset.x;
3620 break;
3621
3622 case TextureMappingOptions.Line:
3623 if (m_textAlignment != TextAlignmentOptions.Justified)
3624 {
3625 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.x - lineExtents.min.x) / (lineExtents.max.x - lineExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3626 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.x - lineExtents.min.x) / (lineExtents.max.x - lineExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3627 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position.x - lineExtents.min.x) / (lineExtents.max.x - lineExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3628 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position.x - lineExtents.min.x) / (lineExtents.max.x - lineExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3629 break;
3630 }
3631 else // Special Case if Justified is used in Line Mode.
3632 {
3633 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3634 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3635 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3636 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3637 break;
3638 }
3639
3640 case TextureMappingOptions.Paragraph:
3641 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3642 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3643 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3644 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position.x + justificationOffset.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) / (m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x) + uvOffset;
3645 break;
3646
3647 case TextureMappingOptions.MatchAspect:
3648
3649 switch (m_verticalMapping)
3650 {
3651 case TextureMappingOptions.Character:
3652 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3653 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3654 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3655 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3656 break;
3657
3658 case TextureMappingOptions.Line:
3659 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - lineExtents.min.y) / (lineExtents.max.y - lineExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3660 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - lineExtents.min.y) / (lineExtents.max.y - lineExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3661 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3662 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3663 break;
3664
3665 case TextureMappingOptions.Paragraph:
3666 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3667 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) + uvOffset;
3668 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3669 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3670 break;
3671
3672 case TextureMappingOptions.MatchAspect:
3673 Debug.Log("ERROR: Cannot Match both Vertical & Horizontal.");
3674 break;
3675 }
3676
3677 //float xDelta = 1 - (_uv2s[vert_index + 0].y * textMeshCharacterInfo[i].AspectRatio); // Left aligned
3678 float xDelta = (1 - ((characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y + characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y) * characterInfos[i].aspectRatio)) / 2; // Center of Rectangle
3679
3680 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y * characterInfos[i].aspectRatio) + xDelta + uvOffset;
3681 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x;
