3682 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y * characterInfos[i].aspectRatio) + xDelta + uvOffset;
3683 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x;
3684 break;
3685 }
3686
3687 switch (m_verticalMapping)
3688 {
3689 case TextureMappingOptions.Character:
3690 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3691 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3692 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = 1; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3693 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = 0; // + m_uvOffset.y;
3694 break;
3695
3696 case TextureMappingOptions.Line:
3697 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - lineInfo.descender) / (lineInfo.ascender - lineInfo.descender); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3698 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - lineInfo.descender) / (lineInfo.ascender - lineInfo.descender); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3699 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3700 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3701 break;
3702
3703 case TextureMappingOptions.Paragraph:
3704 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3705 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = (characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position.y - m_meshExtents.min.y) / (m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3706 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3707 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3708 break;
3709
3710 case TextureMappingOptions.MatchAspect:
3711 float yDelta = (1 - ((characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x + characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x) / characterInfos[i].aspectRatio)) / 2; // Center of Rectangle
3712
3713 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = yDelta + (characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x / characterInfos[i].aspectRatio); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3714 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = yDelta + (characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x / characterInfos[i].aspectRatio); // + m_uvOffset.y;
3715 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3716 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y;
3717 break;
3718 }
3719 #endregion
3720
3721 // Pack UV's so that we can pass Xscale needed for Shader to maintain 1:1 ratio.
3722 #region Pack Scale into UV2
3723 xScale = characterInfos[i].scale * Mathf.Abs(lossyScale) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
3724 if (!characterInfos[i].isUsingAlternateTypeface && (characterInfos[i].style & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold) xScale *= -1;
3725
3726 //int isBold = (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].style & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold ? 1 : 0;
3727 //Vector2 vertexData = new Vector2(isBold, xScale);
3728 //characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv4 = vertexData;
3729 //characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv4 = vertexData;
3730 //characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv4 = vertexData;
3731 //characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv4 = vertexData;
3732
3733 float x0 = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x;
3734 float y0 = characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y;
3735 float x1 = characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x;
3736 float y1 = characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y;
3737
3738 float dx = (int)x0;
3739 float dy = (int)y0;
3740
3741 x0 = x0 - dx;
3742 x1 = x1 - dx;
3743 y0 = y0 - dy;
3744 y1 = y1 - dy;
3745
3746 // Optimization to avoid having a vector2 returned from the Pack UV function.
3747 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.x = PackUV(x0, y0); characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.uv2.y = xScale;
3748 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.x = PackUV(x0, y1); characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.uv2.y = xScale;
3749 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.x = PackUV(x1, y1); characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.uv2.y = xScale;
3750 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.x = PackUV(x1, y0); characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.uv2.y = xScale;
3751 #endregion
3752 break;
3753
3754 // SPRITES
3755 case TMP_TextElementType.Sprite:
3756 // Nothing right now
3757 break;
3758 }
3759
3760 // Handle maxVisibleCharacters, maxVisibleLines and Overflow Page Mode.
3761 #region Handle maxVisibleCharacters / maxVisibleLines / Page Mode
3762 if (i < m_maxVisibleCharacters && wordCount < m_maxVisibleWords && currentLine < m_maxVisibleLines && m_overflowMode != TextOverflowModes.Page)
3763 {
3764 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position += offset;
3765 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position += offset;
3766 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position += offset;
3767 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position += offset;
3768 }
3769 else if (i < m_maxVisibleCharacters && wordCount < m_maxVisibleWords && currentLine < m_maxVisibleLines && m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page && characterInfos[i].pageNumber == pageToDisplay)
3770 {
3771 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position += offset;
3772 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position += offset;
3773 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position += offset;
3774 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position += offset;
3775 }
3776 else
3777 {
3778 characterInfos[i].vertex_BL.position = Vector3.zero;
3779 characterInfos[i].vertex_TL.position = Vector3.zero;
3780 characterInfos[i].vertex_TR.position = Vector3.zero;
3781 characterInfos[i].vertex_BR.position = Vector3.zero;
3782 characterInfos[i].isVisible = false;
3783 }
3784 #endregion
3785
3786
3787 // Fill Vertex Buffers for the various types of element
3788 if (elementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
3789 {
3790 FillCharacterVertexBuffers(i, vert_index_X4, m_isVolumetricText);
3791 }
3792 else if (elementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
3793 {
3794 FillSpriteVertexBuffers(i, sprite_index_X4);
3795 }
3796 }
3797 #endregion
3798
3799 // Apply Alignment and Justification Offset
3800 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft += offset;
3801 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topLeft += offset;
3802 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight += offset;
3803 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomRight += offset;
3804
3805 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].origin += offset.x;
3806 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].xAdvance += offset.x;
3807
3808 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender += offset.y;
3809 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender += offset.y;
3810 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine += offset.y;
3811
3812 // Update MeshExtents
3813 if (isCharacterVisible)
3814 {
3815 //m_meshExtents.min = new Vector2(Mathf.Min(m_meshExtents.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.x), Mathf.Min(m_meshExtents.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.y));
3816 //m_meshExtents.max = new Vector2(Mathf.Max(m_meshExtents.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x), Mathf.Max(m_meshExtents.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topLeft.y));
3817 }
3818
3819 // Need to recompute lineExtent to account for the offset from justification.
3820 #region Adjust lineExtents resulting from alignment offset
3821 if (currentLine != lastLine || i == m_characterCount - 1)
3822 {
3823 // Update the previous line's extents
3824 if (currentLine != lastLine)
3825 {
3826 m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].baseline += offset.y;
3827 m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].ascender += offset.y;
3828 m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].descender += offset.y;
3829
3830 m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].maxAdvance += offset.x;
3831
3832 m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].lineExtents.min = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].firstCharacterIndex].bottomLeft.x, m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].descender);
3833 m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].lineExtents.max = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].lastVisibleCharacterIndex].topRight.x, m_textInfo.lineInfo[lastLine].ascender);
3834 }
3835
3836 // Update the current line's extents
3837 if (i == m_characterCount - 1)
3838 {
3839 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].baseline += offset.y;
3840 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].ascender += offset.y;
3841 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].descender += offset.y;
3842
3843 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].maxAdvance += offset.x;
3844
3845 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].lineExtents.min = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].firstCharacterIndex].bottomLeft.x, m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].descender);
3846 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].lineExtents.max = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].lastVisibleCharacterIndex].topRight.x, m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].ascender);
3847 }
3848 }
3849 #endregion
3850
3851
3852 // Track Word Count per line and for the object
3853 #region Track Word Count
3854 if (char.IsLetterOrDigit(unicode) || unicode == 0x2D || unicode == 0xAD || unicode == 0x2010 || unicode == 0x2011)
3855 {
3856 if (isStartOfWord == false)
3857 {
3858 isStartOfWord = true;
3859 wordFirstChar = i;
3860 }
3861
3862 // If last character is a word
3863 if (isStartOfWord && i == m_characterCount - 1)
3864 {
3865 int size = m_textInfo.wordInfo.Length;
3866 int index = m_textInfo.wordCount;
3867
3868 if (m_textInfo.wordCount + 1 > size)
3869 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.wordInfo, size + 1);
3870
3871 wordLastChar = i;
3872
3873 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].firstCharacterIndex = wordFirstChar;
3874 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].lastCharacterIndex = wordLastChar;
3875 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].characterCount = wordLastChar - wordFirstChar + 1;
3876 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].textComponent = this;
3877
3878 wordCount += 1;
3879 m_textInfo.wordCount += 1;
3880 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].wordCount += 1;
3881 }
3882 }
3883 else if (isStartOfWord || i == 0 && (!char.IsPunctuation(unicode) || char.IsWhiteSpace(unicode) || unicode == 0x200B || i == m_characterCount - 1))
3884 {
3885 if (i > 0 && i < characterInfos.Length - 1 && i < m_characterCount && (unicode == 39 || unicode == 8217) && char.IsLetterOrDigit(characterInfos[i - 1].character) && char.IsLetterOrDigit(characterInfos[i + 1].character))
3886 {
3887
3888 }
3889 else
3890 {
3891 wordLastChar = i == m_characterCount - 1 && char.IsLetterOrDigit(unicode) ? i : i - 1;
3892 isStartOfWord = false;
3893
3894 int size = m_textInfo.wordInfo.Length;
3895 int index = m_textInfo.wordCount;
3896
3897 if (m_textInfo.wordCount + 1 > size)
3898 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.wordInfo, size + 1);
3899
3900 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].firstCharacterIndex = wordFirstChar;
3901 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].lastCharacterIndex = wordLastChar;
3902 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].characterCount = wordLastChar - wordFirstChar + 1;
3903 m_textInfo.wordInfo[index].textComponent = this;
3904
3905 wordCount += 1;
3906 m_textInfo.wordCount += 1;
3907 m_textInfo.lineInfo[currentLine].wordCount += 1;
3908 }
3909 }
3910 #endregion
3911
3912
3913 // Setup & Handle Underline
3914 #region Underline
3915 // NOTE: Need to figure out how underline will be handled with multiple fonts and which font will be used for the underline.
3916 bool isUnderline = (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].style & FontStyles.Underline) == FontStyles.Underline;
3917 if (isUnderline)
3918 {
3919 bool isUnderlineVisible = true;
3920 int currentPage = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].pageNumber;
3921 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].underlineVertexIndex = last_vert_index;
3922
3923 if (i > m_maxVisibleCharacters || currentLine > m_maxVisibleLines || (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page && currentPage + 1 != m_pageToDisplay))
3924 isUnderlineVisible = false;
3925
3926 // We only use the scale of visible characters.
3927 if (!char.IsWhiteSpace(unicode) && unicode != 0x200B)
3928 {
3929 underlineMaxScale = Mathf.Max(underlineMaxScale, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale);
3930 xScaleMax = Mathf.Max(xScaleMax, Mathf.Abs(xScale));
3931 underlineBaseLine = Mathf.Min(currentPage == lastPage ? underlineBaseLine : k_LargePositiveFloat, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + font.m_FaceInfo.underlineOffset * underlineMaxScale);
3932 lastPage = currentPage; // Need to track pages to ensure we reset baseline for the new pages.
3933 }
3934
3935 if (beginUnderline == false && isUnderlineVisible == true && i <= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && unicode != 10 && unicode != 11 && unicode != 13)
3936 {
3937 if (i == lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && char.IsSeparator(unicode))
3938 { }
3939 else
3940 {
3941 beginUnderline = true;
3942 underlineStartScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
3943 if (underlineMaxScale == 0)
3944 {
3945 underlineMaxScale = underlineStartScale;
3946 xScaleMax = xScale;
3947 }
3948 underline_start = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3949 underlineColor = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].underlineColor;
3950 }
3951 }
3952
3953 // End Underline if text only contains one character.
3954 if (beginUnderline && m_characterCount == 1)
3955 {
3956 beginUnderline = false;
3957 underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3958 underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
3959
3960 DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
3961 underlineMaxScale = 0;
3962 xScaleMax = 0;
3963 underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3964 }
3965 else if (beginUnderline && (i == lineInfo.lastCharacterIndex || i >= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex))
3966 {
3967 // Terminate underline at previous visible character if space or carriage return.
3968 if (char.IsWhiteSpace(unicode) || unicode == 0x200B)
3969 {
3970 int lastVisibleCharacterIndex = lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex;
3971 underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3972 underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].scale;
3973 }
3974 else
3975 { // End underline if last character of the line.
3976 underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3977 underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
3978 }
3979
3980 beginUnderline = false;
3981 DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
3982 underlineMaxScale = 0;
3983 xScaleMax = 0;
3984 underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3985 }
3986 else if (beginUnderline && !isUnderlineVisible)
3987 {
3988 beginUnderline = false;
3989 underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
3990 underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].scale;
3991
3992 DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
3993 underlineMaxScale = 0;
3994 xScaleMax = 0;
3995 underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
3996 }
3997 else if (beginUnderline && i < m_characterCount - 1 && !underlineColor.Compare(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i + 1].underlineColor))
3998 {
3999 // End underline if underline color has changed.
4000 beginUnderline = false;
4001 underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
4002 underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
4003
4004 DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
4005 underlineMaxScale = 0;
4006 xScaleMax = 0;
4007 underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
4008 }
4009 }
4010 else
4011 {
4012 // End Underline
4013 if (beginUnderline == true)
4014 {
4015 beginUnderline = false;
4016 underline_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].topRight.x, underlineBaseLine, 0);
4017 underlineEndScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].scale;
4018
4019 DrawUnderlineMesh(underline_start, underline_end, ref last_vert_index, underlineStartScale, underlineEndScale, underlineMaxScale, xScaleMax, underlineColor);
4020 underlineMaxScale = 0;
4021 xScaleMax = 0;
4022 underlineBaseLine = k_LargePositiveFloat;
4023 }
4024 }
4025 #endregion
4026
4027
4028 // Setup & Handle Strikethrough
4029 #region Strikethrough
4030 // NOTE: Need to figure out how underline will be handled with multiple fonts and which font will be used for the underline.
4031 bool isStrikethrough = (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].style & FontStyles.Strikethrough) == FontStyles.Strikethrough;
4032 float strikethroughOffset = currentFontAsset.m_FaceInfo.strikethroughOffset;
4033
4034 if (isStrikethrough)
4035 {
4036 bool isStrikeThroughVisible = true;
4037 m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].strikethroughVertexIndex = last_vert_index;
4038
4039 if (i > m_maxVisibleCharacters || currentLine > m_maxVisibleLines || (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page && m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].pageNumber + 1 != m_pageToDisplay))
4040 isStrikeThroughVisible = false;
4041
4042 if (beginStrikethrough == false && isStrikeThroughVisible && i <= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && unicode != 10 && unicode != 11 && unicode != 13)
4043 {
4044 if (i == lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && char.IsSeparator(unicode))
4045 { }
4046 else
4047 {
4048 beginStrikethrough = true;
4049 strikethroughPointSize = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].pointSize;
4050 strikethroughScale = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].scale;
4051 strikethrough_start = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4052 strikethroughColor = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].strikethroughColor;
4053 strikethroughBaseline = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine;
4054 //Debug.Log("Char [" + currentCharacter + "] Start Strikethrough POS: " + strikethrough_start);
4055 }
4056 }
4057
4058 // End Strikethrough if text only contains one character.
4059 if (beginStrikethrough && m_characterCount == 1)
4060 {
4061 beginStrikethrough = false;
4062 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4063
4064 DrawUnderlineMesh(strikethrough_start, strikethrough_end, ref last_vert_index, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, xScale, strikethroughColor);
4065 }
4066 else if (beginStrikethrough && i == lineInfo.lastCharacterIndex)
4067 {
4068 // Terminate Strikethrough at previous visible character if space or carriage return.
4069 if (char.IsWhiteSpace(unicode) || unicode == 0x200B)
4070 {
4071 int lastVisibleCharacterIndex = lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex;
4072 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4073 }
4074 else
4075 {
4076 // Terminate Strikethrough at last character of line.
4077 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4078 }
4079
4080 beginStrikethrough = false;
4081 DrawUnderlineMesh(strikethrough_start, strikethrough_end, ref last_vert_index, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, xScale, strikethroughColor);
4082 }
4083 else if (beginStrikethrough && i < m_characterCount && (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i + 1].pointSize != strikethroughPointSize || !TMP_Math.Approximately(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i + 1].baseLine + offset.y, strikethroughBaseline)))
4084 {
4085 // Terminate Strikethrough if scale changes.
4086 beginStrikethrough = false;
4087
4088 int lastVisibleCharacterIndex = lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex;
4089 if (i > lastVisibleCharacterIndex)
4090 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastVisibleCharacterIndex].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4091 else
4092 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4093
4094 DrawUnderlineMesh(strikethrough_start, strikethrough_end, ref last_vert_index, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, xScale, strikethroughColor);
4095 //Debug.Log("Char [" + currentCharacter + "] at Index: " + i + " End Strikethrough POS: " + strikethrough_end + " Baseline: " + m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine.ToString("f3"));
4096 }
4097 else if (beginStrikethrough && i < m_characterCount && currentFontAsset.GetInstanceID() != characterInfos[i + 1].fontAsset.GetInstanceID())
4098 {
4099 // Terminate Strikethrough if font asset changes.
4100 beginStrikethrough = false;
4101 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4102
4103 DrawUnderlineMesh(strikethrough_start, strikethrough_end, ref last_vert_index, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, xScale, strikethroughColor);
4104 }
4105 else if (beginStrikethrough && !isStrikeThroughVisible)
4106 {
4107 // Terminate Strikethrough if character is not visible.
4108 beginStrikethrough = false;
4109 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4110
4111 DrawUnderlineMesh(strikethrough_start, strikethrough_end, ref last_vert_index, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, xScale, strikethroughColor);
4112 }
4113 }
4114 else
4115 {
4116 // End Strikethrough
4117 if (beginStrikethrough == true)
4118 {
4119 beginStrikethrough = false;
4120 strikethrough_end = new Vector3(m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].topRight.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i - 1].baseLine + strikethroughOffset * strikethroughScale, 0);
4121
4122 DrawUnderlineMesh(strikethrough_start, strikethrough_end, ref last_vert_index, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, strikethroughScale, xScale, strikethroughColor);
4123 }
4124 }
4125 #endregion
4126
4127
4128 // HANDLE TEXT HIGHLIGHTING
4129 #region Text Highlighting
4130 bool isHighlight = (m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].style & FontStyles.Highlight) == FontStyles.Highlight;
4131 if (isHighlight)
4132 {
4133 bool isHighlightVisible = true;
4134 int currentPage = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].pageNumber;
4135
4136 if (i > m_maxVisibleCharacters || currentLine > m_maxVisibleLines || (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page && currentPage + 1 != m_pageToDisplay))
4137 isHighlightVisible = false;
4138
4139 if (beginHighlight == false && isHighlightVisible == true && i <= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && unicode != 10 && unicode != 11 && unicode != 13)
4140 {
4141 if (i == lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex && char.IsSeparator(unicode))
4142 { }
4143 else
4144 {
4145 beginHighlight = true;
4146 highlight_start = k_LargePositiveVector2;
4147 highlight_end = k_LargeNegativeVector2;
4148 highlightState = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].highlightState;
4149 }
4150 }
4151
4152 if (beginHighlight)
4153 {
4154 TMP_CharacterInfo currentCharacter = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i];
4155 HighlightState currentState = currentCharacter.highlightState;
4156
4157 bool isColorTransition = false;
4158
4159 // Handle Highlight color changes
4160 if (highlightState != currentCharacter.highlightState)
4161 {
4162 // Adjust previous highlight section to prevent a gaps between sections.
4163 highlight_end.x = (highlight_end.x - highlightState.padding.right + currentCharacter.bottomLeft.x) / 2;
4164
4165 highlight_start.y = Mathf.Min(highlight_start.y, currentCharacter.descender);
4166 highlight_end.y = Mathf.Max(highlight_end.y, currentCharacter.ascender);
4167
4168 DrawTextHighlight(highlight_start, highlight_end, ref last_vert_index, highlightState.color);
4169
4170 beginHighlight = true;
4171 highlight_start = new Vector2(highlight_end.x, currentCharacter.descender - currentState.padding.bottom);
4172 highlight_end = new Vector2(currentCharacter.topRight.x + currentState.padding.right, currentCharacter.ascender + currentState.padding.top);
4173
4174 highlightState = currentCharacter.highlightState;
4175
4176 isColorTransition = true;
4177 }
4178
4179 if (!isColorTransition)
4180 {
4181 // Use the Min / Max Extents of the Highlight area to handle different character sizes and fonts.
4182 highlight_start.x = Mathf.Min(highlight_start.x, currentCharacter.bottomLeft.x - highlightState.padding.left);
4183 highlight_start.y = Mathf.Min(highlight_start.y, currentCharacter.descender - highlightState.padding.bottom);
4184
4185 highlight_end.x = Mathf.Max(highlight_end.x, currentCharacter.topRight.x + highlightState.padding.right);
4186 highlight_end.y = Mathf.Max(highlight_end.y, currentCharacter.ascender + highlightState.padding.top);
4187 }
4188 }
4189
4190 // End Highlight if text only contains one character.
4191 if (beginHighlight && m_characterCount == 1)
4192 {
4193 beginHighlight = false;
4194
4195 DrawTextHighlight(highlight_start, highlight_end, ref last_vert_index, highlightState.color);
4196 }
4197 else if (beginHighlight && (i == lineInfo.lastCharacterIndex || i >= lineInfo.lastVisibleCharacterIndex))
4198 {
4199 beginHighlight = false;
4200 DrawTextHighlight(highlight_start, highlight_end, ref last_vert_index, highlightState.color);
4201 }
4202 else if (beginHighlight && !isHighlightVisible)
4203 {
4204 beginHighlight = false;
4205 DrawTextHighlight(highlight_start, highlight_end, ref last_vert_index, highlightState.color);
4206 }
4207 }
4208 else
4209 {
4210 // End Highlight
4211 if (beginHighlight == true)
4212 {
4213 beginHighlight = false;
4214 DrawTextHighlight(highlight_start, highlight_end, ref last_vert_index, highlightState.color);
4215 }
4216 }
4217 #endregion
4218
4219 lastLine = currentLine;
4220 }
4221 #endregion
4222
4223 // Set vertex count for Underline geometry
4224 //m_textInfo.meshInfo[m_Underline.materialIndex].vertexCount = last_vert_index;
4225
4226 // METRICS ABOUT THE TEXT OBJECT
4227 m_textInfo.characterCount = m_characterCount;
4228 m_textInfo.spriteCount = m_spriteCount;
4229 m_textInfo.lineCount = lineCount;
4230 m_textInfo.wordCount = wordCount != 0 && m_characterCount > 0 ? wordCount : 1;
4231 m_textInfo.pageCount = m_pageNumber + 1;
4232
4233 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
4234 // End Sampling of Phase II
4235 Profiler.EndSample();
4236
4237 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP GenerateText() - Phase III");
4238 #endif
4239
4240 // Phase III - Update Mesh Vertex Data
4241 if (m_renderMode == TextRenderFlags.Render && IsActive())
4242 {
4243 // Event to allow users to modify the content of the text info before the text is rendered.
4244 OnPreRenderText?.Invoke(m_textInfo);
4245
4246 // Sort the geometry of the text object if needed.
4247 if (m_geometrySortingOrder != VertexSortingOrder.Normal)
4248 m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].SortGeometry(VertexSortingOrder.Reverse);
4249
4250 // Upload Mesh Data
4251 m_mesh.MarkDynamic();
4252 m_mesh.vertices = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].vertices;
4253 m_mesh.uv = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs0;
4254 m_mesh.uv2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs2;
4255 //m_mesh.uv4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs4;
4256 m_mesh.colors32 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].colors32;
4257
4258 // Compute Bounds for the mesh. Manual computation is more efficient then using Mesh.recalcualteBounds.
4259 m_mesh.RecalculateBounds();
4260 //m_mesh.bounds = new Bounds(new Vector3((m_meshExtents.max.x + m_meshExtents.min.x) / 2, (m_meshExtents.max.y + m_meshExtents.min.y) / 2, 0) + offset, new Vector3(m_meshExtents.max.x - m_meshExtents.min.x, m_meshExtents.max.y - m_meshExtents.min.y, 0));
4261
4262 for (int i = 1; i < m_textInfo.materialCount; i++)
4263 {
4264 // Clear unused vertices
4265 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ClearUnusedVertices();
4266
4267 if (m_subTextObjects[i] == null) continue;
4268
4269 // Sort the geometry of the sub-text objects if needed.
4270 if (m_geometrySortingOrder != VertexSortingOrder.Normal)
4271 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].SortGeometry(VertexSortingOrder.Reverse);
4272
4273 m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.vertices = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices;
4274 m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.uv = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].uvs0;
4275 m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.uv2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].uvs2;
4276 //m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.uv4 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].uvs4;
4277 m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.colors32 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].colors32;
4278
4279 m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.RecalculateBounds();
4280
4281 // Update the collider on the sub text object
4282 //m_subTextObjects[i].UpdateColliders(m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertexCount);
4283 }
4284 }
4285
4286 // Event indicating the text has been regenerated.
4287 TMPro_EventManager.ON_TEXT_CHANGED(this);
4288
4289 //Debug.Log("***** Done rendering text object ID " + GetInstanceID() + ". *****");
4290
4291 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
4292 // End Sampling of Phase III
4293 Profiler.EndSample();
4294
4295 // End Sampling of GenerateText()
4296 Profiler.EndSample();
4297 #endif
4298 }

◆ GetAttributeParameters()

int TMPro.TMP_Text.GetAttributeParameters ( char[]  chars,
int  startIndex,
int  length,
ref float[]  parameters 
)
privateinherited

Method which returns the number of parameters used in a tag attribute and populates an array with such values.

Parameters
charsChar[] containing the tag attribute and data
startIndexThe index of the first char of the data
lengthThe length of the data
parametersThe number of parameters contained in the Char[]
Returns
7842 {
7843 int endIndex = startIndex;
7844 int attributeCount = 0;
7845
7846 while (endIndex < startIndex + length)
7847 {
7848 parameters[attributeCount] = ConvertToFloat(chars, startIndex, length, out endIndex);
7849
7850 length -= (endIndex - startIndex) + 1;
7851 startIndex = endIndex + 1;
7852
7853 attributeCount += 1;
7854 }
7855
7856 return attributeCount;
7857 }

◆ GetCompoundBounds()

override Bounds TMPro.TextMeshPro.GetCompoundBounds ( )
protectedvirtual

Method returning the compound bounds of the text object and child sub objects.

Returns

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

4382 {
4383 Bounds mainBounds = m_mesh.bounds;
4384 Vector3 min = mainBounds.min;
4385 Vector3 max = mainBounds.max;
4386
4387 for (int i = 1; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
4388 {
4389 Bounds subBounds = m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.bounds;
4390 min.x = min.x < subBounds.min.x ? min.x : subBounds.min.x;
4391 min.y = min.y < subBounds.min.y ? min.y : subBounds.min.y;
4392
4393 max.x = max.x > subBounds.max.x ? max.x : subBounds.max.x;
4394 max.y = max.y > subBounds.max.y ? max.y : subBounds.max.y;
4395 }
4396
4397 Vector3 center = (min + max) / 2;
4398 Vector2 size = max - min;
4399 return new Bounds(center, size);
4400 }

◆ GetEllipsisSpecialCharacter()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.GetEllipsisSpecialCharacter ( TMP_FontAsset  fontAsset)
protectedinherited
7192 {
7193 bool isUsingAlternativeTypeface;
7194
7195 // Search base font asset
7196 TMP_Character character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(0x2026, fontAsset, false, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7197
7198 if (character == null)
7199 {
7200 // Search primary fallback list
7201 if (fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable != null && fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable.Count > 0)
7202 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets(0x2026, fontAsset, fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7203 }
7204
7205 // Search TMP Settings general fallback list
7206 if (character == null)
7207 {
7208 if (TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets != null && TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets.Count > 0)
7209 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets(0x2026, fontAsset, TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7210 }
7211
7212 // Search TMP Settings' default font asset
7213 if (character == null)
7214 {
7215 if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
7216 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(0x2026, TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7217 }
7218
7219 if (character != null)
7220 m_Ellipsis = new SpecialCharacter(character, 0);
7221 }

7303 {
7304 bool isItalic = (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic || (m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Italic) == FontStyles.Italic;

◆ GetParsedText()

virtual string TMPro.TMP_Text.GetParsedText ( )
virtualinherited

Function which returns the text after it has been parsed and rich text tags removed.

Returns
7444 {
7445 if (m_textInfo == null)
7446 return string.Empty;
7447
7448 int characterCount = m_textInfo.characterCount;
7449
7450 // TODO - Could implement some static buffer pool shared by all instances of TMP objects.
7451 char[] buffer = new char[characterCount];
7452
7453 for (int i = 0; i < characterCount && i < m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length; i++)
7454 {
7455 buffer[i] = m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].character;
7456 }
7457
7458 return new string(buffer);
7459 }

◆ GetPreferredHeight() [1/2]

float TMPro.TMP_Text.GetPreferredHeight ( )
protectedinherited

Method to calculate the preferred height of a text object.

Returns
4983 {
4984 if (TMP_Settings.instance == null) return 0;
4985
4986 // Return cached preferred height if already computed
4987 if (!m_isPreferredHeightDirty)
4988 return m_preferredHeight;
4989
4990 float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
4991
4992 // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
4993 m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
4994 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
4995 m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
4996
4997 Vector2 margin = new Vector2(m_marginWidth != 0 ? m_marginWidth : k_LargePositiveFloat, k_LargePositiveFloat);
4998
4999 if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
5000 {
5001 m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
5002 ParseInputText();
5003 }
5004
5005 // Reset Text Auto Size iteration tracking.
5006 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = false;
5007 m_AutoSizeIterationCount = 0;
5008
5009 // The CalculatePreferredValues function is potentially called repeatedly when text auto size is enabled.
5010 // This is a revised implementation to remove the use of recursion which could potentially result in stack overflow issues.
5011 float preferredHeight = 0;
5012
5013 while (m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet == false)
5014 {
5015 preferredHeight = CalculatePreferredValues(ref fontSize, margin, m_enableAutoSizing, m_enableWordWrapping).y;
5016 m_AutoSizeIterationCount += 1;
5017 }
5018
5019 m_isPreferredHeightDirty = false;
5020
5021 //Debug.Log("GetPreferredHeight() called on Object ID: " + GetInstanceID() + " on frame: " + Time.frameCount +". Returning height of " + preferredHeight);
5022
5023 return preferredHeight;
5024 }

The margins of the text object.

virtual float preferredHeight

◆ GetPreferredHeight() [2/2]

float TMPro.TMP_Text.GetPreferredHeight ( Vector2  margin)
privateinherited

Method to calculate the preferred height of a text object.

Parameters
margin
Returns
5033 {
5034 float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
5035
5036 // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
5037 m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
5038 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
5039 m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
5040
5041 // Reset Text Auto Size iteration tracking.
5042 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = false;
5043 m_AutoSizeIterationCount = 0;
5044
5045 // The CalculatePreferredValues function is potentially called repeatedly when text auto size is enabled.
5046 // This is a revised implementation to remove the use of recursion which could potentially result in stack overflow issues.
5047 float preferredHeight = 0;
5048
5049 while (m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet == false)
5050 {
5051 preferredHeight = CalculatePreferredValues(ref fontSize, margin, m_enableAutoSizing, m_enableWordWrapping).y;
5052 m_AutoSizeIterationCount += 1;
5053 }
5054
5055 //Debug.Log("GetPreferredHeight() Called. Returning height of " + preferredHeight);
5056
5057 return preferredHeight;
5058 }

◆ GetPreferredWidth() [1/2]

float TMPro.TMP_Text.GetPreferredWidth ( )
protectedinherited

Method to calculate the preferred width of a text object.

Returns
4921 {
4922 if (TMP_Settings.instance == null) return 0;
4923
4924 // Return cached preferred height if already computed
4925 if (!m_isPreferredWidthDirty)
4926 return m_preferredWidth;
4927
4928 float fontSize = m_enableAutoSizing ? m_fontSizeMax : m_fontSize;
4929
4930 // Reset auto sizing point size bounds
4931 m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
4932 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
4933 m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
4934
4935 // Set Margins to Infinity
4936 Vector2 margin = k_LargePositiveVector2;
4937
4938 if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
4939 {
4940 m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = true;
4941 ParseInputText();
4942 }
4943
4944 m_AutoSizeIterationCount = 0;
4945 float preferredWidth = CalculatePreferredValues(ref fontSize, margin, false, false).x;
4946
4947 m_isPreferredWidthDirty = false;
4948
4949 //Debug.Log("GetPreferredWidth() called on Object ID: " + GetInstanceID() + " on frame: " + Time.frameCount + ". Returning width of " + preferredWidth);
4950
4951 return preferredWidth;
4952 }

◆ GetTagHashCode() [1/4]

int TMPro.TMP_Text.GetTagHashCode ( ref char[]  text,
int  index,
out int  closeIndex 
)
privateinherited

Get Hashcode for a given tag.

Parameters
text
index
closeIndex
Returns
4636 {
4637 int hashCode = 0;
4638 closeIndex = 0;
4639
4640 for (int i = index; i < text.Length; i++)
4641 {
4642 // Skip quote '"' character
4643 if (text[i] == 34) continue;
4644
4645 // Break at '>'
4646 if (text[i] == 62) { closeIndex = i; break; }
4647
4648 hashCode = (hashCode << 5) + hashCode ^ TMP_TextParsingUtilities.ToUpperASCIIFast(text[i]);
4649 }
4650
4651 return hashCode;
4652 }

◆ GetTextBounds() [1/2]

Bounds TMPro.TMP_Text.GetTextBounds ( )
protectedinherited

Method which returns the bounds of the text object;

Returns
6005 {
6006 if (m_textInfo == null || m_textInfo.characterCount > m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length) return new Bounds();
6007
6008 Extents extent = new Extents(k_LargePositiveVector2, k_LargeNegativeVector2);
6009
6010 for (int i = 0; i < m_textInfo.characterCount && i < m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length; i++)
6011 {
6012 if (!m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].isVisible) continue;
6013
6014 extent.min.x = Mathf.Min(extent.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].bottomLeft.x);
6015 extent.min.y = Mathf.Min(extent.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender);
6016
6017 extent.max.x = Mathf.Max(extent.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].xAdvance);
6018 extent.max.y = Mathf.Max(extent.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender);
6019 }
6020
6021 Vector2 size;
6022 size.x = extent.max.x - extent.min.x;
6023 size.y = extent.max.y - extent.min.y;
6024
6025 Vector3 center = (extent.min + extent.max) / 2;
6026
6027 return new Bounds(center, size);
6028 }

◆ GetTextBounds() [2/2]

Bounds TMPro.TMP_Text.GetTextBounds ( bool  onlyVisibleCharacters)
protectedinherited

Method which returns the bounds of the text object;

Parameters
onlyVisibleCharacters
Returns
6037 {
6038 if (m_textInfo == null) return new Bounds();
6039
6040 Extents extent = new Extents(k_LargePositiveVector2, k_LargeNegativeVector2);
6041
6042 for (int i = 0; i < m_textInfo.characterCount; i++)
6043 {
6044 if ((i > maxVisibleCharacters || m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].lineNumber > m_maxVisibleLines) && onlyVisibleCharacters) break;
6045
6046 if (onlyVisibleCharacters && !m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].isVisible) continue;
6047
6048 extent.min.x = Mathf.Min(extent.min.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].origin);
6049 extent.min.y = Mathf.Min(extent.min.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].descender);
6050
6051 extent.max.x = Mathf.Max(extent.max.x, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].xAdvance);
6052 extent.max.y = Mathf.Max(extent.max.y, m_textInfo.characterInfo[i].ascender);
6053 }
6054
6055 Vector2 size;
6056 size.x = extent.max.x - extent.min.x;
6057 size.y = extent.max.y - extent.min.y;
6058
6059 Vector2 center = (extent.min + extent.max) / 2;
6060
6061 return new Bounds(center, size);
6062 }

int maxVisibleCharacters
Allows to control how many characters are visible from the input.
Definition: TMP_Text.cs:1053

◆ GetTextElement()

TMP_TextElement TMPro.TMP_Text.GetTextElement ( uint  unicode,
TMP_FontAsset  fontAsset,
FontStyles  fontStyle,
FontWeight  fontWeight,
out bool  isUsingAlternativeTypeface 
)
packageinherited
7319 {
7320 TMP_Character character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(unicode, fontAsset, false, fontStyle, fontWeight, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7321
7322 if (character != null)
7323 return character;
7324
7325 // Search potential list of fallback font assets assigned to the font asset.
7326 if (fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable != null && fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable.Count > 0)
7327 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets(unicode, fontAsset, fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable, true, fontStyle, fontWeight, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7328
7329 if (character != null)
7330 {
7331 // Add character to font asset lookup cache
7332 //fontAsset.AddCharacterToLookupCache(unicode, character);
7333
7334 return character;
7335 }
7336
7337 // Search for the character in the primary font asset if not the current font asset
7338 if (fontAsset.instanceID != m_fontAsset.instanceID)
7339 {
7340 // Search primary font asset
7341 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(unicode, m_fontAsset, false, fontStyle, fontWeight, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7342
7343 // Use material and index of primary font asset.
7344 if (character != null)
7345 {
7346 m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
7347 m_currentMaterial = m_materialReferences[0].material;
7348
7349 // Add character to font asset lookup cache
7350 //fontAsset.AddCharacterToLookupCache(unicode, character);
7351
7352 return character;
7353 }
7354
7355 // Search list of potential fallback font assets assigned to the primary font asset.
7356 if (m_fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable != null && m_fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable.Count > 0)
7357 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets(unicode, fontAsset, m_fontAsset.m_FallbackFontAssetTable, true, fontStyle, fontWeight, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7358
7359 if (character != null)
7360 {
7361 // Add character to font asset lookup cache
7362 //fontAsset.AddCharacterToLookupCache(unicode, character);
7363
7364 return character;
7365 }
7366 }
7367
7368 // Search for the character in potential local Sprite Asset assigned to the text object.
7369 if (m_spriteAsset != null)
7370 {
7371 TMP_SpriteCharacter spriteCharacter = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetSpriteCharacterFromSpriteAsset(unicode, m_spriteAsset, true);
7372
7373 if (spriteCharacter != null)
7374 return spriteCharacter;
7375 }
7376
7377 // Search for the character in the list of fallback assigned in the TMP Settings (General Fallbacks).
7378 if (TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets != null && TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets.Count > 0)
7379 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets(unicode, fontAsset, TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets, true, fontStyle, fontWeight, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7380
7381 if (character != null)
7382 {
7383 // Add character to font asset lookup cache
7384 //fontAsset.AddCharacterToLookupCache(unicode, character);
7385
7386 return character;
7387 }
7388
7389 // Search for the character in the Default Font Asset assigned in the TMP Settings file.
7390 if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
7391 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset(unicode, TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset, true, fontStyle, fontWeight, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
7392
7393 if (character != null)
7394 {
7395 // Add character to font asset lookup cache
7396 //fontAsset.AddCharacterToLookupCache(unicode, character);
7397
7398 return character;
7399 }
7400
7401 // Search for the character in the Default Sprite Asset assigned in the TMP Settings file.
7402 if (TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset != null)
7403 {
7404 TMP_SpriteCharacter spriteCharacter = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetSpriteCharacterFromSpriteAsset(unicode, TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset, true);
7405
7406 if (spriteCharacter != null)
7407 return spriteCharacter;
7408 }
7409
7410 return null;
7411 }

◆ GetUTF16() [1/3]

)

7643 {
7644 int unicode = 0;
7645 unicode += HexToInt((char)text[i]) << 12;
7646 unicode += HexToInt((char)text[i + 1]) << 8;
7647 unicode += HexToInt((char)text[i + 2]) << 4;

◆ GetUTF16() [2/3]

int TMPro.TMP_Text.GetUTF16 ( string  text,

Parameters
iThe index.
7633 {
7634 int unicode = 0;
7635 unicode += HexToInt(text[i]) << 12;
7636 unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 1]) << 8;
7637 unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 2]) << 4;
7638 unicode += HexToInt(text[i + 3]);
7639 return unicode;
7640 }

7690 unicode += HexToInt((char)text[i]) << 28;

Method to convert Hex Color values to Color32

Parameters

length
Returns
7810 {
7811 if (length == 7)
7812 {
7813 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 2]));
7814 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 4]));
7815 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 6]));
7816
7817 return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
7818 }
7819 else if (length == 9)
7820 {
7821 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 2]));
7822 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 4]));
7823 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 6]));
7824 byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[startIndex + 8]));
7825
7826 return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
7827 }
7828
7829 return s_colorWhite;
7830 }

7728 {
7729 if (tagCount == 4)
7730 {
7731 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[1]));
7732 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[2]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
7733 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[3]));
7734
7735 return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
7736 }
7737 else if (tagCount == 5)
7738 {
7739 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[1]));
7740 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[2]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
7741 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[3]));
7742 byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[4]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[4]));
7743
7744 return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
7745 }
7746 else if (tagCount == 7)
7747 {
7748 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
7749 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[4]));
7750 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[6]));
7751
7752 return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
7753 }
7754 else if (tagCount == 9)
7755 {
7756 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[1]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[2]));
7757 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[3]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[4]));
7758 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[5]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[6]));
7759 byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
7760
7761 return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
7762 }
7763 else if (tagCount == 10)
7764 {
7765 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[7]));
7766 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[8]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
7767 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[9]));
7768
7769 return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
7770 }
7771 else if (tagCount == 11)
7772 {
7773 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[7]));
7774 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[8]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
7775 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[9]));
7776 byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[10]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[10]));
7777
7778 return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
7779 }
7780 else if (tagCount == 13)
7781 {
7782 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
7783 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[10]));
7784 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[11]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[12]));
7785
7786 return new Color32(r, g, b, 255);
7787 }
7788 else if (tagCount == 15)
7789 {
7790 byte r = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[8]));
7791 byte g = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[9]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[10]));
7792 byte b = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[11]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[12]));
7793 byte a = (byte)(HexToInt(hexChars[13]) * 16 + HexToInt(hexChars[14]));
7794
7795 return new Color32(r, g, b, a);
7796 }
7797
7798 return new Color32(255, 255, 255, 255);
7799 }

◆ InsertClosingStyleTag()

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.InsertClosingStyleTag ( ref UnicodeChar[]  charBuffer,
ref int  writeIndex 
)
privateinherited
4414 {
4415 // Get style from the Style Stack
4416 int hashCode = m_TextStyleStacks[0].Pop();
4417 TMP_Style style = GetStyle(hashCode);
4418
4419 int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
4420
4421 // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
4422 int[] tagDefinition = style.styleClosingTagArray;
4423
4424 for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
4425 {
4426 int c = tagDefinition[i];
4427
4428 if (c == '\\' && i + 1 < styleLength)
4429 {
4430 switch (tagDefinition[i + 1])
4431 {
4432 case '\\':
4433 i += 1;
4434 break;
4435 case 'n':
4436 c = 10;
4437 i += 1;
4438 break;
4439 case 'r':
4440 break;
4441 case 't':
4442 break;
4443 case 'u':
4444 // UTF16 format is "\uFF00" or u + 2 hex pairs.
4445 if (i + 5 < styleLength)
4446 {
4447 c = GetUTF16(tagDefinition, i + 2);
4448
4449 i += 5;
4450 }
4451 break;
4452 case 'U':
4453 // UTF32 format is "\UFF00FF00" or U + 4 hex pairs.
4454 if (i + 9 < styleLength)
4455 {
4456 c = GetUTF32(tagDefinition, i + 2);
4457
4458 i += 9;
4459 }
4460 break;
4461 }
4462 }
4463
4464
4465 if (c == 60)
4466 {
4467 if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<BR>", i))
4468 {
4469 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4470
4471 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
4472 writeIndex += 1;
4473 i += 3;
4474
4475 continue;
4476 }
4477 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<NBSP>", i))
4478 {
4479 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4480
4481 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
4482 writeIndex += 1;
4483 i += 5;
4484
4485 continue;
4486 }
4487 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<ZWSP>", i))
4488 {
4489 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4490
4491 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
4492 writeIndex += 1;
4493 i += 5;
4494
4495 continue;
4496 }
4497 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<STYLE=", i))
4498 {
4499 int offset;
4500 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, out offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
4501 {
4502 i = offset;
4503 continue;
4504 }
4505 }
4506 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "</STYLE>", i))
4507 {
4508 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
4509
4510 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
4511 i += 7;
4512 continue;
4513 }
4514 }
4515
4516 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4517
4518 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
4519 writeIndex += 1;
4520 }
4521
4522 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
4523 return true;
4524 }

TMP_Style GetStyle(int hashCode)

◆ InsertNewLine()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.InsertNewLine ( int  i,
float  baseScale,
float  currentElementScale,
float  currentEmScale,
float  glyphAdjustment,
float  boldSpacingAdjustment,
float  characterSpacingAdjustment,
float  width,
float  lineGap,
ref bool  isMaxVisibleDescenderSet,
ref float  maxVisibleDescender 
)
protectedinherited

Function used in conjunction with GetTextInfo to figure out Array allocations.

Parameters
chars
Returns
6196 {
6197 // Adjust line spacing if necessary
6198 float baselineAdjustmentDelta = m_maxLineAscender - m_startOfLineAscender;
6199 if (m_lineOffset > 0 && Math.Abs(baselineAdjustmentDelta) > 0.01f && m_IsDrivenLineSpacing == false && !m_isNewPage)
6200 {
6201 AdjustLineOffset(m_firstCharacterOfLine, m_characterCount, baselineAdjustmentDelta);
6202 m_ElementDescender -= baselineAdjustmentDelta;
6203 m_lineOffset += baselineAdjustmentDelta;
6204 }
6205
6206 // Calculate lineAscender & make sure if last character is superscript or subscript that we check that as well.
6207 float lineAscender = m_maxLineAscender - m_lineOffset;
6208 float lineDescender = m_maxLineDescender - m_lineOffset;
6209
6210 // Update maxDescender and maxVisibleDescender
6211 m_ElementDescender = m_ElementDescender < lineDescender ? m_ElementDescender : lineDescender;
6212 if (!isMaxVisibleDescenderSet)
6213 maxVisibleDescender = m_ElementDescender;
6214
6215 if (m_useMaxVisibleDescender && (m_characterCount >= m_maxVisibleCharacters || m_lineNumber >= m_maxVisibleLines))
6216 isMaxVisibleDescenderSet = true;
6217
6218 // Track & Store lineInfo for the new line
6219 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex = m_firstCharacterOfLine;
6220 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstVisibleCharacterIndex = m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_firstCharacterOfLine > m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstCharacterOfLine : m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine;
6221 int lastCharacterIndex = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex = m_lastCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount - 1 > 0 ? m_characterCount - 1 : 0;
6222 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastVisibleCharacterIndex = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine = m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine < m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine ? m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine : m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine;
6223
6224 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].characterCount = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lastCharacterIndex - m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].firstCharacterIndex + 1;
6225 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].visibleCharacterCount = m_lineVisibleCharacterCount;
6226 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.min = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_firstVisibleCharacterOfLine].bottomLeft.x, lineDescender);
6227 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max = new Vector2(m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].topRight.x, lineAscender);
6228 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].length = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineExtents.max.x;
6229 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].width = width;
6230
6231 float maxAdvanceOffset = ((glyphAdjustment + boldSpacingAdjustment) * currentElementScale + (m_currentFontAsset.normalSpacingOffset + characterSpacingAdjustment) * currentEmScale - m_cSpacing) * (1 - m_charWidthAdjDelta);
6232 float adjustedHorizontalAdvance = m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].maxAdvance = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_lastVisibleCharacterOfLine].xAdvance + (m_isRightToLeft ? maxAdvanceOffset : - maxAdvanceOffset);
6233 m_textInfo.characterInfo[lastCharacterIndex].xAdvance = adjustedHorizontalAdvance;
6234
6235 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].baseline = 0 - m_lineOffset;
6236 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].ascender = lineAscender;
6237 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].descender = lineDescender;
6238 m_textInfo.lineInfo[m_lineNumber].lineHeight = lineAscender - lineDescender + lineGap * baseScale;
6239
6240 m_firstCharacterOfLine = m_characterCount; // Store first character of the next line.
6241 m_lineVisibleCharacterCount = 0;
6242
6243 // Store the state of the line before starting on the new line.
6244 SaveWordWrappingState(ref m_SavedLineState, i, m_characterCount - 1);
6245
6246 m_lineNumber += 1;
6247
6248 // Check to make sure Array is large enough to hold a new line.
6249 if (m_lineNumber >= m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
6250 ResizeLineExtents(m_lineNumber);
6251
6252 // Apply Line Spacing based on scale of the last character of the line.
6253 if (m_lineHeight == TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET)
6254 {
6255 float ascender = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].adjustedAscender;
6256 float lineOffsetDelta = 0 - m_maxLineDescender + ascender + (lineGap + m_lineSpacingDelta) * baseScale + m_lineSpacing * currentEmScale;
6257 m_lineOffset += lineOffsetDelta;
6258
6259 m_startOfLineAscender = ascender;
6260 }
6261 else
6262 {
6263 m_lineOffset += m_lineHeight + m_lineSpacing * currentEmScale;
6264 }
6265
6266 m_maxLineAscender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
6267 m_maxLineDescender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
6268
6269 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_Indent;
6270 }

4300 {
4301 // Return if we don't have a valid style.

4303

4310

4313 int c = tagDefinition[i];
4314
4315 if (c == '\\' && i + 1 < styleLength)
4316 {
4317 switch (tagDefinition[i + 1])
4318 {
4319 case '\\':
4320 i += 1;
4321 break;
4322 case 'n':
4323 c = 10;
4324 i += 1;
4325 break;
4326 case 'r':

4328 case 't':

4409

◆ InternalUpdate()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.InternalUpdate ( )
packagevirtual

Function used as a replacement for LateUpdate to check if the transform or scale of the text object has changed.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

1456 {
1457 // We need to update the SDF scale or possibly regenerate the text object if lossy scale has changed.
1458 if (m_havePropertiesChanged == false)
1459 {
1460 float lossyScaleY = m_rectTransform.lossyScale.y;
1461
1462 // Ignore very small lossy scale changes as their effect on SDF Scale would not be visually noticeable.
1463 // Do not update SDF Scale if the text is null or empty
1464 if (Mathf.Abs(lossyScaleY - m_previousLossyScaleY) > 0.0001f && m_InternalParsingBuffer[0].unicode != 0)
1465 {
1466 float scaleDelta = lossyScaleY / m_previousLossyScaleY;
1467
1468 UpdateSDFScale(scaleDelta);
1469
1470 m_previousLossyScaleY = lossyScaleY;
1471 }
1472 }
1473
1474 // Added to handle legacy animation mode.
1475 if (m_isUsingLegacyAnimationComponent)
1476 {
1477 //if (m_havePropertiesChanged)
1478 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
1479 OnPreRenderObject();
1480 }
1481 }
TMPro.TextMeshPro.UpdateSDFScale
void UpdateSDFScale(float scaleDelta)
Method to Update Scale in UV2
Definition: TMPro_Private.cs:4445

◆ IsSelfOrLinkedAncestor()

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.IsSelfOrLinkedAncestor ( TMP_Text  targetTextComponent)
packageinherited
7463 {
7464 if (targetTextComponent == null)
7465 return true;
7466
7467 if (parentLinkedComponent != null)
7468 {
7469 if (parentLinkedComponent.IsSelfOrLinkedAncestor(targetTextComponent))
7470 return true;
7471 }
7472
7473 if (this.GetInstanceID() == targetTextComponent.GetInstanceID())
7474 return true;
7475
7476 return false;
7477 }

◆ IsTagName() [1/4]

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.IsTagName ( ref char[]  text,
string  tag,
int  index 
)
privateinherited

Method to check for a matching rich text tag.

Parameters
text
tag
index
Returns
4553 {
4554 if (text.Length < index + tag.Length) return false;
4555
4556 for (int i = 0; i < tag.Length; i++)
4557 {
4558 if (TMP_TextUtilities.ToUpperFast(text[index + i]) != tag[i]) return false;
4559 }
4560
4561 return true;
4562 }

◆ LoadDefaultSettings()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.LoadDefaultSettings ( )
protectedinherited

Internal function used to load the default settings of text objects.

7127 {
7128 if (m_fontAsset == null || m_isWaitingOnResourceLoad)
7129 {
7130 m_rectTransform = this.rectTransform;
7131
7132 if (TMP_Settings.autoSizeTextContainer)
7133 {
7134 autoSizeTextContainer = true;
7135 }
7136 else
7137 {
7138 if (GetType() == typeof(TextMeshPro))
7139 {
7140 if (m_rectTransform.sizeDelta == new Vector2(100, 100))
7141 m_rectTransform.sizeDelta = TMP_Settings.defaultTextMeshProTextContainerSize;
7142 }
7143 else
7144 {
7145 if (m_rectTransform.sizeDelta == new Vector2(100, 100))
7146 m_rectTransform.sizeDelta = TMP_Settings.defaultTextMeshProUITextContainerSize;
7147 }
7148
7149 }
7150
7151 m_enableWordWrapping = TMP_Settings.enableWordWrapping;
7152 m_enableKerning = TMP_Settings.enableKerning;
7153 m_enableExtraPadding = TMP_Settings.enableExtraPadding;
7154 m_tintAllSprites = TMP_Settings.enableTintAllSprites;
7155 m_parseCtrlCharacters = TMP_Settings.enableParseEscapeCharacters;
7156 m_fontSize = m_fontSizeBase = TMP_Settings.defaultFontSize;
7157 m_fontSizeMin = m_fontSize * TMP_Settings.defaultTextAutoSizingMinRatio;
7158 m_fontSizeMax = m_fontSize * TMP_Settings.defaultTextAutoSizingMaxRatio;
7159 m_isWaitingOnResourceLoad = false;
7160 raycastTarget = TMP_Settings.enableRaycastTarget;
7161 m_IsTextObjectScaleStatic = TMP_Settings.isTextObjectScaleStatic;
7162 }
7163 else if ((int)m_textAlignment < 0xFF)
7164 {
7165 // Convert Legacy TextAlignmentOptions enumerations from Unity 5.2 / 5.3.
7166 m_textAlignment = TMP_Compatibility.ConvertTextAlignmentEnumValues(m_textAlignment);
7167 }
7168
7169 // Convert text alignment to independent horizontal and vertical alignment properties
7170 if (m_textAlignment != TextAlignmentOptions.Converted)
7171 {
7172 m_HorizontalAlignment = (HorizontalAlignmentOptions)((int)m_textAlignment & 0xFF);
7173 m_VerticalAlignment = (VerticalAlignmentOptions)((int)m_textAlignment & 0xFF00);
7174 m_textAlignment = TextAlignmentOptions.Converted;
7175 }
7176 }

Enables control over setting the size of the text container to match the text object.

◆ LoadFontAsset()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.LoadFontAsset ( )
protectedvirtual

Method which derived classes need to override to load Font Assets.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

459 {
460 //Debug.Log("TextMeshPro LoadFontAsset() has been called."); // Current Font Asset is " + (font != null ? font.name: "Null") );
461
462 ShaderUtilities.GetShaderPropertyIDs(); // Initialize & Get shader property IDs.
463
464 if (m_fontAsset == null)
465 {
466 if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
467 m_fontAsset =TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset;
468 else
469 m_fontAsset = Resources.Load<TMP_FontAsset>("Fonts & Materials/LiberationSans SDF");
470
471 if (m_fontAsset == null)
472 {
473 Debug.LogWarning("The LiberationSans SDF Font Asset was not found. There is no Font Asset assigned to " + gameObject.name + ".", this);
474 return;
475 }
476
477 if (m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
478 {
479 Debug.Log("Dictionary is Null!");
480 }
481
482 m_sharedMaterial = m_fontAsset.material;
483 m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat("_CullMode", 0);
484 m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_ZTestMode, 4);
485
486 m_renderer.receiveShadows = false;
487 m_renderer.shadowCastingMode = UnityEngine.Rendering.ShadowCastingMode.Off;
488 }
489 else
490 {
491 if (m_fontAsset.characterLookupTable == null)
492 m_fontAsset.ReadFontAssetDefinition();
493
494 // If font atlas texture doesn't match the assigned material font atlas, switch back to default material specified in the Font Asset.
495 if (m_sharedMaterial == null || m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex) == null || m_fontAsset.atlasTexture.GetInstanceID() != m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
496 {
497 if (m_fontAsset.material == null)
498 Debug.LogWarning("The Font Atlas Texture of the Font Asset " + m_fontAsset.name + " assigned to " + gameObject.name + " is missing.", this);
499 else
500 m_sharedMaterial = m_fontAsset.material;
501 }
502
503 m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_ZTestMode, 4);
504
505 // Check if we are using the SDF Surface Shader
506 if (m_sharedMaterial.passCount == 1)
507 {
508 m_renderer.receiveShadows = false;
509 m_renderer.shadowCastingMode = UnityEngine.Rendering.ShadowCastingMode.Off;
510 }
511
512 }
513
514 m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial();
515 m_isMaskingEnabled = ShaderUtilities.IsMaskingEnabled(m_sharedMaterial);
516
517 // Find and cache Underline & Ellipsis characters.
518 GetSpecialCharacters(m_fontAsset);
519
520 SetMaterialDirty();
521 }

195 {
196 //Debug.Log("***** OnDestroy() called on object ID " + GetInstanceID() + ". *****");
197
198 // Destroy the mesh if we have one.
199 if (m_mesh != null)
200 DestroyImmediate(m_mesh);
201
202 // Unregister the event this object was listening to
203 #if UNITY_EDITOR
204 TMPro_EventManager.MATERIAL_PROPERTY_EVENT.Remove(ON_MATERIAL_PROPERTY_CHANGED);
205 TMPro_EventManager.FONT_PROPERTY_EVENT.Remove(ON_FONT_PROPERTY_CHANGED);
206 TMPro_EventManager.TEXTMESHPRO_PROPERTY_EVENT.Remove(ON_TEXTMESHPRO_PROPERTY_CHANGED);
207 TMPro_EventManager.DRAG_AND_DROP_MATERIAL_EVENT.Remove(ON_DRAG_AND_DROP_MATERIAL);
208 TMPro_EventManager.TEXT_STYLE_PROPERTY_EVENT.Remove(ON_TEXT_STYLE_CHANGED);
209 TMPro_EventManager.COLOR_GRADIENT_PROPERTY_EVENT.Remove(ON_COLOR_GRADIENT_CHANGED);
210 TMPro_EventManager.TMP_SETTINGS_PROPERTY_EVENT.Remove(ON_TMP_SETTINGS_CHANGED);
211 TMPro_EventManager.RESOURCE_LOAD_EVENT.Remove(ON_RESOURCES_LOADED);
212
213 UnityEditor.PrefabUtility.prefabInstanceUpdated -= OnPrefabInstanceUpdate;
214 #endif
215
216 m_isRegisteredForEvents = false;
217 TMP_UpdateManager.UnRegisterTextElementForRebuild(this);
218 TMP_UpdateManager.UnRegisterTextObjectForUpdate(this);
219 }

◆ OnEnable()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.OnEnable ( )
protected
137 {
138 //Debug.Log("***** OnEnable() called on object ID " + GetInstanceID() + ". *****");
139
140 // Return if Awake() has not been called on the text object.
141 if (m_isAwake == false)
142 return;
143
144 // Register Callbacks for various events.
145 if (!m_isRegisteredForEvents)
146 {
147 #if UNITY_EDITOR
148 TMPro_EventManager.MATERIAL_PROPERTY_EVENT.Add(ON_MATERIAL_PROPERTY_CHANGED);
149 TMPro_EventManager.FONT_PROPERTY_EVENT.Add(ON_FONT_PROPERTY_CHANGED);
150 TMPro_EventManager.TEXTMESHPRO_PROPERTY_EVENT.Add(ON_TEXTMESHPRO_PROPERTY_CHANGED);
151 TMPro_EventManager.DRAG_AND_DROP_MATERIAL_EVENT.Add(ON_DRAG_AND_DROP_MATERIAL);
152 TMPro_EventManager.TEXT_STYLE_PROPERTY_EVENT.Add(ON_TEXT_STYLE_CHANGED);
153 TMPro_EventManager.COLOR_GRADIENT_PROPERTY_EVENT.Add(ON_COLOR_GRADIENT_CHANGED);
154 TMPro_EventManager.TMP_SETTINGS_PROPERTY_EVENT.Add(ON_TMP_SETTINGS_CHANGED);
155
156 UnityEditor.PrefabUtility.prefabInstanceUpdated += OnPrefabInstanceUpdate;
157 #endif
158 m_isRegisteredForEvents = true;
159 }
160
161 // Register text object for internal updates
162 if (m_IsTextObjectScaleStatic == false)
163 TMP_UpdateManager.RegisterTextObjectForUpdate(this);
164
165 meshFilter.sharedMesh = mesh;
166 SetActiveSubMeshes(true);
167
168 // Schedule potential text object update (if any of the properties have changed.
169 ComputeMarginSize();
170
171 m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
172 SetAllDirty();
173
174 //m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
175 }

◆ OnPreRenderObject()

void TMPro.TextMeshPro.OnPreRenderObject ( )
private

Function called when the text needs to be updated.

1488 {
1489 //Debug.Log("*** OnPreRenderObject() called on object [" + this.name + "] ***");
1490
1491 if (!m_isAwake || (this.IsActive() == false && m_ignoreActiveState == false)) return;
1492
1493 // Check if we have a font asset assigned. Return if we don't because no one likes to see purple squares on screen.
1494 if (m_fontAsset == null)
1495 {
1496 Debug.LogWarning("Please assign a Font Asset to this " + transform.name + " gameobject.", this);
1497 return;
1498 }
1499
1500 // Debug Variables
1501 //loopCountB = 0;
1502 //loopCountC = 0;
1503 //loopCountD = 0;
1504 //loopCountE = 0;
1505
1506 if (m_havePropertiesChanged || m_isLayoutDirty)
1507 {
1508 //Debug.Log("Properties have changed!"); // Assigned Material is:" + m_sharedMaterial); // New Text is: " + m_text + ".");
1509
1510 if (isMaskUpdateRequired)
1511 {
1512 UpdateMask();
1513 isMaskUpdateRequired = false;
1514 }
1515
1516 // Update mesh padding if necessary.
1517 if (checkPaddingRequired)
1518 UpdateMeshPadding();
1519
1520 // Reparse the text if the input has changed or text was truncated.
1521 if (m_isInputParsingRequired || m_isTextTruncated)
1522 {
1523 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1524 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP - ParseInputText()");
1525 #endif
1526
1527 ParseInputText();
1528
1529 TMP_FontAsset.UpdateFontFeaturesForFontAssetsInQueue();
1530
1531 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1532 Profiler.EndSample();
1533 #endif
1534 }
1535
1536 // Reset Font min / max used with Auto-sizing
1537 if (m_enableAutoSizing)
1538 m_fontSize = Mathf.Clamp(m_fontSizeBase, m_fontSizeMin, m_fontSizeMax);
1539
1540 m_maxFontSize = m_fontSizeMax;
1541 m_minFontSize = m_fontSizeMin;
1542 m_lineSpacingDelta = 0;
1543 m_charWidthAdjDelta = 0;
1544
1545 m_isTextTruncated = false;
1546
1547 m_havePropertiesChanged = false;
1548 m_isLayoutDirty = false;
1549 m_ignoreActiveState = false;
1550
1551 // Reset Text Auto Size iteration tracking.
1552 m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet = false;
1553 m_AutoSizeIterationCount = 0;
1554
1555 // The GenerateTextMesh function is potentially called repeatedly when text auto size is enabled.
1556 // This is a revised implementation to remove the use of recursion which could potentially result in stack overflow issues.
1557 while (m_IsAutoSizePointSizeSet == false)
1558 {
1559 GenerateTextMesh();
1560 m_AutoSizeIterationCount += 1;
1561 }
1562 }
1563 }

override void UpdateMeshPadding()
Function to be used to force recomputing of character padding when Shader / Material properties have ...
Definition: TextMeshPro.cs:306

◆ OnRectTransformDimensionsChange()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.OnRectTransformDimensionsChange ( )
protected
1434 {
1435 //Debug.Log("*** OnRectTransformDimensionsChange() ***");
1436
1437 // Ignore changes to RectTransform SizeDelta that are very small and typically the result of rounding errors when using RectTransform in Anchor Stretch mode.
1438 if (rectTransform != null &&
1439 Mathf.Abs(m_rectTransform.rect.width - m_PreviousRectTransformSize.x) < 0.0001f && Mathf.Abs(m_rectTransform.rect.height - m_PreviousRectTransformSize.y) < 0.0001f &&
1440 Mathf.Abs(m_rectTransform.pivot.x - m_PreviousPivotPosition.x) < 0.0001f && Mathf.Abs(m_rectTransform.pivot.y - m_PreviousPivotPosition.y) < 0.0001f)
1441 {
1442 return;
1443 }
1444
1445 ComputeMarginSize();
1446

1448 SetLayoutDirty();
1449 }

7524 {
7525 Vector2 output;
7526

7529
7530 output.x = (output.x * 4096) + output.y;
7531 output.y = scale;
7532

◆ ParseInputText()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.ParseInputText ( )
protectedinherited

Method to parse the input text based on its source

1871 {
1872 //Debug.Log("Re-parsing Text.");
1874
1875 m_isInputParsingRequired = false;
1876
1877 switch (m_inputSource)
1878 {
1879 case TextInputSources.String:
1880 case TextInputSources.Text:
1881 if (m_TextPreprocessor != null)
1882 m_InternalParsingBufferSize = StringToInternalParsingBuffer(m_TextPreprocessor.PreprocessText(m_text), ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
1883 else
1884 m_InternalParsingBufferSize = StringToInternalParsingBuffer(m_text, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
1885 break;
1886 case TextInputSources.SetText:
1887 m_InternalParsingBufferSize = CharArrayToInternalParsingBuffer(m_input_CharArray, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
1888 break;
1889 case TextInputSources.SetCharArray:
1890 break;
1891 }
1892
1893 SetArraySizes(m_InternalParsingBuffer);
1895 }

Copies Content of formatted SetText() to charBuffer.

◆ Rebuild()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.Rebuild ( CanvasUpdate  update)

Parameters
update
262 {
263 if (this == null) return;
264
265 if (update == CanvasUpdate.Prelayout)
266 {
267 if (m_autoSizeTextContainer)
268 {
269 m_rectTransform.sizeDelta = GetPreferredValues(Mathf.Infinity, Mathf.Infinity);
270 }
271 }
272 else if (update == CanvasUpdate.PreRender)
273 {
274 this.OnPreRenderObject();
275
276 if (!m_isMaterialDirty) return;
277
278 UpdateMaterial();
279 m_isMaterialDirty = false;
280 }
281 }

7480 {

7482 return;

7487 ReleaseLinkedTextComponent(childLinkedComponent);
