◆ ReplaceClosingStyleTag() [1/4]

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.ReplaceClosingStyleTag ( ref char[]  sourceText,
int  srcIndex,
ref UnicodeChar[]  charBuffer,
ref int  writeIndex 
)
privateinherited

Method to handle inline replacement of style tag by closing style definition.

Parameters
sourceText
srcIndex
charBuffer
writeIndex
Returns
4030 {
4031 // Get style from the Style Stack
4032 int hashCode = m_TextStyleStacks[m_TextStyleStackDepth + 1].Pop();
4033 TMP_Style style = GetStyle(hashCode);
4034
4035 // Return if we don't have a valid style.
4036 if (style == null) return false;
4037
4038 // Increase style depth
4039 m_TextStyleStackDepth += 1;
4040
4041 int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
4042
4043 // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
4044 int[] tagDefinition = style.styleClosingTagArray;
4045
4046 for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
4047 {
4048 int c = tagDefinition[i];
4049
4050 if (c == '\\' && i + 1 < styleLength)
4051 {
4052 switch (tagDefinition[i + 1])
4053 {
4054 case '\\':
4055 i += 1;
4056 break;
4057 case 'n':
4058 c = 10;
4059 i += 1;
4060 break;
4061 case 'r':
4062 break;
4063 case 't':
4064 break;
4065 case 'u':
4066 // UTF16 format is "\uFF00" or u + 2 hex pairs.
4067 if (i + 5 < styleLength)
4068 {
4069 c = GetUTF16(tagDefinition, i + 2);
4070
4071 i += 5;
4072 }
4073 break;
4074 case 'U':
4075 // UTF32 format is "\UFF00FF00" or U + 4 hex pairs.
4076 if (i + 9 < styleLength)
4077 {
4078 c = GetUTF32(tagDefinition, i + 2);
4079
4080 i += 9;
4081 }
4082 break;
4083 }
4084 }
4085
4086 if (c == 60)
4087 {
4088 if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<BR>", i))
4089 {
4090 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4091
4092 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
4093 writeIndex += 1;
4094 i += 3;
4095
4096 continue;
4097 }
4098 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<NBSP>", i))
4099 {
4100 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4101
4102 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
4103 writeIndex += 1;
4104 i += 5;
4105
4106 continue;
4107 }
4108 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<ZWSP>", i))
4109 {
4110 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4111
4112 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
4113 writeIndex += 1;
4114 i += 5;
4115
4116 continue;
4117 }
4118 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<STYLE=", i))
4119 {
4120 int offset;
4121 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, out offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
4122 {
4123 i = offset;
4124 continue;
4125 }
4126 }
4127 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "</STYLE>", i))
4128 {
4129 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
4130
4131 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
4132 i += 7;
4133 continue;
4134 }
4135 }
4136
4137 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4138
4139 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
4140 writeIndex += 1;
4141 }
4142
4143 m_TextStyleStackDepth -= 1;
4144
4145 return true;
4146 }

◆ ReplaceClosingStyleTag() [2/4]

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.ReplaceClosingStyleTag ( ref int[]  sourceText,
int  srcIndex,
ref UnicodeChar[]  charBuffer,
ref int  writeIndex 
)
privateinherited

Method to handle inline replacement of style tag by closing style definition.

Parameters
sourceText
srcIndex
charBuffer
writeIndex
Returns
3902 {
3903 // Get style from the Style Stack
3904 int hashCode = m_TextStyleStacks[m_TextStyleStackDepth + 1].Pop();
3905 TMP_Style style = GetStyle(hashCode);
3906
3907 // Return if we don't have a valid style.
3908 if (style == null) return false;
3909
3910 // Increase style depth
3911 m_TextStyleStackDepth += 1;
3912
3913 int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
3914
3915 // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
3916 int[] tagDefinition = style.styleClosingTagArray;
3917
3918 for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
3919 {
3920 int c = tagDefinition[i];
3921
3922 if (c == '\\' && i + 1 < styleLength)
3923 {
3924 switch (tagDefinition[i + 1])
3925 {
3926 case '\\':
3927 i += 1;
3928 break;
3929 case 'n':
3930 c = 10;
3931 i += 1;
3932 break;
3933 case 'r':
3934 break;
3935 case 't':
3936 break;
3937 case 'u':
3938 // UTF16 format is "\uFF00" or u + 2 hex pairs.
3939 if (i + 5 < styleLength)
3940 {
3941 c = GetUTF16(tagDefinition, i + 2);
3942
3943 i += 5;
3944 }
3945 break;
3946 case 'U':
3947 // UTF32 format is "\UFF00FF00" or U + 4 hex pairs.
3948 if (i + 9 < styleLength)
3949 {
3950 c = GetUTF32(tagDefinition, i + 2);
3951
3952 i += 9;
3953 }
3954 break;
3955 }
3956 }
3957
3958 if (c == 60)
3959 {
3960 if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<BR>", i))
3961 {
3962 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3963
3964 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
3965 writeIndex += 1;
3966 i += 3;
3967
3968 continue;
3969 }
3970 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<NBSP>", i))
3971 {
3972 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3973
3974 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
3975 writeIndex += 1;
3976 i += 5;
3977
3978 continue;
3979 }
3980 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<ZWSP>", i))
3981 {
3982 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3983
3984 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
3985 writeIndex += 1;
3986 i += 5;
3987
3988 continue;
3989 }
3990 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<STYLE=", i))
3991 {
3992 int offset; ;
3993 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, out offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
3994 {
3995 i = offset;
3996 continue;
3997 }
3998 }
3999 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "</STYLE>", i))
4000 {
4001 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
4002
4003 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
4004 i += 7;
4005 continue;
4006 }
4007 }
4008
4009 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
4010
4011 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
4012 writeIndex += 1;
4013 }
4014
4015 m_TextStyleStackDepth -= 1;
4016
4017 return true;
4018 }

◆ ReplaceClosingStyleTag() [3/4]

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.ReplaceClosingStyleTag ( ref string  sourceText,
int  srcIndex,
ref UnicodeChar[]  charBuffer,
ref int  writeIndex 
)
privateinherited

Method to handle inline replacement of style tag by closing style definition.

Parameters
sourceText
srcIndex
charBuffer
writeIndex
Returns
3775 {
3776 // Get style from the Style Stack
3777 int hashCode = m_TextStyleStacks[m_TextStyleStackDepth + 1].Pop();
3778 TMP_Style style = GetStyle(hashCode);
3779
3780 // Return if we don't have a valid style.
3781 if (style == null) return false;
3782
3783 // Increase style depth
3784 m_TextStyleStackDepth += 1;
3785
3786 int styleLength = style.styleClosingTagArray.Length;
3787
3788 // Replace <style> tag with opening definition
3789 int[] tagDefinition = style.styleClosingTagArray;
3790
3791 for (int i = 0; i < styleLength; i++)
3792 {
3793 int c = tagDefinition[i];
3794
3795 if (c == '\\' && i + 1 < styleLength)
3796 {
3797 switch (tagDefinition[i + 1])
3798 {
3799 case '\\':
3800 i += 1;
3801 break;
3802 case 'n':
3803 c = 10;
3804 i += 1;
3805 break;
3806 case 'r':
3807 break;
3808 case 't':
3809 break;
3810 case 'u':
3811 // UTF16 format is "\uFF00" or u + 2 hex pairs.
3812 if (i + 5 < styleLength)
3813 {
3814 c = GetUTF16(tagDefinition, i + 2);
3815
3816 i += 5;
3817 }
3818 break;
3819 case 'U':
3820 // UTF32 format is "\UFF00FF00" or U + 4 hex pairs.
3821 if (i + 9 < styleLength)
3822 {
3823 c = GetUTF32(tagDefinition, i + 2);
3824
3825 i += 9;
3826 }
3827 break;
3828 }
3829 }
3830
3831 if (c == 60)
3832 {
3833 if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<BR>", i))
3834 {
3835 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3836
3837 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
3838 writeIndex += 1;
3839 i += 3;
3840
3841 continue;
3842 }
3843 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<NBSP>", i))
3844 {
3845 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3846
3847 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
3848 writeIndex += 1;
3849 i += 5;
3850
3851 continue;
3852 }
3853 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<ZWSP>", i))
3854 {
3855 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3856
3857 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
3858 writeIndex += 1;
3859 i += 5;
3860
3861 continue;
3862 }
3863 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<STYLE=", i))
3864 {
3865 int offset;
3866 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, out offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
3867 {
3868 i = offset;
3869 continue;
3870 }
3871 }
3872 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "</STYLE>", i))
3873 {
3874 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
3875
3876 i += 7;
3877 continue;
3878 }
3879 }
3880
3881 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3882
3883 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
3884 writeIndex += 1;
3885 }
3886
3887 m_TextStyleStackDepth -= 1;
3888
3889 return true;
3890 }

3735 continue;
3736 }
3737 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "<STYLE=", i))
3738 {
3739 int offset;
3740 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, out offset, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex))
3741 {
3742 i = offset;
3743 continue;
3744 }
3745 }
3746 else if (IsTagName(ref tagDefinition, "</STYLE>", i))
3747 {
3748 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref tagDefinition, i, ref charBuffer, ref writeIndex);
3749
3750 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
3751 i += 7;
3752 continue;
3753 }
3754 }
3755
3756 if (writeIndex == charBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref charBuffer);
3757
3758 charBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = c;
3759 writeIndex += 1;
3760 }
3761
3762 return true;
3763 }

◆ ReplaceTagWithCharacter()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.ReplaceTagWithCharacter ( int[]  chars,
int  insertionIndex,
int  tagLength,
char  c 
)
protectedinherited

Replace a given number of characters (tag) in the array with a new character and shift subsequent characters in the array.

Parameters
charsArray which contains the text.
insertionIndexThe index of where the new character will be inserted
tagLengthLength of the tag being replaced.
cThe replacement character.
7274 {
7275 chars[insertionIndex] = c;
7276
7277 for (int i = insertionIndex + tagLength; i < chars.Length; i++)
7278 {
7279 chars[i - 3] = chars[i];
7280 }
7281 }

4710 {

◆ ResizeLineExtents()

void TMPro.TMP_Text.ResizeLineExtents ( int  size)
protectedinherited

Function to increase the size of the Line Extents Array.

Parameters
size
6103 {
6104 size = size > 1024 ? size + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(size + 1);
6105
6106 TMP_LineInfo[] temp_lineInfo = new TMP_LineInfo[size];
6107 for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
6108 {
6109 if (i < m_textInfo.lineInfo.Length)
6110 temp_lineInfo[i] = m_textInfo.lineInfo[i];
6111 else
6112 {
6113 temp_lineInfo[i].lineExtents.min = k_LargePositiveVector2;
6114 temp_lineInfo[i].lineExtents.max = k_LargeNegativeVector2;
6115
6116 temp_lineInfo[i].ascender = k_LargeNegativeFloat;
6117 temp_lineInfo[i].descender = k_LargePositiveFloat;
6118 }
6119 }
6120
6121 m_textInfo.lineInfo = temp_lineInfo;
6122 }

◆ SaveGlyphVertexInfo()

virtual void TMPro.TMP_Text.SaveGlyphVertexInfo ( float  padding,
float  style_padding,
Color32  vertexColor 
)
protectedvirtualinherited

Store vertex information for each character.

Parameters
style_paddingStyle_padding.
vertexColorVertex color.
6463 {
6464 // Save the Vertex Position for the Character
6465 #region Setup Mesh Vertices
6466 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft;
6467 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topLeft;
6468 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight;
6469 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomRight;
6470 #endregion
6471
6472
6473 #region Setup Vertex Colors
6474 // Alpha is the lower of the vertex color or tag color alpha used.
6475 vertexColor.a = m_fontColor32.a < vertexColor.a ? m_fontColor32.a : vertexColor.a;
6476
6477 // Handle Vertex Colors & Vertex Color Gradient
6478 if (!m_enableVertexGradient)
6479 {
6480 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = vertexColor;
6481 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = vertexColor;
6482 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = vertexColor;
6483 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = vertexColor;
6484 }
6485 else
6486 {
6487 if (!m_overrideHtmlColors && m_colorStack.index > 1)
6488 {
6489 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = vertexColor;
6490 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = vertexColor;
6491 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = vertexColor;
6492 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = vertexColor;
6493 }
6494 else // Handle Vertex Color Gradient
6495 {
6496 // Use Vertex Color Gradient Preset (if one is assigned)
6497 if (m_fontColorGradientPreset != null)
6498 {
6499 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomLeft * vertexColor;
6500 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.topLeft * vertexColor;
6501 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.topRight * vertexColor;
6502 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomRight * vertexColor;
6503 }
6504 else
6505 {
6506 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = m_fontColorGradient.bottomLeft * vertexColor;
6507 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = m_fontColorGradient.topLeft * vertexColor;
6508 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = m_fontColorGradient.topRight * vertexColor;
6509 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = m_fontColorGradient.bottomRight * vertexColor;
6510 }
6511 }
6512 }
6513
6514 if (m_colorGradientPreset != null)
6515 {
6516 if (m_colorGradientPresetIsTinted)
6517 {
6518 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.bottomLeft;
6519 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.topLeft;
6520 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.topRight;
6521 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color *= m_colorGradientPreset.bottomRight;
6522 }
6523 else
6524 {
6525 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = m_colorGradientPreset.bottomLeft.MinAlpha(vertexColor);
6526 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = m_colorGradientPreset.topLeft.MinAlpha(vertexColor);
6527 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = m_colorGradientPreset.topRight.MinAlpha(vertexColor);
6528 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = m_colorGradientPreset.bottomRight.MinAlpha(vertexColor);
6529 }
6530 }
6531 #endregion
6532
6533 // Apply style_padding only if this is a SDF Shader.
6534 if (!m_isSDFShader)
6535 style_padding = 0f;
6536
6537
6538 // Setup UVs for the Character
6539 #region Setup UVs
6540
6541 GlyphRect glyphRect = m_cached_TextElement.m_Glyph.glyphRect;
6542
6543 Vector2 uv0;
6544 uv0.x = (glyphRect.x - padding - style_padding) / m_currentFontAsset.m_AtlasWidth;
6545 uv0.y = (glyphRect.y - padding - style_padding) / m_currentFontAsset.m_AtlasHeight;
6546
6547 Vector2 uv1;
6548 uv1.x = uv0.x;
6549 uv1.y = (glyphRect.y + padding + style_padding + glyphRect.height) / m_currentFontAsset.m_AtlasHeight;
6550
6551 Vector2 uv2;
6552 uv2.x = (glyphRect.x + padding + style_padding + glyphRect.width) / m_currentFontAsset.m_AtlasWidth;
6553 uv2.y = uv1.y;
6554
6555 Vector2 uv3;
6556 uv3.x = uv2.x;
6557 uv3.y = uv0.y;
6558
6559 // Store UV Information
6560 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.uv = uv0;
6561 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.uv = uv1;
6562 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.uv = uv2;
6563 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.uv = uv3;
6564 #endregion Setup UVs
6565
6566
6567 // Normal
6568 #region Setup Normals & Tangents
6569 //Vector3 normal = new Vector3(0, 0, -1);
6570 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.normal = normal;
6571 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.normal = normal;
6572 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.normal = normal;
6573 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.normal = normal;
6574
6575 // Tangents
6576 //Vector4 tangent = new Vector4(-1, 0, 0, 1);
6577 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.tangent = tangent;
6578 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.tangent = tangent;
6579 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.tangent = tangent;
6580 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.tangent = tangent;
6581 #endregion end Normals & Tangents
6582 }

◆ SaveSpriteVertexInfo()

virtual void TMPro.TMP_Text.SaveSpriteVertexInfo ( Color32  vertexColor)
protectedvirtualinherited

Store vertex information for each sprite.

Parameters
padding
style_padding
vertexColor
6592 {
6593 // Save the Vertex Position for the Character
6594 #region Setup Mesh Vertices
6595 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomLeft;
6596 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topLeft;
6597 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].topRight;
6598 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.position = m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].bottomRight;
6599 #endregion
6600
6601 // Vertex Color Alpha
6602 if (m_tintAllSprites) m_tintSprite = true;
6603 Color32 spriteColor = m_tintSprite ? m_spriteColor.Multiply(vertexColor) : m_spriteColor;
6604 spriteColor.a = spriteColor.a < m_fontColor32.a ? spriteColor.a = spriteColor.a < vertexColor.a ? spriteColor.a : vertexColor.a : m_fontColor32.a;
6605
6606 Color32 c0 = spriteColor;
6607 Color32 c1 = spriteColor;
6608 Color32 c2 = spriteColor;
6609 Color32 c3 = spriteColor;
6610
6611 if (m_enableVertexGradient)
6612 {
6613 if (m_fontColorGradientPreset != null)
6614 {
6615 c0 = m_tintSprite ? c0.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomLeft) : c0;
6616 c1 = m_tintSprite ? c1.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.topLeft) : c1;
6617 c2 = m_tintSprite ? c2.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.topRight) : c2;
6618 c3 = m_tintSprite ? c3.Multiply(m_fontColorGradientPreset.bottomRight) : c3;
6619 }
6620 else
6621 {
6622 c0 = m_tintSprite ? c0.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.bottomLeft) : c0;
6623 c1 = m_tintSprite ? c1.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.topLeft) : c1;
6624 c2 = m_tintSprite ? c2.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.topRight) : c2;
6625 c3 = m_tintSprite ? c3.Multiply(m_fontColorGradient.bottomRight) : c3;
6626 }
6627 }
6628
6629 if (m_colorGradientPreset != null)
6630 {
6631 c0 = m_tintSprite ? c0.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.bottomLeft) : c0;
6632 c1 = m_tintSprite ? c1.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.topLeft) : c1;
6633 c2 = m_tintSprite ? c2.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.topRight) : c2;
6634 c3 = m_tintSprite ? c3.Multiply(m_colorGradientPreset.bottomRight) : c3;
6635 }
6636
6637 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.color = c0;
6638 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.color = c1;
6639 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.color = c2;
6640 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.color = c3;
6641
6642
6643 // Setup UVs for the Character
6644 #region Setup UVs
6645 GlyphRect glyphRect = m_cached_TextElement.m_Glyph.glyphRect;
6646
6647 Vector2 uv0 = new Vector2((float)glyphRect.x / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.width, (float)glyphRect.y / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.height); // bottom left
6648 Vector2 uv1 = new Vector2(uv0.x, (float)(glyphRect.y + glyphRect.height) / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.height); // top left
6649 Vector2 uv2 = new Vector2((float)(glyphRect.x + glyphRect.width) / m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteSheet.width, uv1.y); // top right
6650 Vector2 uv3 = new Vector2(uv2.x, uv0.y); // bottom right
6651
6652 // Store UV Information
6653 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.uv = uv0;
6654 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.uv = uv1;
6655 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.uv = uv2;
6656 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.uv = uv3;
6657 #endregion Setup UVs
6658
6659
6660 // Normal
6661 #region Setup Normals & Tangents
6662 //Vector3 normal = new Vector3(0, 0, -1);
6663 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.normal = normal;
6664 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.normal = normal;
6665 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.normal = normal;
6666 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.normal = normal;
6667
6668 // Tangents
6669 //Vector4 tangent = new Vector4(-1, 0, 0, 1);
6670 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BL.tangent = tangent;
6671 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TL.tangent = tangent;
6672 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_TR.tangent = tangent;
6673 //m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount].vertex_BR.tangent = tangent;
6674 #endregion end Normals & Tangents
6675
6676 }

◆ SetArraySizes()

override int TMPro.TextMeshPro.SetArraySizes ( UnicodeChar[]  unicodeChars)
protectedvirtual

Method used to determine the number of visible characters and required buffer allocations.

Parameters
unicodeChars
Returns

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

943 {
944 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
945 Profiler.BeginSample("TMP SetArraySizes()");
946 //Debug.Log("*** SetArraySizes() ***");
947 #endif
948
949 int spriteCount = 0;
950
951 m_totalCharacterCount = 0;
952 m_isUsingBold = false;
953 m_isParsingText = false;
954 tag_NoParsing = false;
955 m_FontStyleInternal = m_fontStyle;
956 m_fontStyleStack.Clear();
957
958 m_FontWeightInternal = (m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold ? FontWeight.Bold : m_fontWeight;
959 m_FontWeightStack.SetDefault(m_FontWeightInternal);
960
961 m_currentFontAsset = m_fontAsset;
962 m_currentMaterial = m_sharedMaterial;
963 m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
964
965 m_materialReferenceStack.SetDefault(new MaterialReference(m_currentMaterialIndex, m_currentFontAsset, null, m_currentMaterial, m_padding));
966
967 m_materialReferenceIndexLookup.Clear();
968 MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
969
970 // Set allocations for the text object's TextInfo
971 if (m_textInfo == null)
972 m_textInfo = new TMP_TextInfo(m_InternalParsingBufferSize);
973 else if (m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length < m_InternalParsingBufferSize)
974 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.characterInfo, m_InternalParsingBufferSize, false);
975
976 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
977
978 // Handling for Underline special character
979 #region Setup Underline Special Character
980 /*
981 GetUnderlineSpecialCharacter(m_currentFontAsset);
982 if (m_Underline.character != null)
983 {
984 if (m_Underline.fontAsset.GetInstanceID() != m_currentFontAsset.GetInstanceID())
985 {
986 if (TMP_Settings.matchMaterialPreset && m_currentMaterial.GetInstanceID() != m_Underline.fontAsset.material.GetInstanceID())
987 m_Underline.material = TMP_MaterialManager.GetFallbackMaterial(m_currentMaterial, m_Underline.fontAsset.material);
988 else
989 m_Underline.material = m_Underline.fontAsset.material;
990
991 m_Underline.materialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_Underline.material, m_Underline.fontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
992 m_materialReferences[m_Underline.materialIndex].referenceCount = 0;
993 }
994 }
995 */
996 #endregion
997
998
999 // Handling for Ellipsis special character
1000 #region Setup Ellipsis Special Character
1001 if (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Ellipsis)
1002 {
1003 GetEllipsisSpecialCharacter(m_currentFontAsset);
1004
1005 if (m_Ellipsis.character != null)
1006 {
1007 if (m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.GetInstanceID() != m_currentFontAsset.GetInstanceID())
1008 {
1009 if (TMP_Settings.matchMaterialPreset && m_currentMaterial.GetInstanceID() != m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.material.GetInstanceID())
1010 m_Ellipsis.material = TMP_MaterialManager.GetFallbackMaterial(m_currentMaterial, m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.material);
1011 else
1012 m_Ellipsis.material = m_Ellipsis.fontAsset.material;
1013
1014 m_Ellipsis.materialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_Ellipsis.material, m_Ellipsis.fontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1015 m_materialReferences[m_Ellipsis.materialIndex].referenceCount = 0;
1016 }
1017 }
1018 else
1019 {
1020 m_overflowMode = TextOverflowModes.Truncate;
1021
1022 if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
1023 Debug.LogWarning("The character used for Ellipsis is not available in font asset [" + m_currentFontAsset.name + "] or any potential fallbacks. Switching Text Overflow mode to Truncate.", this);
1024 }
1025 }
1026 #endregion
1027
1028
1029 // Clear Linked Text object if we have one.
1030 if (m_linkedTextComponent != null && !m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
1031 m_linkedTextComponent.text = string.Empty;
1032
1033 // Parsing XML tags in the text
1034 for (int i = 0; i < unicodeChars.Length && unicodeChars[i].unicode != 0; i++)
1035 {
1036 //Make sure the characterInfo array can hold the next text element.
1037 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo == null || m_totalCharacterCount >= m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length)
1038 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.characterInfo, m_totalCharacterCount + 1, true);
1039
1040 int unicode = unicodeChars[i].unicode;
1041
1042 // PARSE XML TAGS
1043 #region PARSE XML TAGS
1044 if (m_isRichText && unicode == 60) // if Char '<'
1045 {
1046 int prev_MaterialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1047 int endTagIndex;
1048
1049 // Check if Tag is Valid
1050 if (ValidateHtmlTag(unicodeChars, i + 1, out endTagIndex))
1051 {
1052 int tagStartIndex = unicodeChars[i].stringIndex;
1053 i = endTagIndex;
1054
1055 if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Bold) == FontStyles.Bold)
1056 m_isUsingBold = true;
1057
1058 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Sprite)
1059 {
1060 m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1061
1062 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].character = (char)(57344 + m_spriteIndex);
1063 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteIndex = m_spriteIndex;
1064 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1065 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteAsset = m_currentSpriteAsset;
1066 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1067 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].textElement = m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable[m_spriteIndex];
1068 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = m_textElementType;
1069 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].index = tagStartIndex;
1070 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].stringLength = unicodeChars[i].stringIndex - tagStartIndex + 1;
1071
1072 // Restore element type and material index to previous values.
1073 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1074 m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_MaterialIndex;
1075
1076 spriteCount += 1;
1077 m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1078 }
1079
1080 continue;
1081 }
1082 }
1083 #endregion
1084
1085 bool isUsingAlternativeTypeface = false;
1086 bool isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface = false;
1087
1088 TMP_FontAsset prev_fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1089 Material prev_material = m_currentMaterial;
1090 int prev_materialIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1091
1092 // Handle Font Styles like LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps.
1093 #region Handling of LowerCase, UpperCase and SmallCaps Font Styles
1094 if (m_textElementType == TMP_TextElementType.Character)
1095 {
1096 if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.UpperCase) == FontStyles.UpperCase)
1097 {
1098 // If this character is lowercase, switch to uppercase.
1099 if (char.IsLower((char)unicode))
1100 unicode = char.ToUpper((char)unicode);
1101
1102 }
1103 else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.LowerCase) == FontStyles.LowerCase)
1104 {
1105 // If this character is uppercase, switch to lowercase.
1106 if (char.IsUpper((char)unicode))
1107 unicode = char.ToLower((char)unicode);
1108 }
1109 else if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.SmallCaps) == FontStyles.SmallCaps)
1110 {
1111 // Only convert lowercase characters to uppercase.
1112 if (char.IsLower((char)unicode))
1113 unicode = char.ToUpper((char)unicode);
1114 }
1115 }
1116 #endregion
1117
1118 // Lookup the Glyph data for each character and cache it.
1119 #region LOOKUP GLYPH
1120 TMP_TextElement character = GetTextElement((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
1121
1122 // Check if Lowercase or Uppercase variant of the character is available.
1123 /* Not sure this is necessary anyone as it is very unlikely with recursive search through fallback fonts.
1124 if (glyph == null)
1125 {
1126 if (char.IsLower((char)c))
1127 {
1128 if (m_currentFontAsset.characterDictionary.TryGetValue(char.ToUpper((char)c), out glyph))
1129 c = chars[i] = char.ToUpper((char)c);
1130 }
1131 else if (char.IsUpper((char)c))
1132 {
1133 if (m_currentFontAsset.characterDictionary.TryGetValue(char.ToLower((char)c), out glyph))
1134 c = chars[i] = char.ToLower((char)c);
1135 }
1136 }*/
1137
1138 // Special handling for missing character.
1139 // Replace missing glyph by the Square (9633) glyph or possibly the Space (32) glyph.
1140 if (character == null)
1141 {
1142 // Save the original unicode character
1143 int srcGlyph = unicode;
1144
1145 // Try replacing the missing glyph character by TMP Settings Missing Glyph or Square (9633) character.
1146 unicode = unicodeChars[i].unicode = TMP_Settings.missingGlyphCharacter == 0 ? 9633 : TMP_Settings.missingGlyphCharacter;
1147
1148 // Check for the missing glyph character in the currently assigned font asset and its fallbacks
1149 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
1150
1151 if (character == null)
1152 {
1153 // Search for the missing glyph character in the TMP Settings Fallback list.
1154 if (TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets != null && TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets.Count > 0)
1155 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAssets((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, TMP_Settings.fallbackFontAssets, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
1156 }
1157
1158 if (character == null)
1159 {
1160 // Search for the missing glyph in the TMP Settings Default Font Asset.
1161 if (TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset != null)
1162 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, TMP_Settings.defaultFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
1163 }
1164
1165 if (character == null)
1166 {
1167 // Use Space (32) Glyph from the currently assigned font asset.
1168 unicode = unicodeChars[i].unicode = 32;
1169 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
1170 }
1171
1172 if (character == null)
1173 {
1174 // Use End of Text (0x03) Glyph from the currently assigned font asset.
1175 unicode = unicodeChars[i].unicode = 0x03;
1176 character = TMP_FontAssetUtilities.GetCharacterFromFontAsset((uint)unicode, m_currentFontAsset, true, m_FontStyleInternal, m_FontWeightInternal, out isUsingAlternativeTypeface);
1177 }
1178
1179 if (!TMP_Settings.warningsDisabled)
1180 {
1181 string formattedWarning = srcGlyph > 0xFFFF
1182 ? string.Format("The character with Unicode value \\U{0:X8} was not found in the [{1}] font asset or any potential fallbacks. It was replaced by Unicode character \\u{2:X4} in text object [{3}].", srcGlyph, m_fontAsset.name, character.unicode, this.name)
1183 : string.Format("The character with Unicode value \\u{0:X4} was not found in the [{1}] font asset or any potential fallbacks. It was replaced by Unicode character \\u{2:X4} in text object [{3}].", srcGlyph, m_fontAsset.name, character.unicode, this.name);
1184
1185 Debug.LogWarning(formattedWarning, this);
1186 }
1187 }
1188
1189 if (character.elementType == TextElementType.Character)
1190 {
1191 if (character.textAsset.instanceID != m_currentFontAsset.instanceID)
1192 {
1193 isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface = true;
1194 m_currentFontAsset = character.textAsset as TMP_FontAsset;
1195
1196 }
1197 }
1198 #endregion
1199
1200 // Save text element data
1201 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1202 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].textElement = character;
1203 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].isUsingAlternateTypeface = isUsingAlternativeTypeface;
1204 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].character = (char)unicode;
1205 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].index = unicodeChars[i].stringIndex;
1206 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].stringLength = unicodeChars[i].length;
1207 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].fontAsset = m_currentFontAsset;
1208
1209 // Special handling if the character is a sprite.
1210 if (character.elementType == TextElementType.Sprite)
1211 {
1212 TMP_SpriteAsset spriteAssetRef = character.textAsset as TMP_SpriteAsset;
1213 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(spriteAssetRef.material, spriteAssetRef, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1214 m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1215
1216 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].elementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
1217 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1218 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteAsset = spriteAssetRef;
1219 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].spriteIndex = (int)character.glyphIndex;
1220
1221 // Restore element type and material index to previous values.
1222 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Character;
1223 m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_materialIndex;
1224
1225 spriteCount += 1;
1226 m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1227
1228 continue;
1229 }
1230
1231 if (isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface && m_currentFontAsset.instanceID != m_fontAsset.instanceID)
1232 {
1233 // Create Fallback material instance matching current material preset if necessary
1234 if (TMP_Settings.matchMaterialPreset)
1235 m_currentMaterial = TMP_MaterialManager.GetFallbackMaterial(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset.material);
1236 else
1237 m_currentMaterial = m_currentFontAsset.material;
1238
1239 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1240 }
1241
1242 // Handle Multi Atlas Texture support
1243 if (character != null && character.glyph.atlasIndex > 0)
1244 {
1245 m_currentMaterial = TMP_MaterialManager.GetFallbackMaterial(m_currentFontAsset, m_currentMaterial, character.glyph.atlasIndex);
1246
1247 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1248
1249 isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface = true;
1250 }
1251
1252 if (!char.IsWhiteSpace((char)unicode) && unicode != 0x200B)
1253 {
1254 // Limit the mesh of the main text object to 65535 vertices and use sub objects for the overflow.
1255 if (m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount < 16383)
1256 m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1257 else
1258 {
1259 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(new Material(m_currentMaterial), m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
1260 m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].referenceCount += 1;
1261 }
1262 }
1263
1264 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].material = m_currentMaterial;
1265 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_totalCharacterCount].materialReferenceIndex = m_currentMaterialIndex;
1266 m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].isFallbackMaterial = isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface;
1267
1268 // Restore previous font asset and material if fallback font was used.
1269 if (isUsingFallbackOrAlternativeTypeface)
1270 {
1271 m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex].fallbackMaterial = prev_material;
1272 m_currentFontAsset = prev_fontAsset;
1273 m_currentMaterial = prev_material;
1274 m_currentMaterialIndex = prev_materialIndex;
1275 }
1276
1277 m_totalCharacterCount += 1;
1278 }
1279
1280 // Early return if we are calculating the preferred values.
1281 if (m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
1282 {
1283 m_isCalculatingPreferredValues = false;
1284 m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
1285 return m_totalCharacterCount;
1286 }
1287
1288 // Save material and sprite count.
1289 m_textInfo.spriteCount = spriteCount;
1290 int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount = m_materialReferenceIndexLookup.Count;
1291
1292 // Check if we need to resize the MeshInfo array for handling different materials.
1293 if (materialCount > m_textInfo.meshInfo.Length)
1294 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.meshInfo, materialCount, false);
1295
1296 // Resize SubTextObject array if necessary
1297 if (materialCount > m_subTextObjects.Length)
1298 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_subTextObjects, Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(materialCount + 1));
1299
1300 // Resize CharacterInfo[] if allocations are excessive
1301 if (m_textInfo.characterInfo.Length - m_totalCharacterCount > 256)
1302 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.characterInfo, Mathf.Max(m_totalCharacterCount + 1, 256), true);
1303
1304
1305 // Iterate through the material references to set the mesh buffer allocations
1306 for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
1307 {
1308 // Add new sub text object for each material reference
1309 if (i > 0)
1310 {
1311 if (m_subTextObjects[i] == null)
1312 {
1313 m_subTextObjects[i] = TMP_SubMesh.AddSubTextObject(this, m_materialReferences[i]);
1314
1315 // Not sure this is necessary
1316 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices = null;
1317 }
1318 //else if (m_subTextObjects[i].gameObject.activeInHierarchy == false)
1319 // m_subTextObjects[i].gameObject.SetActive(true);
1320
1321 // Check if the material has changed.
1322 if (m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial == null || m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID() != m_materialReferences[i].material.GetInstanceID())
1323 {
1324 m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].material;
1325 m_subTextObjects[i].fontAsset = m_materialReferences[i].fontAsset;
1326 m_subTextObjects[i].spriteAsset = m_materialReferences[i].spriteAsset;
1327 }
1328
1329 // Check if we need to use a Fallback Material
1330 if (m_materialReferences[i].isFallbackMaterial)
1331 {
1332 m_subTextObjects[i].fallbackMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].material;
1333 m_subTextObjects[i].fallbackSourceMaterial = m_materialReferences[i].fallbackMaterial;
1334 }
1335 }
1336
1337 int referenceCount = m_materialReferences[i].referenceCount;
1338
1339 // Check to make sure our buffers allocations can accommodate the required text elements.
1340 if (m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices == null || m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices.Length < referenceCount * (!m_isVolumetricText ? 4 : 8))
1341 {
1342 if (m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices == null)
1343 {
1344 if (i == 0)
1345 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i] = new TMP_MeshInfo(m_mesh, referenceCount + 1, m_isVolumetricText);
1346 else
1347 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i] = new TMP_MeshInfo(m_subTextObjects[i].mesh, referenceCount + 1, m_isVolumetricText);
1348 }
1349 else
1350 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ResizeMeshInfo(referenceCount > 1024 ? referenceCount + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(referenceCount + 1), m_isVolumetricText);
1351 }
1352 else if (m_VertexBufferAutoSizeReduction && referenceCount > 0 && m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].vertices.Length - referenceCount * (!m_isVolumetricText ? 4 : 8) > 1024)
1353 {
1354 // Resize vertex buffers if allocations are excessive.
1355 //Debug.Log("Reducing the size of the vertex buffers.");
1356 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ResizeMeshInfo(referenceCount > 1024 ? referenceCount + 256 : Mathf.NextPowerOfTwo(referenceCount + 1), m_isVolumetricText);
1357 }
1358
1359 // Assign material reference
1360 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].material = m_materialReferences[i].material;
1361 }
1362
1363 //TMP_MaterialManager.CleanupFallbackMaterials();
1364
1365 // Clean up unused SubMeshes
1366 for (int i = materialCount; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
1367 {
1368 if (i < m_textInfo.meshInfo.Length)
1369 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ClearUnusedVertices(0, true);
1370
1371 //m_subTextObjects[i].gameObject.SetActive(false);
1372 }
1373
1374 #if TMP_PROFILE_ON
1375 Profiler.EndSample();
1376 #endif
1377
1378 return m_totalCharacterCount;
1379 }
TMPro.TMP_CharacterInfo.index
int index
Index of the character in the raw string.
Definition: TMP_CharacterInfo.cs:168

◆ SetCharArray() [1/3]

void TMPro.TMP_Text.SetCharArray ( char[]  sourceText)
inherited

Character array containing the text to be displayed.

Parameters
sourceText
2222 {
2223 int characterCount = sourceText == null ? 0 : sourceText.Length;
2224
2225 #if UNITY_EDITOR
2226 // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2227 if (characterCount == 0)
2228 m_text = string.Empty;
2229 else
2230 m_text = new string(sourceText);
2231 #endif
2232
2233 // Early exit if string is null or empty
2234 if (characterCount == 0)
2235 {
2236 m_InternalParsingBuffer[0].unicode = 0;
2237 m_InternalParsingBufferSize = 0;
2238 return;
2239 }
2240
2241 // Make sure parsing buffer is large enough to handle the required text.
2242 if (m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length < characterCount)
2243 ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, characterCount);
2244
2245 // Clear Style stacks.
2246 for (int i = 0; i < m_TextStyleStacks.Length; i++)
2247 m_TextStyleStacks[i].SetDefault(0);
2248
2249 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2250 int writeIndex = 0;
2251
2252 // Insert Opening Style
2253 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2254 InsertOpeningStyleTag(m_TextStyle, 0, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2255
2256 for (int i = 0; sourceText != null && i < sourceText.Length; i++)
2257 {
2258 if (sourceText[i] == 92 && i < sourceText.Length - 1)
2259 {
2260 switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2261 {
2262 case 110: // \n LineFeed
2263 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2264
2265 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2266 i += 1;
2267 writeIndex += 1;
2268 continue;
2269 case 114: // \r LineFeed
2270 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2271
2272 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2273 i += 1;
2274 writeIndex += 1;
2275 continue;
2276 case 116: // \t Tab
2277 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2278
2279 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2280 i += 1;
2281 writeIndex += 1;
2282 continue;
2283 case 118: // \v Vertical tab used as soft line break
2284 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2285
2286 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 11;
2287 i += 1;
2288 writeIndex += 1;
2289 continue;
2290 }
2291 }
2292
2293 // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2294 if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2295 {
2296 if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2297 {
2298 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2299
2300 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2301 writeIndex += 1;
2302 i += 3;
2303
2304 continue;
2305 }
2306 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<NBSP>", i))
2307 {
2308 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2309
2310 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
2311 writeIndex += 1;
2312 i += 5;
2313
2314 continue;
2315 }
2316 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<ZWSP>", i))
2317 {
2318 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2319
2320 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
2321 writeIndex += 1;
2322 i += 5;
2323
2324 continue;
2325 }
2326 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2327 {
2328 int srcOffset;
2329 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out srcOffset, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2330 {
2331 i = srcOffset;
2332 continue;
2333 }
2334 }
2335 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2336 {
2337 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2338
2339 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2340 i += 7;
2341 continue;
2342 }
2343 }
2344
2345 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2346
2347 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2348 writeIndex += 1;
2349 }
2350
2351 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2352
2353 // Insert Closing Style
2354 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2355 InsertClosingStyleTag(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2356
2357 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2358
2359 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2360 m_InternalParsingBufferSize = writeIndex;
2361
2362 m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
2363 m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
2364 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
2365
2366 SetVerticesDirty();
2367 SetLayoutDirty();
2368 }

◆ SetCharArray() [2/3]

void TMPro.TMP_Text.SetCharArray ( char[]  sourceText,
int  start,
int  length 
)
inherited

Character array containing the text to be displayed.

Parameters
sourceText
2376 {
2377 int characterCount = 0;
2378
2379 // Range check
2380 if (sourceText != null)
2381 {
2382 start = Mathf.Clamp(start, 0, sourceText.Length);
2383 length = Mathf.Clamp(length, 0, start + length < sourceText.Length ? length : sourceText.Length - start);
2384
2385 characterCount = length;
2386 }
2387
2388 #if UNITY_EDITOR
2389 // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2390 if (characterCount == 0)
2391 m_text = string.Empty;
2392 else
2393 m_text = new string(sourceText, start, length);
2394 #endif
2395
2396 // Early exit if string is null or empty
2397 if (characterCount == 0)
2398 {
2399 m_InternalParsingBuffer[0].unicode = 0;
2400 m_InternalParsingBufferSize = 0;
2401 return;
2402 }
2403
2404 // Make sure parsing buffer is large enough to handle the required text.
2405 if (m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length < characterCount)
2406 ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, characterCount);
2407
2408 // Clear Style stacks.
2409 for (int j = 0; j < m_TextStyleStacks.Length; j++)
2410 m_TextStyleStacks[j].SetDefault(0);
2411
2412 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2413 int writeIndex = 0;
2414
2415 // Insert Opening Style
2416 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2417 InsertOpeningStyleTag(m_TextStyle, 0, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2418
2419 int i = start;
2420 int end = start + length;
2421 for (; i < end; i++)
2422 {
2423 if (sourceText[i] == 92 && i < length - 1)
2424 {
2425 switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2426 {
2427 case 110: // \n LineFeed
2428 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2429
2430 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2431 i += 1;
2432 writeIndex += 1;
2433 continue;
2434 case 114: // \r Carriage Return
2435 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2436
2437 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2438 i += 1;
2439 writeIndex += 1;
2440 continue;
2441 case 116: // \t Tab
2442 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2443
2444 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2445 i += 1;
2446 writeIndex += 1;
2447 continue;
2448 case 118: // \v Vertical tab used as soft line break
2449 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2450
2451 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 11;
2452 i += 1;
2453 writeIndex += 1;
2454 continue;
2455 }
2456 }
2457
2458 // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2459 if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2460 {
2461 if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2462 {
2463 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2464
2465 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2466 writeIndex += 1;
2467 i += 3;
2468
2469 continue;
2470 }
2471 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<NBSP>", i))
2472 {
2473 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2474
2475 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
2476 writeIndex += 1;
2477 i += 5;
2478
2479 continue;
2480 }
2481 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<ZWSP>", i))
2482 {
2483 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2484
2485 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
2486 writeIndex += 1;
2487 i += 5;
2488
2489 continue;
2490 }
2491 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2492 {
2493 int srcOffset;
2494 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out srcOffset, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2495 {
2496 i = srcOffset;
2497 continue;
2498 }
2499 }
2500 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2501 {
2502 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2503
2504 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2505 i += 7;
2506 continue;
2507 }
2508 }
2509
2510 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2511
2512 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2513 writeIndex += 1;
2514 }
2515
2516 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2517
2518 // Insert Closing Style
2519 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2520 InsertClosingStyleTag(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2521
2522 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2523
2524 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
2525
2526 m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetCharArray;
2527 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
2528 m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
2529
2530 SetVerticesDirty();
2531 SetLayoutDirty();
2532 }

◆ SetCharArray() [3/3]

void TMPro.TMP_Text.SetCharArray ( int[]  sourceText,

int  length 
)
inherited

Character array containing the text to be displayed.

Parameters
sourceText
2540 {
2541 // Initialize internal character buffer if necessary
2542 if (m_InternalParsingBuffer == null) m_InternalParsingBuffer = new UnicodeChar[8];
2543
2544 #if UNITY_EDITOR
2545 // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2546 if (sourceText == null || sourceText.Length == 0 || length == 0)
2547 {
2548 m_text = string.Empty;
2549 start = 0;
2550 length = 0;
2551 }
2552 else
2553 {
2554 m_text = sourceText.IntToString(start, length);
2555 }
2556 #endif
2557
2558 // Clear Style stacks.
2559 for (int j = 0; j < m_TextStyleStacks.Length; j++)
2560 m_TextStyleStacks[j].SetDefault(0);
2561
2562 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2563 int writeIndex = 0;
2564
2565 // Insert Opening Style
2566 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2567 InsertOpeningStyleTag(m_TextStyle, 0, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2568
2569 int end = start + length;
2570 for (int i = start; i < end && i < sourceText.Length; i++)
2571 {
2572 if (sourceText[i] == 92 && i < length - 1)
2573 {
2574 switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2575 {
2576 case 110: // \n LineFeed
2577 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2578
2579 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2580 i += 1;
2581 writeIndex += 1;
2582 continue;
2583 case 114: // \r LineFeed
2584 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2585
2586 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2587 i += 1;
2588 writeIndex += 1;
2589 continue;
2590 case 116: // \t Tab
2591 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2592
2593 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2594 i += 1;
2595 writeIndex += 1;
2596 continue;
2597 case 118: // \v Vertical tab used as soft line break
2598 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2599
2600 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 11;
2601 i += 1;
2602 writeIndex += 1;
2603 continue;
2604 }
2605 }
2606
2607 // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
2608 if (sourceText[i] == 60)
2609 {
2610 if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2611 {
2612 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2613
2614 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2615 writeIndex += 1;
2616 i += 3;
2617
2618 continue;
2619 }
2620 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<NBSP>", i))
2621 {
2622 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2623
2624 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
2625 writeIndex += 1;
2626 i += 5;
2627
2628 continue;
2629 }
2630 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<ZWSP>", i))
2631 {
2632 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2633
2634 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
2635 writeIndex += 1;
2636 i += 5;
2637
2638 continue;
2639 }
2640 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
2641 {
2642 int srcOffset;
2643 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out srcOffset, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex))
2644 {
2645 i = srcOffset;
2646 continue;
2647 }
2648 }
2649 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
2650 {
2651 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2652
2653 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
2654 i += 7;
2655 continue;
2656 }
2657 }
2658
2659 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2660
2661 m_InternalParsingBuffer[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
2662 writeIndex += 1;
2663 }
2664
2665 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2666
2667 // Insert Closing Style
2668 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2669 InsertClosingStyleTag(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer, ref writeIndex);
2670
2671 if (writeIndex == m_InternalParsingBuffer.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref m_InternalParsingBuffer);
2672

◆ SetCulling()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.SetCulling ( )
protectedvirtual

Set the culling mode on the material.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

899 {
900 if (m_isCullingEnabled)
901 {
902 m_renderer.material.SetFloat("_CullMode", 2);
903
904 for (int i = 1; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
905 {
906 Renderer renderer = m_subTextObjects[i].renderer;
907
908 if (renderer != null)
909 {
910 renderer.material.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_CullMode, 2);
911 }
912 }
913 }
914 else
915 {
916 m_renderer.material.SetFloat("_CullMode", 0);
917
918 for (int i = 1; i < m_subTextObjects.Length && m_subTextObjects[i] != null; i++)
919 {
920 Renderer renderer = m_subTextObjects[i].renderer;
921
922 if (renderer != null)
923 {
924 renderer.material.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_CullMode, 0);
925 }
926 }
927 }

◆ SetMask() [1/3]

void TMPro.TextMeshPro.SetMask ( MaskingTypes  maskType)
private
539 {
540 switch(maskType)
541 {
542 case MaskingTypes.MaskOff:
543 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_SOFT);
544 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_HARD);
545 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_TEX);
546 break;
547 case MaskingTypes.MaskSoft:
548 m_sharedMaterial.EnableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_SOFT);
549 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_HARD);
550 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_TEX);
551 break;
552 case MaskingTypes.MaskHard:
553 m_sharedMaterial.EnableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_HARD);
554 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_SOFT);
555 m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_TEX);
556 break;
557 //case MaskingTypes.MaskTex:
558 // m_sharedMaterial.EnableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_TEX);
559 // m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_HARD);
560 // m_sharedMaterial.DisableKeyword(ShaderUtilities.Keyword_MASK_SOFT);
561 // break;
562 }
563 }

Sets the mask type
Definition: TextMeshPro.cs:164

4324 m_meshFilter.sharedMesh = m_mesh;

◆ SetShaderDepth()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.SetShaderDepth ( )
protectedvirtual

Set the Render Queue and ZTest mode on the current material

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

874 {
875 if (m_isOverlay)
876 {
877 // Changing these properties results in an instance of the material
878 m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_ZTestMode, 0);
879 //m_renderer.material.SetFloat("_ZTestMode", 8);
880 m_renderer.material.renderQueue = 4000;
881
882 m_sharedMaterial = m_renderer.material;
883 //Debug.Log("Text set to Overlay mode.");
884 }
885 else
886 {
887 // Should this use an instanced material?
888 m_sharedMaterial.SetFloat(ShaderUtilities.ShaderTag_ZTestMode, 4);
889 m_renderer.material.renderQueue = -1;
890
891 m_sharedMaterial = m_renderer.material;
892 //Debug.Log("Text set to Normal mode.");
893 }
894 }

739 {

◆ SetSharedMaterials()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.SetSharedMaterials ( Material[]  materials)
protectedvirtual

Method used to assign new materials to the text and sub text objects.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

782 {
783 int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount;
784
785 // Check allocation of the fontSharedMaterials array.
786 if (m_fontSharedMaterials == null)
787 m_fontSharedMaterials = new Material[materialCount];
788 else if (m_fontSharedMaterials.Length != materialCount)
789 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_fontSharedMaterials, materialCount, false);
790
791 // Only assign as many materials as the text object contains.
792 for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
793 {
794 Texture mat_MainTex = materials[i].GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex);
795
796 if (i == 0)
797 {
798 // Only assign new material if the font atlas textures match.
799 if ( mat_MainTex == null || mat_MainTex.GetInstanceID() != m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
800 continue;
801
802 m_sharedMaterial = m_fontSharedMaterials[i] = materials[i];
803 m_padding = GetPaddingForMaterial(m_sharedMaterial);
804 }
805 else
806 {
807 // Only assign new material if the font atlas textures match.
808 if (mat_MainTex == null || mat_MainTex.GetInstanceID() != m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
809 continue;
810
811 // Only assign a new material if none were specified in the text input.
812 if (m_subTextObjects[i].isDefaultMaterial)
813 m_subTextObjects[i].sharedMaterial = m_fontSharedMaterials[i] = materials[i];
814 }
815 }
816 }

◆ SetText() [4/12]

void TMPro.TMP_Text.SetText ( string  text,
float  arg0 
)
inherited

Formatted string containing a pattern and a value representing the text to be rendered.

Ex. TMP_Text.SetText("A = {0}, B = {1:00}, C = {2:000.0}", 10.75f, 10.75f, 10.75f);

Results "A = 10.75, B = 11, C = 010.8."

Parameters
textString containing the pattern.
arg0First float value.
1916 {
1917 SetText(text, arg0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
1918 }

◆ SetText() [7/12]

void TMPro.TMP_Text.SetText ( string  text,
float  arg0,
float  arg1,
float  arg2,
float  arg3 
)
inherited

Formatted string containing a pattern and a value representing the text to be rendered.

Ex. TMP_Text.SetText("A = {0}, B = {1:00}, C = {2:000.0}", 10.75f, 10.75f, 10.75f);

Results "A = 10.75, B = 11, C = 010.8."

Parameters
textString containing the pattern.
arg0First float value.
arg1Second float value.
arg2Third float value.
arg3Forth float value.
1958 {
1959 SetText(text, arg0, arg1, arg2, arg3, 0, 0, 0, 0);
1960 }

◆ SetText() [11/12]

void TMPro.TMP_Text.SetText ( string  text,
float  arg0,
float  arg1,
float  arg2,
float  arg3,
float  arg4,
float  arg5,
float  arg6,
float  arg7 
)
inherited

Formatted string containing a pattern and a value representing the text to be rendered.

Ex. TMP_Text.SetText("A = {0}, B = {1:00}, C = {2:000.0}", 10.75f, 10.75f, 10.75f);

Results "A = 10.75, B = 11, C = 010.8."

Parameters
textString containing the pattern.
arg0First float value.
arg1Second float value.
arg2Third float value.
arg3Forth float value.
arg4Fifth float value.
arg5Sixth float value.
arg6Seventh float value.
arg7Eighth float value.
2028 {
2029 int argIndex = 0;
2030 int padding = 0;
2031 int decimalPrecision = 0;
2032
2033 int readFlag = 0;
2034
2035 int readIndex = 0;
2036 int writeIndex = 0;
2037
2038 for (; readIndex < text.Length; readIndex++)
2039 {
2040 char c = text[readIndex];
2041
2042 if (c == '{')
2043 {
2044 readFlag = 1;
2045 continue;
2046 }
2047
2048 if (c == '}')
2049 {
2050 // Add arg(index) to array
2051 switch (argIndex)
2052 {
2053 case 0:
2054 AddFloatToCharArray(arg0, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2055 break;
2056 case 1:
2057 AddFloatToCharArray(arg1, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2058 break;
2059 case 2:
2060 AddFloatToCharArray(arg2, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2061 break;
2062 case 3:
2063 AddFloatToCharArray(arg3, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2064 break;
2065 case 4:
2066 AddFloatToCharArray(arg4, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2067 break;
2068 case 5:
2069 AddFloatToCharArray(arg5, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2070 break;
2071 case 6:
2072 AddFloatToCharArray(arg6, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2073 break;
2074 case 7:
2075 AddFloatToCharArray(arg7, padding, decimalPrecision, ref writeIndex);
2076 break;
2077 }
2078
2079 argIndex = 0;
2080 readFlag = 0;
2081 padding = 0;
2082 decimalPrecision = 0;
2083 continue;
2084 }
2085
2086 // Read Argument index
2087 if (readFlag == 1)
2088 {
2089 if (c >= '0' && c <= '8')
2090 {
2091 argIndex = c - 48;
2092 readFlag = 2;
2093 continue;
2094 }
2095 }
2096
2097 // Read formatting for integral part of the value
2098 if (readFlag == 2)
2099 {
2100 // Skip ':' separator
2101 if (c == ':')
2102 continue;
2103
2104 // Done reading integral formatting and value
2105 if (c == '.')
2106 {
2107 readFlag = 3;
2108 continue;
2109 }
2110
2111 if (c == '#')
2112 {
2113 // do something
2114 continue;
2115 }
2116
2117 if (c == '0')
2118 {
2119 padding += 1;
2120 continue;
2121 }
2122
2123 if (c == ',')
2124 {
2125 // Use commas in the integral value
2126 continue;
2127 }
2128
2129 // Legacy mode
2130 if (c >= '1' && c <= '9')
2131 {
2132 decimalPrecision = c - 48;
2133 continue;
2134 }
2135 }
2136
2137 // Read Decimal Precision value
2138 if (readFlag == 3)
2139 {
2140 if (c == '0')
2141 {
2142 decimalPrecision += 1;
2143 continue;
2144 }
2145 }
2146
2147 // Write value
2148 m_input_CharArray[writeIndex] = c;
2149 writeIndex += 1;
2150 }
2151
2152 m_input_CharArray[writeIndex] = (char)0;
2153 m_charArray_Length = writeIndex; // Set the length to where this '0' termination is.
2154
2155 #if UNITY_EDITOR
2156 // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
2157 m_text = new string(m_input_CharArray, 0, writeIndex - 1);
2158 #endif
2159
2160 m_inputSource = TextInputSources.SetText;
2161 m_isInputParsingRequired = true;
2162 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
2163
2164 SetVerticesDirty();
2165 SetLayoutDirty();
2166 }

202 //Debug.Log("***** SetVerticesDirty() called on object [" + this.name + "] at frame [" + Time.frameCount + "] *****");

◆ StringBuilderToInternalParsingBuffer()

int TMPro.TMP_Text.StringBuilderToInternalParsingBuffer ( StringBuilder  sourceText,
ref UnicodeChar[]  internalParsingArray 
)
protectedinherited

Copy contents of StringBuilder into int array.

Parameters
sourceTextText to copy.
internalParsingArrayArray to store contents.
3047 {
3048 int characterCount = sourceText == null ? 0 : sourceText.Length;
3049
3050 #if UNITY_EDITOR
3051 // Create new string to be displayed in the Input Text Box of the Editor Panel.
3052 // This results in allocations in the Unity Editor only
3053 if (characterCount == 0)
3054 m_text = string.Empty;
3055 else
3056 m_text = sourceText.ToString();
3057 #endif
3058
3059 // Early exit if string is null or empty
3060 if (characterCount == 0)
3061 {
3062 if (internalParsingArray != null)
3063 internalParsingArray[0].unicode = 0;
3064
3065 return 0;
3066 }
3067
3068 // Make sure parsing buffer is large enough to handle the required text.
3069 if (internalParsingArray == null)
3070 internalParsingArray = new UnicodeChar[characterCount];
3071 else if (internalParsingArray.Length < characterCount)
3072 ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray, characterCount);
3073
3074 // Clear Style stacks.
3075 for (int j = 0; j < m_TextStyleStacks.Length; j++)
3076 m_TextStyleStacks[j].SetDefault(0);
3077
3078 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
3079 int writeIndex = 0;
3080
3081 // Insert Opening Style
3082 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
3083 InsertOpeningStyleTag(m_TextStyle, 0, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
3084
3085 for (int i = 0; i < sourceText.Length; i++)
3086 {
3087 if (m_parseCtrlCharacters && sourceText[i] == 92 && sourceText.Length > i + 1)
3088 {
3089 switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
3090 {
3091 case 85: // \U00000000 for UTF-32 Unicode
3092 if (sourceText.Length > i + 9)
3093 {
3094 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3095
3096 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF32(sourceText, i + 2);
3097 i += 9;
3098 writeIndex += 1;
3099 continue;
3100 }
3101 break;
3102 case 92: // \ escape
3103 if (sourceText.Length <= i + 2) break;
3104
3105 if (writeIndex + 2 > internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3106
3107 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i + 1];
3108 internalParsingArray[writeIndex + 1].unicode = sourceText[i + 2];
3109 i += 2;
3110 writeIndex += 2;
3111 continue;
3112 case 110: // \n LineFeed
3113 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3114
3115 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
3116 i += 1;
3117 writeIndex += 1;
3118 continue;
3119 case 114: // \r
3120 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3121
3122 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
3123 i += 1;
3124 writeIndex += 1;
3125 continue;
3126 case 116: // \t Tab
3127 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3128
3129 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
3130 i += 1;
3131 writeIndex += 1;
3132 continue;
3133 case 117: // \u0000 for UTF-16 Unicode
3134 if (sourceText.Length > i + 5)
3135 {
3136 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3137
3138 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF16(sourceText, i + 2);
3139 i += 5;
3140 writeIndex += 1;
3141 continue;
3142 }
3143 break;
3144 case 118: // \v Vertical tab used as soft line break
3145 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3146
3147 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 11;
3148 i += 1;
3149 writeIndex += 1;
3150 continue;
3151 }
3152 }
3153
3154 // Handle UTF-32 in the input text (string).
3155 if (char.IsHighSurrogate(sourceText[i]) && char.IsLowSurrogate(sourceText[i + 1]))
3156 {
3157 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3158
3159 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = char.ConvertToUtf32(sourceText[i], sourceText[i + 1]);
3160 i += 1;
3161 writeIndex += 1;
3162 continue;
3163 }
3164
3165 // Handle inline replacement of <stlye> and <br> tags.
3166 if (sourceText[i] == 60)
3167 {
3168 if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
3169 {
3170 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3171
3172 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
3173 writeIndex += 1;
3174 i += 3;
3175
3176 continue;
3177 }
3178 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<NBSP>", i))
3179 {
3180 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3181
3182 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
3183 writeIndex += 1;
3184 i += 5;
3185
3186 continue;
3187 }
3188 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<ZWSP>", i))
3189 {
3190 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3191
3192 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
3193 writeIndex += 1;
3194 i += 5;
3195
3196 continue;
3197 }
3198 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
3199 {
3200 int srcOffset;
3201 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out srcOffset, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex))
3202 {
3203 i = srcOffset;
3204 continue;
3205 }
3206 }
3207 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
3208 {
3209 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
3210
3211 // Strip </style> even if style is invalid.
3212 i += 7;
3213 continue;
3214 }
3215 }
3216
3217 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3218
3219 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
3220 writeIndex += 1;
3221 }
3222
3223 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
3224
3225 // Insert Closing Style
3226 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
3227 InsertClosingStyleTag(ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
3228
3229 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3230
3231 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
3232 return writeIndex;
3233 }

◆ StringToInternalParsingBuffer()

int TMPro.TMP_Text.StringToInternalParsingBuffer ( string  sourceText,
ref UnicodeChar[]  internalParsingArray 
)
protectedinherited

Method to store the content of a string into an integer array.

Parameters
sourceText
internalParsingArray
2819 {
2820 int characterCount = sourceText == null ? 0 : sourceText.Length;
2821
2822 // Early exit if string is null or empty
2823 if (characterCount == 0)
2824 {
2825 if (internalParsingArray != null)
2826 internalParsingArray[0].unicode = 0;
2827
2828 return 0;
2829 }
2830
2831 // Allocate internal buffers that are large enough to handle the required text.
2832 if (internalParsingArray == null)
2833 internalParsingArray = new UnicodeChar[characterCount];
2834 else if (internalParsingArray.Length < characterCount)
2835 ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray, characterCount);
2836
2837 // Clear Style stacks.
2838 for (int j = 0; j < m_TextStyleStacks.Length; j++)
2839 m_TextStyleStacks[j].SetDefault(0);
2840
2841 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
2842 int writeIndex = 0;
2843
2844 // Insert Opening Style
2845 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
2846 InsertOpeningStyleTag(m_TextStyle, 0, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
2847
2848 for (int i = 0; i < sourceText.Length; i++)
2849 {
2850 if (m_inputSource == TextInputSources.Text && sourceText[i] == 92 && sourceText.Length > i + 1)
2851 {
2852 switch ((int)sourceText[i + 1])
2853 {
2854 case 85: // \U00000000 for UTF-32 Unicode
2855 if (sourceText.Length > i + 9)
2856 {
2857 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2858
2859 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF32(sourceText, i + 2);
2860 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2861 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 10;
2862
2863 i += 9;
2864 writeIndex += 1;
2865 continue;
2866 }
2867 break;
2868 case 92: // \ escape
2869 if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2870
2871 if (sourceText.Length <= i + 2) break;
2872
2873 if (writeIndex + 2 > internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2874
2875 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i + 1];
2876 internalParsingArray[writeIndex + 1].unicode = sourceText[i + 2];
2877 i += 2;
2878 writeIndex += 2;
2879 continue;
2880 case 110: // \n LineFeed
2881 if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2882
2883 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2884
2885 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2886 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2887 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2888
2889 i += 1;
2890 writeIndex += 1;
2891 continue;
2892 case 114: // \r
2893 if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2894
2895 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2896
2897 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 13;
2898 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2899 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2900
2901 i += 1;
2902 writeIndex += 1;
2903 continue;
2904 case 116: // \t Tab
2905 if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2906
2907 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2908
2909 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 9;
2910 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2911 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2912
2913 i += 1;
2914 writeIndex += 1;
2915 continue;
2916 case 117: // \u0000 for UTF-16 Unicode
2917 if (sourceText.Length > i + 5)
2918 {
2919 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2920
2921 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = GetUTF16(sourceText, i + 2);
2922 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2923 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 6;
2924
2925 i += 5;
2926 writeIndex += 1;
2927 continue;
2928 }
2929 break;
2930 case 118: // \v Vertical tab used as soft line break
2931 if (!m_parseCtrlCharacters) break;
2932
2933 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2934
2935 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 11;
2936 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2937 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2938
2939 i += 1;
2940 writeIndex += 1;
2941 continue;
2942 }
2943 }
2944
2945 // Handle UTF-32 in the input text (string). // Not sure this is needed //
2946 if (char.IsHighSurrogate(sourceText[i]) && char.IsLowSurrogate(sourceText[i + 1]))
2947 {
2948 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2949
2950 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = char.ConvertToUtf32(sourceText[i], sourceText[i + 1]);
2951 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2952 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 2;
2953
2954 i += 1;
2955 writeIndex += 1;
2956 continue;
2957 }
2958
2960 if (sourceText[i] == 60 && m_isRichText)
2961 {
2962 if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<BR>", i))
2963 {
2964 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2965
2966 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 10;
2967 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2968 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2969
2970 writeIndex += 1;
2971 i += 3;
2972
2973 continue;
2974 }
2975 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<NBSP>", i))
2976 {
2977 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2978
2979 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 160;
2980 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2981 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2982
2983 writeIndex += 1;
2984 i += 5;
2985
2986 continue;
2987 }
2988 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<ZWSP>", i))
2989 {
2990 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
2991
2992 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 0x200B;
2993 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = i;
2994 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
2995
2996 writeIndex += 1;
2997 i += 5;
2998
2999 continue;
3000 }
3001 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "<STYLE=", i))
3002 {
3003 int srcOffset;
3004 if (ReplaceOpeningStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, out srcOffset, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex))
3005 {
3006 i = srcOffset;
3007 continue;
3008 }
3009 }
3010 else if (IsTagName(ref sourceText, "</STYLE>", i))
3011 {
3012 ReplaceClosingStyleTag(ref sourceText, i, ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
3013
3014 i += 7;
3015 continue;
3016 }
3017 }
3018
3019 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3020
3021 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = sourceText[i];
3022 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].stringIndex = writeIndex;
3023 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].length = 1;
3024
3025 writeIndex += 1;
3026 }
3027
3028 m_TextStyleStackDepth = 0;
3029
3030 // Insert Closing Style
3031 if (textStyle.hashCode != (int)TagHashCode.NORMAL)
3032 InsertClosingStyleTag(ref internalParsingArray, ref writeIndex);
3033
3034 if (writeIndex == internalParsingArray.Length) ResizeInternalArray(ref internalParsingArray);
3035
3036 internalParsingArray[writeIndex].unicode = 0;
3037 return writeIndex;
3038 }

◆ UpdateEnvMapMatrix()

void TMPro.TextMeshPro.UpdateEnvMapMatrix ( )
private
525 {
526 if (!m_sharedMaterial.HasProperty(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMap) || m_sharedMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMap) == null)
527 return;
528
529 //Debug.Log("Updating Env Matrix...");
530 Vector3 rotation = m_sharedMaterial.GetVector(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMatrixRotation);
531 m_EnvMapMatrix = Matrix4x4.TRS(Vector3.zero, Quaternion.Euler(rotation), Vector3.one);
532
533 m_sharedMaterial.SetMatrix(ShaderUtilities.ID_EnvMatrix, m_EnvMapMatrix);
534 }

◆ UpdateMaterial()

288 {
289 //Debug.Log("***** UpdateMaterial() called on object ID " + GetInstanceID() + ". *****");

292 // return;
293
294 if (renderer == null || m_sharedMaterial == null)
295 return;
296
297 // Only update the material if it has changed.
298 if (m_renderer.sharedMaterial == null || m_renderer.sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID() != m_sharedMaterial.GetInstanceID())
299 m_renderer.sharedMaterial = m_sharedMaterial;

◆ UpdateMeshPadding()

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.UpdateMeshPadding ( )

Function to be used to force recomputing of character padding when Shader / Material properties have been changed via script.

307 {
308 m_padding = ShaderUtilities.GetPadding(m_sharedMaterial, m_enableExtraPadding, m_isUsingBold);
309 m_isMaskingEnabled = ShaderUtilities.IsMaskingEnabled(m_sharedMaterial);
310 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;

315
