◆ UpdateSDFScale()

void TMPro.TextMeshPro.UpdateSDFScale ( float  scaleDelta)
private

Method to Update Scale in UV2

Method to update the SDF Scale in UV2.

Parameters
scaleDelta
4446 {
4447 if (scaleDelta == 0 || scaleDelta == float.PositiveInfinity || scaleDelta == float.NegativeInfinity)
4448 {
4449 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
4450 OnPreRenderObject();
4451 return;
4452 }
4453
4454 for (int materialIndex = 0; materialIndex < m_textInfo.materialCount; materialIndex++)
4455 {
4456 TMP_MeshInfo meshInfo = m_textInfo.meshInfo[materialIndex];
4457
4458 for (int i = 0; i < meshInfo.uvs2.Length; i++)
4459 {
4460 meshInfo.uvs2[i].y *= Mathf.Abs(scaleDelta);
4461 }
4462 }
4463
4464 // Push the updated uv2 scale information to the meshes.
4465 for (int i = 0; i < m_textInfo.meshInfo.Length; i++)
4466 {
4467 if (i == 0)
4468 m_mesh.uv2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[0].uvs2;
4469 else
4470 m_subTextObjects[i].mesh.uv2 = m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].uvs2;
4471 }
4472 }

◆ UpdateVertexData() [1/2]

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.UpdateVertexData ( )

434 {
435 int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount;
436
437 for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
438 {
439 Mesh mesh;
440
441 if (i == 0)
442 mesh = m_mesh;
443 else
444 {
445 // Clear unused vertices
446 m_textInfo.meshInfo[i].ClearUnusedVertices();
447
448 mesh = m_subTextObjects[i].mesh;
449 }

◆ UpdateVertexData() [2/2]

override void TMPro.TextMeshPro.UpdateVertexData ( TMP_VertexDataUpdateFlags  flags)

Function to upload the updated vertex data and renderer.

Reimplemented from TMPro.TMP_Text.

390 {
391 int materialCount = m_textInfo.materialCount;
392
393 for (int i = 0; i < materialCount; i++)
394 {
395 Mesh mesh;
396

398 mesh = m_mesh;

◆ ValidateHtmlTag()

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.ValidateHtmlTag ( UnicodeChar[]  chars,
int  startIndex,
out int  endIndex 
)
protectedinherited

Function to identify and validate the rich tag. Returns the position of the > if the tag was valid.

Parameters
chars
startIndex
endIndex
Returns
7968 {
7969 int tagCharCount = 0;
7970 byte attributeFlag = 0;
7971
7972 int attributeIndex = 0;
7973 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
7974 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
7975 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
7976 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
7977 TagValueType tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
7978 TagUnitType tagUnitType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
7979
7980 // Clear attribute name hash codes
7981 m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode = 0;
7982 m_xmlAttribute[2].nameHashCode = 0;
7983 m_xmlAttribute[3].nameHashCode = 0;
7984 m_xmlAttribute[4].nameHashCode = 0;
7985
7986 endIndex = startIndex;
7987 bool isTagSet = false;
7988 bool isValidHtmlTag = false;
7989
7990 for (int i = startIndex; i < chars.Length && chars[i].unicode != 0 && tagCharCount < m_htmlTag.Length && chars[i].unicode != '<'; i++)
7991 {
7992 int unicode = chars[i].unicode;
7993
7994 if (unicode == '>') // ASCII Code of End HTML tag '>'
7995 {
7996 isValidHtmlTag = true;
7997 endIndex = i;
7998 m_htmlTag[tagCharCount] = (char)0;
7999 break;
8000 }
8001
8002 m_htmlTag[tagCharCount] = (char)unicode;
8003 tagCharCount += 1;
8004
8005 if (attributeFlag == 1)
8006 {
8007 if (tagValueType == TagValueType.None)
8008 {
8009 // Check for attribute type
8010 if (unicode == '+' || unicode == '-' || unicode == '.' || (unicode >= '0' && unicode <= '9'))
8011 {
8012 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8013 tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.NumericalValue;
8014 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount - 1;
8015 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
8016 }
8017 else if (unicode == '#')
8018 {
8019 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8020 tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.ColorValue;
8021 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount - 1;
8022 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
8023 }
8024 else if (unicode == '"')
8025 {
8026 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8027 tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.StringValue;
8028 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount;
8029 }
8030 else
8031 {
8032 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8033 tagValueType = m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.StringValue;
8034 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = tagCharCount - 1;
8035 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = (m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode << 5) + m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode ^ unicode;
8036 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
8037 }
8038 }
8039 else
8040 {
8041 if (tagValueType == TagValueType.NumericalValue)
8042 {
8043 // Check for termination of numerical value.
8044 if (unicode == 'p' || unicode == 'e' || unicode == '%' || unicode == ' ')
8045 {
8046 attributeFlag = 2;
8047 tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
8048
8049 switch (unicode)
8050 {
8051 case 'e':
8052 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = tagUnitType = TagUnitType.FontUnits;
8053 break;
8054 case '%':
8055 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Percentage;
8056 break;
8057 default:
8058 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8059 break;
8060 }
8061
8062 attributeIndex += 1;
8063 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
8064 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
8065 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
8066 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8067 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
8068 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
8069
8070 }
8071 else if (attributeFlag != 2)
8072 {
8073 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
8074 }
8075 }
8076 else if (tagValueType == TagValueType.ColorValue)
8077 {
8078 if (unicode != ' ')
8079 {
8080 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
8081 }
8082 else
8083 {
8084 attributeFlag = 2;
8085 tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
8086 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8087 attributeIndex += 1;
8088 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
8089 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
8090 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8091 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
8092 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
8093 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
8094 }
8095 }
8096 else if (tagValueType == TagValueType.StringValue)
8097 {
8098 // Compute HashCode value for the named tag.
8099 if (unicode != '"')
8100 {
8101 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = (m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode << 5) + m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode ^ unicode;
8102 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength += 1;
8103 }
8104 else
8105 {
8106 attributeFlag = 2;
8107 tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
8108 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8109 attributeIndex += 1;
8110 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
8111 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
8112 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8113 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
8114 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
8115 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
8116 }
8117 }
8118 }
8119 }
8120
8121
8122 if (unicode == '=') // '='
8123 attributeFlag = 1;
8124
8125 // Compute HashCode for the name of the attribute
8126 if (attributeFlag == 0 && unicode == ' ')
8127 {
8128 if (isTagSet) return false;
8129
8130 isTagSet = true;
8131 attributeFlag = 2;
8132
8133 tagValueType = TagValueType.None;
8134 tagUnitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8135 attributeIndex += 1;
8136 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = 0;
8137 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueType = TagValueType.None;
8138 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].unitType = TagUnitType.Pixels;
8139 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueHashCode = 0;
8140 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueStartIndex = 0;
8141 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].valueLength = 0;
8142 }
8143
8144 if (attributeFlag == 0)
8145 m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode = (m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode << 3) - m_xmlAttribute[attributeIndex].nameHashCode + unicode;
8146
8147 if (attributeFlag == 2 && unicode == ' ')
8148 attributeFlag = 0;
8149
8150 }
8151
8152 if (!isValidHtmlTag)
8153 {
8154 return false;
8155 }
8156
8157 //Debug.Log("Tag is [" + m_htmlTag.ArrayToString() + "]. Tag HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode + " Tag Value HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode + " Attribute 1 HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode + " Value HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[1].valueHashCode);
8158 //for (int i = 0; i < attributeIndex; i++)
8159 // Debug.Log("Tag [" + i + "] with HashCode: " + m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode + " has value of [" + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength) + "] Numerical Value: " + ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength));
8160
8161 #region Rich Text Tag Processing
8162 #if !RICH_TEXT_ENABLED
8163 // Special handling of the no parsing tag </noparse> </NOPARSE> tag
8164 if (tag_NoParsing && (m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode != 53822163 && m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode != 49429939))
8165 return false;
8166 else if (m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode == 53822163 || m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode == 49429939)
8167 {
8168 tag_NoParsing = false;
8169 return true;
8170 }
8171
8172 // Color <#FFF> 3 Hex values (short form)
8173 if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 4)
8174 {
8175 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8176 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8177 return true;
8178 }
8179 // Color <#FFF7> 4 Hex values with alpha (short form)
8180 else if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 5)
8181 {
8182 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8183 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8184 return true;
8185 }
8186 // Color <#FF00FF>
8187 else if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 7) // if Tag begins with # and contains 7 characters.
8188 {
8189 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8190 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8191 return true;
8192 }
8193 // Color <#FF00FF00> with alpha
8194 else if (m_htmlTag[0] == 35 && tagCharCount == 9) // if Tag begins with # and contains 9 characters.
8195 {
8196 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8197 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8198 return true;
8199 }
8200 else
8201 {
8202 float value = 0;
8203
8204 switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].nameHashCode)
8205 {
8206 case 98: // <b>
8207 case 66: // <B>
8208 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Bold;
8209 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Bold);
8210
8211 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Bold;
8212 return true;
8213 case 427: // </b>
8214 case 395: // </B>
8215 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Bold) != FontStyles.Bold)
8216 {
8217 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Bold) == 0)
8218 {
8219 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Bold;
8220 m_FontWeightInternal = m_FontWeightStack.Peek();
8221 }
8222 }
8223 return true;
8224 case 105: // <i>
8225 case 73: // <I>
8226 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Italic;
8227 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Italic);
8228
8229 if (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 276531 || m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 186899)
8230 {
8231 m_ItalicAngle = (int)ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
8232
8233 // Make sure angle is within valid range.
8234 if (m_ItalicAngle < -180 || m_ItalicAngle > 180) return false;
8235 }
8236 else
8237 m_ItalicAngle = m_currentFontAsset.italicStyle;
8238
8239 m_ItalicAngleStack.Add(m_ItalicAngle);
8240
8241 return true;
8242 case 434: // </i>
8243 case 402: // </I>
8244 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Italic) != FontStyles.Italic)
8245 {
8246 m_ItalicAngle = m_ItalicAngleStack.Remove();
8247
8248 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Italic) == 0)
8249 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Italic;
8250 }
8251 return true;
8252 case 115: // <s>
8253 case 83: // <S>
8254 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Strikethrough;
8255 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Strikethrough);
8256
8257 if (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 281955 || m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 192323)
8258 {
8259 m_strikethroughColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
8260 m_strikethroughColor.a = m_htmlColor.a < m_strikethroughColor.a ? (byte)(m_htmlColor.a) : (byte)(m_strikethroughColor .a);
8261 }
8262 else
8263 m_strikethroughColor = m_htmlColor;
8264
8265 m_strikethroughColorStack.Add(m_strikethroughColor);
8266
8267 return true;
8268 case 444: // </s>
8269 case 412: // </S>
8270 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Strikethrough) != FontStyles.Strikethrough)
8271 {
8272 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Strikethrough) == 0)
8273 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Strikethrough;
8274 }
8275
8276 m_strikethroughColor = m_strikethroughColorStack.Remove();
8277 return true;
8278 case 117: // <u>
8279 case 85: // <U>
8280 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Underline;
8281 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Underline);
8282
8283 if (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 281955 || m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode == 192323)
8284 {
8285 m_underlineColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
8286 m_underlineColor.a = m_htmlColor.a < m_underlineColor.a ? (byte)(m_htmlColor.a) : (byte)(m_underlineColor.a);
8287 }
8288 else
8289 m_underlineColor = m_htmlColor;
8290
8291 m_underlineColorStack.Add(m_underlineColor);
8292
8293 return true;
8294 case 446: // </u>
8295 case 414: // </U>
8296 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Underline) != FontStyles.Underline)
8297 {
8298 m_underlineColor = m_underlineColorStack.Remove();
8299
8300 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Underline) == 0)
8301 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Underline;
8302 }
8303
8304 m_underlineColor = m_underlineColorStack.Remove();
8305 return true;
8306 case 43045: // <mark=#FF00FF80>
8307 case 30245: // <MARK>
8308 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Highlight;
8309 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Highlight);
8310
8311 Color32 highlightColor = new Color32(255, 255, 0, 64);
8312 TMP_Offset highlightPadding = TMP_Offset.zero;
8313
8314 // Handle Mark Tag and potential attributes
8315 for (int i = 0; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
8316 {
8317 int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
8318
8319 switch (nameHashCode)
8320 {
8321 // Mark tag
8322 case 43045:
8323 case 30245:
8324 if (m_xmlAttribute[i].valueType == TagValueType.ColorValue)
8325 highlightColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8326 break;
8327
8328 // Color attribute
8329 case 281955:
8330 highlightColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
8331 break;
8332
8333 // Padding attribute
8334 case 15087385:
8335 int paramCount = GetAttributeParameters(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength, ref m_attributeParameterValues);
8336 if (paramCount != 4) return false;
8337
8338 highlightPadding = new TMP_Offset(m_attributeParameterValues[0], m_attributeParameterValues[1], m_attributeParameterValues[2], m_attributeParameterValues[3]);
8339 highlightPadding *= m_fontSize * 0.01f * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
8340 break;
8341 }
8342 }
8343
8344 highlightColor.a = m_htmlColor.a < highlightColor.a ? (byte)(m_htmlColor.a) : (byte)(highlightColor.a);
8345
8346 HighlightState state = new HighlightState(highlightColor, highlightPadding);
8347 m_HighlightStateStack.Push(state);
8348
8349 return true;
8350 case 155892: // </mark>
8351 case 143092: // </MARK>
8352 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.Highlight) != FontStyles.Highlight)
8353 {
8354 m_HighlightStateStack.Remove();
8355
8356 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Highlight) == 0)
8357 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Highlight;
8358 }
8359 return true;
8360 case 6552: // <sub>
8361 case 4728: // <SUB>
8362 m_fontScaleMultiplier *= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize : 1;
8363 m_baselineOffsetStack.Push(m_baselineOffset);
8364 m_baselineOffset += m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
8365
8366 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Subscript);
8367 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Subscript;
8368 return true;
8369 case 22673: // </sub>
8370 case 20849: // </SUB>
8371 if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Subscript) == FontStyles.Subscript)
8372 {
8373 if (m_fontScaleMultiplier < 1)
8374 {
8375 //m_baselineOffset -= m_currentFontAsset.fontInfo.SubscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
8376 m_baselineOffset = m_baselineOffsetStack.Pop();
8377 m_fontScaleMultiplier /= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.subscriptSize : 1;
8378 }
8379
8380 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Subscript) == 0)
8381 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Subscript;
8382 }
8383 return true;
8384 case 6566: // <sup>
8385 case 4742: // <SUP>
8386 m_fontScaleMultiplier *= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize : 1;
8387 m_baselineOffsetStack.Push(m_baselineOffset);
8388 m_baselineOffset += m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
8389
8390 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.Superscript);
8391 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.Superscript;
8392 return true;
8393 case 22687: // </sup>
8394 case 20863: // </SUP>
8395 if ((m_FontStyleInternal & FontStyles.Superscript) == FontStyles.Superscript)
8396 {
8397 if (m_fontScaleMultiplier < 1)
8398 {
8399 //m_baselineOffset -= m_currentFontAsset.fontInfo.SuperscriptOffset * m_fontScale * m_fontScaleMultiplier;
8400 m_baselineOffset = m_baselineOffsetStack.Pop();
8401 m_fontScaleMultiplier /= m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize > 0 ? m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.superscriptSize : 1;
8402 }
8403
8404 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.Superscript) == 0)
8405 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.Superscript;
8406 }
8407 return true;
8408 case -330774850: // <font-weight>
8409 case 2012149182: // <FONT-WEIGHT>
8410 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8411
8412 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
8413 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
8414
8415 switch ((int)value)
8416 {
8417 case 100:
8418 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Thin;
8419 break;
8420 case 200:
8421 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.ExtraLight;
8422 break;
8423 case 300:
8424 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Light;
8425 break;
8426 case 400:
8427 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Regular;
8428 break;
8429 case 500:
8430 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Medium;
8431 break;
8432 case 600:
8433 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.SemiBold;
8434 break;
8435 case 700:
8436 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Bold;
8437 break;
8438 case 800:
8439 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Heavy;
8440 break;
8441 case 900:
8442 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Black;
8443 break;
8444 }
8445
8446 m_FontWeightStack.Add(m_FontWeightInternal);
8447
8448 return true;
8449 case -1885698441: // </font-weight>
8450 case 457225591: // </FONT-WEIGHT>
8451 m_FontWeightStack.Remove();
8452
8453 if (m_FontStyleInternal == FontStyles.Bold)
8454 m_FontWeightInternal = FontWeight.Bold;
8455 else
8456 m_FontWeightInternal = m_FontWeightStack.Peek();
8457
8458 return true;
8459 case 6380: // <pos=000.00px> <pos=0em> <pos=50%>
8460 case 4556: // <POS>
8461 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8462
8463 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
8464 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
8465
8466 switch (tagUnitType)
8467 {
8468 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
8469 m_xAdvance = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1.0f : 0.1f);
8470 //m_isIgnoringAlignment = true;
8471 return true;
8472 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
8473 m_xAdvance = value * m_currentFontSize * (m_isOrthographic ? 1.0f : 0.1f);
8474 //m_isIgnoringAlignment = true;
8475 return true;
8476 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
8477 m_xAdvance = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
8478 //m_isIgnoringAlignment = true;
8479 return true;
8480 }
8481 return false;
8482 case 22501: // </pos>
8483 case 20677: // </POS>
8484 m_isIgnoringAlignment = false;
8485 return true;
8486 case 16034505: // <voffset>
8487 case 11642281: // <VOFFSET>
8488 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8489
8490 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
8491 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
8492
8493 switch (tagUnitType)
8494 {
8495 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
8496 m_baselineOffset = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
8497 return true;
8498 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
8499 m_baselineOffset = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
8500 return true;
8501 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
8502 //m_baselineOffset = m_marginHeight * val / 100;
8503 return false;
8504 }
8505 return false;
8506 case 54741026: // </voffset>
8507 case 50348802: // </VOFFSET>
8508 m_baselineOffset = 0;
8509 return true;
8510 case 43991: // <page>
8511 case 31191: // <PAGE>
8512 // This tag only works when Overflow - Page mode is used.
8513 if (m_overflowMode == TextOverflowModes.Page)
8514 {
8515 m_xAdvance = 0 + tag_LineIndent + tag_Indent;
8516 m_lineOffset = 0;
8517 m_pageNumber += 1;
8518 m_isNewPage = true;
8519 }
8520 return true;
8521 // <BR> tag is now handled inline where it is replaced by a linefeed or \n.
8522 //case 544: // <BR>
8523 //case 800: // <br>
8524 // m_forceLineBreak = true;
8525 // return true;
8526 case 43969: // <nobr>
8527 case 31169: // <NOBR>
8528 m_isNonBreakingSpace = true;
8529 return true;
8530 case 156816: // </nobr>
8531 case 144016: // </NOBR>
8532 m_isNonBreakingSpace = false;
8533 return true;
8534 case 45545: // <size=>
8535 case 32745: // <SIZE>
8536 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8537
8538 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
8539 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
8540
8541 switch (tagUnitType)
8542 {
8543 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
8544 if (m_htmlTag[5] == 43) // <size=+00>
8545 {
8546 m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize + value;
8547 m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
8548 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8549 return true;
8550 }
8551 else if (m_htmlTag[5] == 45) // <size=-00>
8552 {
8553 m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize + value;
8554 m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
8555 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8556 return true;
8557 }
8558 else // <size=00.0>
8559 {
8560 m_currentFontSize = value;
8561 m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
8562 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8563 return true;
8564 }
8565 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
8566 m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize * value;
8567 m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
8568 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8569 return true;
8570 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
8571 m_currentFontSize = m_fontSize * value / 100;
8572 m_sizeStack.Add(m_currentFontSize);
8573 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8574 return true;
8575 }
8576 return false;
8577 case 158392: // </size>
8578 case 145592: // </SIZE>
8579 m_currentFontSize = m_sizeStack.Remove();
8580 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8581 return true;
8582 case 41311: // <font=xx>
8583 case 28511: // <FONT>
8584 int fontHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
8585 int materialAttributeHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode;
8586 int materialHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[1].valueHashCode;
8587
8588 // Special handling for <font=default> or <font=Default>
8589 if (fontHashCode == 764638571 || fontHashCode == 523367755)
8590 {
8591 m_currentFontAsset = m_materialReferences[0].fontAsset;
8592 m_currentMaterial = m_materialReferences[0].material;
8593 m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
8594 //Debug.Log("<font=Default> assigning Font Asset [" + m_currentFontAsset.name + "] with Material [" + m_currentMaterial.name + "].");
8595
8596 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8597
8598 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[0]);
8599
8600 return true;
8601 }
8602
8603 TMP_FontAsset tempFont;
8604 Material tempMaterial;
8605
8606 // HANDLE NEW FONT ASSET
8607 //TMP_ResourceManager.TryGetFontAsset(fontHashCode, out tempFont);
8608
8609 // Check if we already have a reference to this font asset.
8610 MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetFontAsset(fontHashCode, out tempFont);
8611
8612 // Try loading font asset from potential delegate or resources.
8613 if (tempFont == null)
8614 {
8615 // Check for anyone registered to this callback
8616 tempFont = OnFontAssetRequest?.Invoke(fontHashCode, new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
8617
8618 if (tempFont == null)
8619 {
8620 // Load Font Asset
8621 tempFont = Resources.Load<TMP_FontAsset>(TMP_Settings.defaultFontAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
8622 }
8623
8624 if (tempFont == null)
8625 return false;
8626
8627 // Add new reference to the font asset as well as default material to the MaterialReferenceManager
8628 MaterialReferenceManager.AddFontAsset(tempFont);
8629 }
8630
8631 // HANDLE NEW MATERIAL
8632 if (materialAttributeHashCode == 0 && materialHashCode == 0)
8633 {
8634 // No material specified then use default font asset material.
8635 m_currentMaterial = tempFont.material;
8636
8637 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, tempFont, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
8638
8639 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
8640 }
8641 else if (materialAttributeHashCode == 103415287 || materialAttributeHashCode == 72669687) // using material attribute
8642 {
8643 if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetMaterial(materialHashCode, out tempMaterial))
8644 {
8645 m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
8646
8647 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, tempFont, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
8648
8649 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
8650 }
8651 else
8652 {
8653 // Load new material
8654 tempMaterial = Resources.Load<Material>(TMP_Settings.defaultFontAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength));
8655
8656 if (tempMaterial == null)
8657 return false;
8658
8659 // Add new reference to this material in the MaterialReferenceManager
8660 MaterialReferenceManager.AddFontMaterial(materialHashCode, tempMaterial);
8661
8662 m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
8663
8664 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, tempFont, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
8665
8666 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
8667 }
8668 }
8669 else
8670 return false;
8671
8672 m_currentFontAsset = tempFont;
8673 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8674
8675 return true;
8676 case 154158: // </font>
8677 case 141358: // </FONT>
8678 {
8679 MaterialReference materialReference = m_materialReferenceStack.Remove();
8680
8681 m_currentFontAsset = materialReference.fontAsset;
8682 m_currentMaterial = materialReference.material;
8683 m_currentMaterialIndex = materialReference.index;
8684
8685 m_fontScale = (m_currentFontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize * m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.scale * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f));
8686
8687 return true;
8688 }
8689 case 103415287: // <material="material name">
8690 case 72669687: // <MATERIAL>
8691 materialHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
8692
8693 // Special handling for <material=default> or <material=Default>
8694 if (materialHashCode == 764638571 || materialHashCode == 523367755)
8695 {
8696 // Check if material font atlas texture matches that of the current font asset.
8697 //if (m_currentFontAsset.atlas.GetInstanceID() != m_currentMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID()) return false;
8698
8699 m_currentMaterial = m_materialReferences[0].material;
8700 m_currentMaterialIndex = 0;
8701
8702 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[0]);
8703
8704 return true;
8705 }
8706
8707
8708 // Check if material
8709 if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetMaterial(materialHashCode, out tempMaterial))
8710 {
8711 // Check if material font atlas texture matches that of the current font asset.
8712 //if (m_currentFontAsset.atlas.GetInstanceID() != tempMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID()) return false;
8713
8714 m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
8715
8716 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
8717
8718 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
8719 }
8720 else
8721 {
8722 // Load new material
8723 tempMaterial = Resources.Load<Material>(TMP_Settings.defaultFontAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
8724
8725 if (tempMaterial == null)
8726 return false;
8727
8728 // Check if material font atlas texture matches that of the current font asset.
8729 //if (m_currentFontAsset.atlas.GetInstanceID() != tempMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID()) return false;
8730
8731 // Add new reference to this material in the MaterialReferenceManager
8732 MaterialReferenceManager.AddFontMaterial(materialHashCode, tempMaterial);
8733
8734 m_currentMaterial = tempMaterial;
8735
8736 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentMaterial, m_currentFontAsset , m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
8737
8738 m_materialReferenceStack.Add(m_materialReferences[m_currentMaterialIndex]);
8739 }
8740 return true;
8741 case 374360934: // </material>
8742 case 343615334: // </MATERIAL>
8743 {
8744 //if (m_currentMaterial.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID() != m_materialReferenceStack.PreviousItem().material.GetTexture(ShaderUtilities.ID_MainTex).GetInstanceID())
8745 // return false;
8746
8747 MaterialReference materialReference = m_materialReferenceStack.Remove();
8748
8749 m_currentMaterial = materialReference.material;
8750 m_currentMaterialIndex = materialReference.index;
8751
8752 return true;
8753 }
8754 case 320078: // <space=000.00>
8755 case 230446: // <SPACE>
8756 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8757
8758 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
8759 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
8760
8761 switch (tagUnitType)
8762 {
8763 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
8764 m_xAdvance += value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
8765 return true;
8766 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
8767 m_xAdvance += value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
8768 return true;
8769 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
8770 // Not applicable
8771 return false;
8772 }
8773 return false;
8774 case 276254: // <alpha=#FF>
8775 case 186622: // <ALPHA>
8776 if (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength != 3) return false;
8777
8778 m_htmlColor.a = (byte)(HexToInt(m_htmlTag[7]) * 16 + HexToInt(m_htmlTag[8]));
8779 return true;
8780
8781 case 1750458: // <a name=" ">
8782 return false;
8783 case 426: // </a>
8784 return true;
8785 case 43066: // <link="name">
8786 case 30266: // <LINK>
8787 if (m_isParsingText && !m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
8788 {
8789 int index = m_textInfo.linkCount;
8790
8791 if (index + 1 > m_textInfo.linkInfo.Length)
8792 TMP_TextInfo.Resize(ref m_textInfo.linkInfo, index + 1);
8793
8794 m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].textComponent = this;
8795 m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].hashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
8796 m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].linkTextfirstCharacterIndex = m_characterCount;
8797
8798 m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].linkIdFirstCharacterIndex = startIndex + m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex;
8799 m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].linkIdLength = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength;
8800 m_textInfo.linkInfo[index].SetLinkID(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8801 }
8802 return true;
8803 case 155913: // </link>
8804 case 143113: // </LINK>
8805 if (m_isParsingText && !m_isCalculatingPreferredValues)
8806 {
8807 if (m_textInfo.linkCount < m_textInfo.linkInfo.Length)
8808 {
8809 m_textInfo.linkInfo[m_textInfo.linkCount].linkTextLength = m_characterCount - m_textInfo.linkInfo[m_textInfo.linkCount].linkTextfirstCharacterIndex;
8810
8811 m_textInfo.linkCount += 1;
8812 }
8813 }
8814 return true;
8815 case 275917: // <align=>
8816 case 186285: // <ALIGN>
8817 switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode)
8818 {
8819 case 3774683: // <align=left>
8820 m_lineJustification = HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Left;
8821 m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
8822 return true;
8823 case 136703040: // <align=right>
8824 m_lineJustification = HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Right;
8825 m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
8826 return true;
8827 case -458210101: // <align=center>
8828 m_lineJustification = HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Center;
8829 m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
8830 return true;
8831 case -523808257: // <align=justified>
8832 m_lineJustification = HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Justified;
8833 m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
8834 return true;
8835 case 122383428: // <align=flush>
8836 m_lineJustification = HorizontalAlignmentOptions.Flush;
8837 m_lineJustificationStack.Add(m_lineJustification);
8838 return true;
8839 }
8840 return false;
8841 case 1065846: // </align>
8842 case 976214: // </ALIGN>
8843 m_lineJustification = m_lineJustificationStack.Remove();
8844 return true;
8845 case 327550: // <width=xx>
8846 case 237918: // <WIDTH>
8847 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
8848
8849 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
8850 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
8851
8852 switch (tagUnitType)
8853 {
8854 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
8855 m_width = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
8856 break;
8857 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
8858 return false;
8859 //break;
8860 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
8861 m_width = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
8862 break;
8863 }
8864 return true;
8865 case 1117479: // </width>
8866 case 1027847: // </WIDTH>
8867 m_width = -1;
8868 return true;
8869 // STYLE tag is now handled inline and replaced by its definition.
8870 //case 322689: // <style="name">
8871 //case 233057: // <STYLE>
8872 // TMP_Style style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode);
8873
8874 // if (style == null) return false;
8875
8876 // m_styleStack.Add(style.hashCode);
8877
8878 // // Parse Style Macro
8879 // for (int i = 0; i < style.styleOpeningTagArray.Length; i++)
8880 // {
8881 // if (style.styleOpeningTagArray[i] == 60)
8882 // {
8883 // if (ValidateHtmlTag(style.styleOpeningTagArray, i + 1, out i) == false) return false;
8884 // }
8885 // }
8886 // return true;
8887 //case 1112618: // </style>
8888 //case 1022986: // </STYLE>
8889 // style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode);
8890
8891 // if (style == null)
8892 // {
8893 // // Get style from the Style Stack
8894 // int styleHashCode = m_styleStack.CurrentItem();
8895 // style = TMP_StyleSheet.GetStyle(styleHashCode);
8896
8897 // m_styleStack.Remove();
8898 // }
8899
8900 // if (style == null) return false;
8901 // //// Parse Style Macro
8902 // for (int i = 0; i < style.styleClosingTagArray.Length; i++)
8903 // {
8904 // if (style.styleClosingTagArray[i] == 60)
8905 // ValidateHtmlTag(style.styleClosingTagArray, i + 1, out i);
8906 // }
8907 // return true;
8908 case 281955: // <color> <color=#FF00FF> or <color=#FF00FF00>
8909 case 192323: // <COLOR=#FF00FF>
8910 // <color=#FFF> 3 Hex (short hand)
8911 if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 10)
8912 {
8913 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8914 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8915 return true;
8916 }
8917 // <color=#FFF7> 4 Hex (short hand)
8918 else if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 11)
8919 {
8920 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8921 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8922 return true;
8923 }
8924 // <color=#FF00FF> 3 Hex pairs
8925 if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 13)
8926 {
8927 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8928 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8929 return true;
8930 }
8931 // <color=#FF00FF00> 4 Hex pairs
8932 else if (m_htmlTag[6] == 35 && tagCharCount == 15)
8933 {
8934 m_htmlColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, tagCharCount);
8935 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8936 return true;
8937 }
8938
8939 // <color=name>
8940 switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode)
8941 {
8942 case 125395: // <color=red>
8943 m_htmlColor = Color.red;
8944 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8945 return true;
8946 case -992792864: // <color=lightblue>
8947 m_htmlColor = new Color32(173, 216, 230, 255);
8948 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8949 return true;
8950 case 3573310: // <color=blue>
8951 m_htmlColor = Color.blue;
8952 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8953 return true;
8954 case 3680713: // <color=grey>
8955 m_htmlColor = new Color32(128, 128, 128, 255);
8956 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8957 return true;
8958 case 117905991: // <color=black>
8959 m_htmlColor = Color.black;
8960 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8961 return true;
8962 case 121463835: // <color=green>
8963 m_htmlColor = Color.green;
8964 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8965 return true;
8966 case 140357351: // <color=white>
8967 m_htmlColor = Color.white;
8968 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8969 return true;
8970 case 26556144: // <color=orange>
8971 m_htmlColor = new Color32(255, 128, 0, 255);
8972 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8973 return true;
8974 case -36881330: // <color=purple>
8975 m_htmlColor = new Color32(160, 32, 240, 255);
8976 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8977 return true;
8978 case 554054276: // <color=yellow>
8979 m_htmlColor = Color.yellow;
8980 m_colorStack.Add(m_htmlColor);
8981 return true;
8982 }
8983 return false;
8984
8985 case 100149144: //<gradient>
8986 case 69403544: // <GRADIENT>
8987 int gradientPresetHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
8988 TMP_ColorGradient tempColorGradientPreset;
8989
8990 // Check if Color Gradient Preset has already been loaded.
8991 if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetColorGradientPreset(gradientPresetHashCode, out tempColorGradientPreset))
8992 {
8993 m_colorGradientPreset = tempColorGradientPreset;
8994 }
8995 else
8996 {
8997 // Load Color Gradient Preset
8998 if (tempColorGradientPreset == null)
8999 {
9000 tempColorGradientPreset = Resources.Load<TMP_ColorGradient>(TMP_Settings.defaultColorGradientPresetsPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
9001 }
9002
9003 if (tempColorGradientPreset == null)
9004 return false;
9005
9006 MaterialReferenceManager.AddColorGradientPreset(gradientPresetHashCode, tempColorGradientPreset);
9007 m_colorGradientPreset = tempColorGradientPreset;
9008 }
9009
9010 m_colorGradientPresetIsTinted = false;
9011
9012 // Check Attributes
9013 for (int i = 1; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
9014 {
9015 // Get attribute name
9016 int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
9017
9018 switch (nameHashCode)
9019 {
9020 case 45819: // tint
9021 case 33019: // TINT
9022 m_colorGradientPresetIsTinted = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength) != 0;
9023 break;
9024 }
9025 }
9026
9027 m_colorGradientStack.Add(m_colorGradientPreset);
9028
9029 // TODO : Add support for defining preset in the tag itself
9030
9031 return true;
9032
9033 case 371094791: // </gradient>
9034 case 340349191: // </GRADIENT>
9035 m_colorGradientPreset = m_colorGradientStack.Remove();
9036 return true;
9037
9038 case 1983971: // <cspace=xx.x>
9039 case 1356515: // <CSPACE>
9040 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9041
9042 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9043 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9044
9045 switch (tagUnitType)
9046 {
9047 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9048 m_cSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9049 break;
9050 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9051 m_cSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9052 break;
9053 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9054 return false;
9055 }
9056 return true;
9057 case 7513474: // </cspace>
9058 case 6886018: // </CSPACE>
9059 if (!m_isParsingText) return true;
9060
9061 // Adjust xAdvance to remove extra space from last character.
9062 if (m_characterCount > 0)
9063 {
9064 m_xAdvance -= m_cSpacing;
9065 m_textInfo.characterInfo[m_characterCount - 1].xAdvance = m_xAdvance;
9066 }
9067 m_cSpacing = 0;
9068 return true;
9069 case 2152041: // <mspace=xx.x>
9070 case 1524585: // <MSPACE>
9071 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9072
9073 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9074 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9075
9076 switch (tagUnitType)
9077 {
9078 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9079 m_monoSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9080 break;
9081 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9082 m_monoSpacing = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9083 break;
9084 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9085 return false;
9086 }
9087 return true;
9088 case 7681544: // </mspace>
9089 case 7054088: // </MSPACE>
9090 m_monoSpacing = 0;
9091 return true;
9092 case 280416: // <class="name">
9093 return false;
9094 case 1071884: // </color>
9095 case 982252: // </COLOR>
9096 m_htmlColor = m_colorStack.Remove();
9097 return true;
9098 case 2068980: // <indent=10px> <indent=10em> <indent=50%>
9099 case 1441524: // <INDENT>
9100 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9101
9102 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9103 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9104
9105 switch (tagUnitType)
9106 {
9107 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9108 tag_Indent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9109 break;
9110 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9111 tag_Indent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9112 break;
9113 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9114 tag_Indent = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
9115 break;
9116 }
9117 m_indentStack.Add(tag_Indent);
9118
9119 m_xAdvance = tag_Indent;
9120 return true;
9121 case 7598483: // </indent>
9122 case 6971027: // </INDENT>
9123 tag_Indent = m_indentStack.Remove();
9124 //m_xAdvance = tag_Indent;
9125 return true;
9126 case 1109386397: // <line-indent>
9127 case -842656867: // <LINE-INDENT>
9128 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9129
9130 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9131 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9132
9133 switch (tagUnitType)
9134 {
9135 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9136 tag_LineIndent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9137 break;
9138 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9139 tag_LineIndent = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9140 break;
9141 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9142 tag_LineIndent = m_marginWidth * value / 100;
9143 break;
9144 }
9145
9146 m_xAdvance += tag_LineIndent;
9147 return true;
9148 case -445537194: // </line-indent>
9149 case 1897386838: // </LINE-INDENT>
9150 tag_LineIndent = 0;
9151 return true;
9152 case 2246877: // <sprite=x>
9153 case 1619421: // <SPRITE>
9154 int spriteAssetHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
9155 TMP_SpriteAsset tempSpriteAsset;
9156 m_spriteIndex = -1;
9157
9158 // CHECK TAG FORMAT
9159 if (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType == TagValueType.None || m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType == TagValueType.NumericalValue)
9160 {
9161 // No Sprite Asset is assigned to the text object
9162 if (m_spriteAsset != null)
9163 {
9164 m_currentSpriteAsset = m_spriteAsset;
9165 }
9166 else if (m_defaultSpriteAsset != null)
9167 {
9168 m_currentSpriteAsset = m_defaultSpriteAsset;
9169 }
9170 else if (m_defaultSpriteAsset == null)
9171 {
9172 if (TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset != null)
9173 m_defaultSpriteAsset = TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAsset;
9174 else
9175 m_defaultSpriteAsset = Resources.Load<TMP_SpriteAsset>("Sprite Assets/Default Sprite Asset");
9176
9177 m_currentSpriteAsset = m_defaultSpriteAsset;
9178 }
9179
9180 // No valid sprite asset available
9181 if (m_currentSpriteAsset == null)
9182 return false;
9183 }
9184 else
9185 {
9186 // A Sprite Asset has been specified
9187 if (MaterialReferenceManager.TryGetSpriteAsset(spriteAssetHashCode, out tempSpriteAsset))
9188 {
9189 m_currentSpriteAsset = tempSpriteAsset;
9190 }
9191 else
9192 {
9193 // Load Sprite Asset
9194 if (tempSpriteAsset == null)
9195 {
9196 //
9197 tempSpriteAsset = OnSpriteAssetRequest?.Invoke(spriteAssetHashCode, new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
9198
9199 if (tempSpriteAsset == null)
9200 tempSpriteAsset = Resources.Load<TMP_SpriteAsset>(TMP_Settings.defaultSpriteAssetPath + new string(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength));
9201 }
9202
9203 if (tempSpriteAsset == null)
9204 return false;
9205
9206 //Debug.Log("Loading & assigning new Sprite Asset: " + tempSpriteAsset.name);
9207 MaterialReferenceManager.AddSpriteAsset(spriteAssetHashCode, tempSpriteAsset);
9208 m_currentSpriteAsset = tempSpriteAsset;
9209 }
9210 }
9211
9212 // Handling of <sprite=index> legacy tag format.
9213 if (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType == TagValueType.NumericalValue) // <sprite=index>
9214 {
9215 int index = (int)ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9216
9217 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9218 if (index == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9219
9220 // Check to make sure sprite index is valid
9221 if (index > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable.Count - 1) return false;
9222
9223 m_spriteIndex = index;
9224 }
9225
9226 m_spriteColor = s_colorWhite;
9227 m_tintSprite = false;
9228
9229 // Handle Sprite Tag Attributes
9230 for (int i = 0; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
9231 {
9232 //Debug.Log("Attribute[" + i + "].nameHashCode=" + m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode + " Value:" + ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength));
9233 int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
9234 int index = 0;
9235
9236 switch (nameHashCode)
9237 {
9238 case 43347: // <sprite name="">
9239 case 30547: // <SPRITE NAME="">
9240 m_currentSpriteAsset = TMP_SpriteAsset.SearchForSpriteByHashCode(m_currentSpriteAsset, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueHashCode, true, out index);
9241 if (index == -1) return false;
9242
9243 m_spriteIndex = index;
9244 break;
9245 case 295562: // <sprite index=>
9246 case 205930: // <SPRITE INDEX=>
9247 index = (int)ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
9248
9249 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9250 if (index == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9251
9252 // Check to make sure sprite index is valid
9253 if (index > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteCharacterTable.Count - 1) return false;
9254
9255 m_spriteIndex = index;
9256 break;
9257 case 45819: // tint
9258 case 33019: // TINT
9259 m_tintSprite = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength) != 0;
9260 break;
9261 case 281955: // color=#FF00FF80
9262 case 192323: // COLOR
9263 m_spriteColor = HexCharsToColor(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
9264 break;
9265 case 39505: // anim="0,16,12" start, end, fps
9266 case 26705: // ANIM
9267 //Debug.Log("Start: " + m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex + " Length: " + m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
9268 int paramCount = GetAttributeParameters(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength, ref m_attributeParameterValues);
9269 if (paramCount != 3) return false;
9270
9271 m_spriteIndex = (int)m_attributeParameterValues[0];
9272
9273 if (m_isParsingText)
9274 {
9275 // TODO : fix this!
9276 //if (m_attributeParameterValues[0] > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteInfoList.Count - 1 || m_attributeParameterValues[1] > m_currentSpriteAsset.spriteInfoList.Count - 1)
9277 // return false;
9278
9279 spriteAnimator.DoSpriteAnimation(m_characterCount, m_currentSpriteAsset, m_spriteIndex, (int)m_attributeParameterValues[1], (int)m_attributeParameterValues[2]);
9280 }
9281
9282 break;
9283 //case 45545: // size
9284 //case 32745: // SIZE
9285
9286 // break;
9287 default:
9288 if (nameHashCode != 2246877 && nameHashCode != 1619421)
9289 return false;
9290 break;
9291 }
9292 }
9293
9294 if (m_spriteIndex == -1) return false;
9295
9296 // Material HashCode for the Sprite Asset is the Sprite Asset Hash Code
9297 m_currentMaterialIndex = MaterialReference.AddMaterialReference(m_currentSpriteAsset.material, m_currentSpriteAsset, m_materialReferences, m_materialReferenceIndexLookup);
9298
9299 m_textElementType = TMP_TextElementType.Sprite;
9300 return true;
9301 case 730022849: // <lowercase>
9302 case 514803617: // <LOWERCASE>
9303 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.LowerCase;
9304 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.LowerCase);
9305 return true;
9306 case -1668324918: // </lowercase>
9307 case -1883544150: // </LOWERCASE>
9308 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.LowerCase) != FontStyles.LowerCase)
9309 {
9310 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.LowerCase) == 0)
9311 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.LowerCase;
9312 }
9313 return true;
9314 case 13526026: // <allcaps>
9315 case 9133802: // <ALLCAPS>
9316 case 781906058: // <uppercase>
9317 case 566686826: // <UPPERCASE>
9318 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.UpperCase;
9319 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.UpperCase);
9320 return true;
9321 case 52232547: // </allcaps>
9322 case 47840323: // </ALLCAPS>
9323 case -1616441709: // </uppercase>
9324 case -1831660941: // </UPPERCASE>
9325 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.UpperCase) != FontStyles.UpperCase)
9326 {
9327 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.UpperCase) == 0)
9328 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.UpperCase;
9329 }
9330 return true;
9331 case 766244328: // <smallcaps>
9332 case 551025096: // <SMALLCAPS>
9333 m_FontStyleInternal |= FontStyles.SmallCaps;
9334 m_fontStyleStack.Add(FontStyles.SmallCaps);
9335 return true;
9336 case -1632103439: // </smallcaps>
9337 case -1847322671: // </SMALLCAPS>
9338 if ((m_fontStyle & FontStyles.SmallCaps) != FontStyles.SmallCaps)
9339 {
9340 if (m_fontStyleStack.Remove(FontStyles.SmallCaps) == 0)
9341 m_FontStyleInternal &= ~FontStyles.SmallCaps;
9342 }
9343 return true;
9344 case 2109854: // <margin=00.0> <margin=00em> <margin=50%>
9345 case 1482398: // <MARGIN>
9346 // Check value type
9347 switch (m_xmlAttribute[0].valueType)
9348 {
9349 case TagValueType.NumericalValue:
9350 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength); // px
9351
9352 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9353 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9354
9355 // Determine tag unit type
9356 switch (tagUnitType)
9357 {
9358 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9359 m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9360 break;
9361 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9362 m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9363 break;
9364 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9365 m_marginLeft = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
9366 break;
9367 }
9368 m_marginLeft = m_marginLeft >= 0 ? m_marginLeft : 0;
9369 m_marginRight = m_marginLeft;
9370 return true;
9371
9372 case TagValueType.None:
9373 for (int i = 1; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
9374 {
9375 // Get attribute name
9376 int nameHashCode = m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode;
9377
9378 switch (nameHashCode)
9379 {
9380 case 42823: // <margin left=value>
9381 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength); // px
9382
9383 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9384 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9385
9386 switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].unitType)
9387 {
9388 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9389 m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9390 break;
9391 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9392 m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9393 break;
9394 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9395 m_marginLeft = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
9396 break;
9397 }
9398 m_marginLeft = m_marginLeft >= 0 ? m_marginLeft : 0;
9399 break;
9400
9401 case 315620: // <margin right=value>
9402 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength); // px
9403
9404 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9405 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9406
9407 switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].unitType)
9408 {
9409 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9410 m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9411 break;
9412 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9413 m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9414 break;
9415 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9416 m_marginRight = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
9417 break;
9418 }
9419 m_marginRight = m_marginRight >= 0 ? m_marginRight : 0;
9420 break;
9421 }
9422 }
9423 return true;
9424 }
9425
9426 return false;
9427 case 7639357: // </margin>
9428 case 7011901: // </MARGIN>
9429 m_marginLeft = 0;
9430 m_marginRight = 0;
9431 return true;
9432 case 1100728678: // <margin-left=xx.x>
9433 case -855002522: // <MARGIN-LEFT>
9434 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength); // px
9435
9436 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9437 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9438
9439 switch (tagUnitType)
9440 {
9441 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9442 m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9443 break;
9444 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9445 m_marginLeft = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9446 break;
9447 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9448 m_marginLeft = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
9449 break;
9450 }
9451 m_marginLeft = m_marginLeft >= 0 ? m_marginLeft : 0;
9452 return true;
9453 case -884817987: // <margin-right=xx.x>
9454 case -1690034531: // <MARGIN-RIGHT>
9455 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength); // px
9456
9457 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9458 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9459
9460 switch (tagUnitType)
9461 {
9462 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9463 m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9464 break;
9465 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9466 m_marginRight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9467 break;
9468 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9469 m_marginRight = (m_marginWidth - (m_width != -1 ? m_width : 0)) * value / 100;
9470 break;
9471 }
9472 m_marginRight = m_marginRight >= 0 ? m_marginRight : 0;
9473 return true;
9474 case 1109349752: // <line-height=xx.x>
9475 case -842693512: // <LINE-HEIGHT>
9476 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9477
9478 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9479 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9480
9481 switch (tagUnitType)
9482 {
9483 case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9484 m_lineHeight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f);
9485 break;
9486 case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9487 m_lineHeight = value * (m_isOrthographic ? 1 : 0.1f) * m_currentFontSize;
9488 break;
9489 case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9490 m_lineHeight = m_fontAsset.faceInfo.lineHeight * value / 100 * m_fontScale;
9491 break;
9492 }
9493 return true;
9494 case -445573839: // </line-height>
9495 case 1897350193: // </LINE-HEIGHT>
9496 m_lineHeight = TMP_Math.FLOAT_UNSET;
9497 return true;
9498 case 15115642: // <noparse>
9499 case 10723418: // <NOPARSE>
9500 tag_NoParsing = true;
9501 return true;
9502 case 1913798: // <action>
9503 case 1286342: // <ACTION>
9504 int actionID = m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode;
9505
9506 if (m_isParsingText)
9507 {
9508 m_actionStack.Add(actionID);
9509
9510 Debug.Log("Action ID: [" + actionID + "] First character index: " + m_characterCount);
9511
9512
9513 }
9514 //if (m_isParsingText)
9515 //{
9516 // TMP_Action action = TMP_Action.GetAction(m_xmlAttribute[0].valueHashCode);
9517 //}
9518 return true;
9519 case 7443301: // </action>
9520 case 6815845: // </ACTION>
9521 if (m_isParsingText)
9522 {
9523 Debug.Log("Action ID: [" + m_actionStack.CurrentItem() + "] Last character index: " + (m_characterCount - 1));
9524 }
9525
9526 m_actionStack.Remove();
9527 return true;
9528 case 315682: // <scale=xx.x>
9529 case 226050: // <SCALE=xx.x>
9530 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9531
9532 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9533 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9534
9535 m_FXMatrix = Matrix4x4.TRS(Vector3.zero, Quaternion.identity, new Vector3(value, 1, 1));
9536 m_isFXMatrixSet = true;
9537
9538 return true;
9539 case 1105611: // </scale>
9540 case 1015979: // </SCALE>
9541 m_isFXMatrixSet = false;
9542 return true;
9543 case 2227963: // <rotate=xx.x>
9544 case 1600507: // <ROTATE=xx.x>
9545 // TODO: Add ability to use Random Rotation
9546
9547 value = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[0].valueLength);
9548
9549 // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9550 if (value == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9551
9552 m_FXMatrix = Matrix4x4.TRS(Vector3.zero, Quaternion.Euler(0, 0, value), Vector3.one);
9553 m_isFXMatrixSet = true;
9554
9555 return true;
9556 case 7757466: // </rotate>
9557 case 7130010: // </ROTATE>
9558 m_isFXMatrixSet = false;
9559 return true;
9560 case 317446: // <table>
9561 case 227814: // <TABLE>
9562 //switch (m_xmlAttribute[1].nameHashCode)
9563 //{
9564 // case 327550: // width
9565 // float tableWidth = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[1].valueLength);
9566
9567 // // Reject tag if value is invalid.
9568 // if (tableWidth == Int16.MinValue) return false;
9569
9570 // switch (tagUnitType)
9571 // {
9572 // case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9573 // Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "px.");
9574 // break;
9575 // case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9576 // Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "em.");
9577 // break;
9578 // case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9579 // Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "%.");
9580 // break;
9581 // }
9582 // break;
9583 //}
9584 return false;
9585 case 1107375: // </table>
9586 case 1017743: // </TABLE>
9587 return true;
9588 case 926: // <tr>
9589 case 670: // <TR>
9590 return true;
9591 case 3229: // </tr>
9592 case 2973: // </TR>
9593 return true;
9594 case 916: // <th>
9595 case 660: // <TH>
9596 // Set style to bold and center alignment
9597 return true;
9598 case 3219: // </th>
9599 case 2963: // </TH>
9600 return true;
9601 case 912: // <td>
9602 case 656: // <TD>
9603 // Style options
9604 //for (int i = 1; i < m_xmlAttribute.Length && m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode != 0; i++)
9605 //{
9606 // switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].nameHashCode)
9607 // {
9608 // case 327550: // width
9609 // float tableWidth = ConvertToFloat(m_htmlTag, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueStartIndex, m_xmlAttribute[i].valueLength);
9610
9611 // switch (tagUnitType)
9612 // {
9613 // case TagUnitType.Pixels:
9614 // Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "px.");
9615 // break;
9616 // case TagUnitType.FontUnits:
9617 // Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "em.");
9618 // break;
9619 // case TagUnitType.Percentage:
9620 // Debug.Log("Table width = " + tableWidth + "%.");
9621 // break;
9622 // }
9623 // break;
9624 // case 275917: // align
9625 // switch (m_xmlAttribute[i].valueHashCode)
9626 // {
9627 // case 3774683: // left
9628 // Debug.Log("TD align=\"left\".");
9629 // break;
9630 // case 136703040: // right
9631 // Debug.Log("TD align=\"right\".");
9632 // break;
9633 // case -458210101: // center
9634 // Debug.Log("TD align=\"center\".");
9635 // break;
9636 // case -523808257: // justified
9637 // Debug.Log("TD align=\"justified\".");
9638 // break;
9639 // }
9640 // break;
9641 // }
9642 //}
9643
9644 return false;
9645 case 3215: // </td>
9646 case 2959: // </TD>
9647 return false;
9648 }
9649 }
9650 #endif
9651 #endregion
9652
9653 return false;
9654 }

Property Documentation

◆ alignment

TextAlignmentOptions TMPro.TMP_Text.alignment
getsetinherited

Text alignment options

602 {
603 get { return (TextAlignmentOptions)((int)m_HorizontalAlignment | (int)m_VerticalAlignment); }
604 set
605 {
606 HorizontalAlignmentOptions horizontalAlignment = (HorizontalAlignmentOptions)((int)value & 0xFF);
607 VerticalAlignmentOptions verticalAlignment = (VerticalAlignmentOptions)((int)value & 0xFF00);
608
609 if (m_HorizontalAlignment == horizontalAlignment && m_VerticalAlignment == verticalAlignment)
610 return;
611
612 m_HorizontalAlignment = horizontalAlignment;
613 m_VerticalAlignment = verticalAlignment;
614 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
615 SetVerticesDirty();
616 }
617 }

◆ isTextObjectScaleStatic

◆ linkedTextComponent

TMP_Text TMPro.TMP_Text.linkedTextComponent
getsetinherited

The linked text component used for flowing the text from one text component to another.

789 {
790 get { return m_linkedTextComponent; }
791
792 set
793 {
794 if (value == null)
795 {
796 // Release linked text components
797 ReleaseLinkedTextComponent(m_linkedTextComponent);
798
799 m_linkedTextComponent = value;
800 }
801 else if (IsSelfOrLinkedAncestor(value))
802 {
803 // We do nothing since new assigned is invalid
804 return;
805 }
806 else
807 {
808 // Release linked text components
809 ReleaseLinkedTextComponent(m_linkedTextComponent);
810
811 m_linkedTextComponent = value;
812 m_linkedTextComponent.parentLinkedComponent = this;
813 }
814
815 m_havePropertiesChanged = true;
816 SetVerticesDirty();
817 SetLayoutDirty();
818 }
819 }

◆ pixelsPerUnit

float TMPro.TMP_Text.pixelsPerUnit
getinherited

480 {
481 get
482 {
483 var localCanvas = canvas;
484 if (!localCanvas)
485 return 1;
486 // For dynamic fonts, ensure we use one pixel per pixel on the screen.
487 if (!font)
488 return localCanvas.scaleFactor;
489 // For non-dynamic fonts, calculate pixels per unit based on specified font size relative to font object's own font size.
490 if (m_currentFontAsset == null || m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize <= 0 || m_fontSize <= 0)
491 return 1;
492 return m_fontSize / m_currentFontAsset.faceInfo.pointSize;
493 }
494 }

◆ vertexBufferAutoSizeReduction

bool TMPro.TMP_Text.vertexBufferAutoSizeReduction
getsetinherited

Determines if the data structures allocated to contain the geometry of the text object will be reduced in size if the number of characters required to display the text is reduced by more than 256 characters. This reduction has the benefit of reducing the amount of vertex data being submitted to the graphic device but results in GC when it occurs.

1031 {
1032 get { return m_VertexBufferAutoSizeReduction; }
1033 set { m_VertexBufferAutoSizeReduction = value; m_havePropertiesChanged = true; SetVerticesDirty(); }
1034 }
